T02D2513:204b-23: go rims ji skad du bshad pa'i nang du byams
T02D2513:204b-24: pa la sogs pa ni mi gtogs te rnam par
T02D2513:204b-25: smin pa las byung ba'i sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir
T02D2513:204b-26: ro // sngags rab tu ston pa'i gzhung gi le'u
T02D2513:204b-27: la ni gsangs sngags rim par phye ba zhes bya
T02D2513:204b-29: rim par bye ba gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o /
T02D2513:204b-31: // / sngags yongs su bzung bas na ting nge 'dzin
T02D2513:204b-32: yongs su shes par bya dgos pas de nas zhes
T02D2513:204b-33: bya ba la sogs pa le'u bzhi pa gsungs te
T02D2513:204b-34: / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2513:204b-35: ci zhig mdzad nas she na ye shes chen po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:204b-36: ye shes chen po ni chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa ye shes rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D2513:204b-37: de yam stobs ni nus pa ste thogs pa med pa'o //
T02D2513:204b-38: de'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i sprul pas rnam par spyod pa'o //
T02D2513:204b-39: de nyid rdo rje ste 'bras bu lan pa'i phyir
T02D2513:204b-40: don yod pa'i nus pa can yin la de la
T02D2513:204b-41: dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la
T02D2513:204b-43: de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa ste /
T02D2513:204b-44: ting nge 'dzin ston pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad de zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:205a-1: dmigs pas ni 'di skad ston pa yin te dngos
T02D2513:205a-2: grub kyi phyir lha'i gzugs bsgom pa ni rdo rje
T02D2513:205a-3: phra mo bsgom pa'i sems brtan par byas nas bsgom
T02D2513:205a-5: gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gzugs brnyan bskyed pa'i phyir ras dang rtsig pa dang //
T02D2513:205a-6: shing leb la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la sogs
T02D2513:205a-7: pa'i bar khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya ba
T02D2513:205a-9: 'di ni gnyis su sbyor ba yin te sems yongs
T02D2513:205a-10: su dag pa'i dbang du mdzad pa'i dmigs pa bstan
T02D2513:205a-11: pa'o // rgyud yongs su dag pa ni gnyis su
T02D2513:205a-12: sbyor ba la mngon par zhen par mi byed de
T02D2513:205a-13: pa'o // ji skad du / rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sems //
T02D2513:205a-14: lha la dmigs par byed pa dag //
T02D2513:205a-15: rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te //
T02D2513:205a-16: lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor skye //
T02D2513:205a-17: yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2513:205a-18: lha la dmigs par byed pa dag / rang gi dam tshig bdag sbyor bas //
T02D2513:205a-21: gsang sngags 'chang rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni sngags pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D2513:205a-22: ting nge 'dzin gsang chen zhes bya ba ni rigs
T02D2513:205a-23: dang dam tshig dang phyag rgya mchog dang lhan cig
T02D2513:205a-24: sbyor ba'o // rnal 'byor dag pa 'di ni gtso
T02D2513:205a-25: po'i dbang du mdzad pa bstan pa yin pas 'di
T02D2513:205a-27: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa bstan pas gnas skabs
T02D2513:205a-28: ji lta ba bzhin du de kho na nyid dang
T02D2513:205a-29: gsang sngags dang gsang chen gyi rnal 'byor du 'gyur
T02D2513:205a-30: ro // 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2513:205a-31: mos pa ji lta bas rnal 'byor gsum las gang
T02D2513:205a-32: yang rung ba bsgoms nas mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos
T02D2513:205a-33: grub kyi skal pa can du 'gyur ro //
T02D2513:205a-34: don 'di nyid gzhan dag las kyang rigs kyi bu
T02D2513:205a-35: sems 'di ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ste
T02D2513:205a-36: / 'di lta ste ji ltar sems yongs su sbyangs
T02D2513:205a-37: pa de lta de ltar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa
T02D2513:205a-38: / yin no // aom gyi ye shes las bsgrub pa //
T02D2513:205a-39: zhes bya ba ni ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2513:205a-40: de nyid yi ge aom yin pas na aom gyi
T02D2513:205a-41: ye shes te des bsgrubs pa'i rdo rje bsgom par
T02D2513:205a-42: bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2513:205b-0: rdzogs pa'i go rims kyang byang chub kyi sems @205b kyi le'u'i rim pas so //
T02D2513:205b-1: shes rab ye shes rab rgyas pa //
T02D2513:205b-2: zhes bya ba ni chos bdag med pa'i ye shes kyis blo rgyas par byas pa'o //
T02D2513:205b-3: zhal gsum gyis ni zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags
T02D2513:205b-4: dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par dag par
T02D2513:205b-5: ston par byed pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum
T02D2513:205b-6: gyi ngo bo ste kha dog ni gcig pa'o //
T02D2513:205b-7: la la ni man ngag las zhal gsum gyi mdog
T02D2513:205b-8: ni 'dus pa ltar gsum du bya'o zhes zer ro
T02D2513:205b-9: // spyan gsum ni zhal dang po 'am re re
T02D2513:205b-10: zheng gsum ste thams cad du yang de bzhin no
T02D2513:205b-11: // // dang po bsam gtan phyag rgya can //
T02D2513:205b-12: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya dang po'i g-yas dang
T02D2513:205b-13: g-yon ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyar byas pa'o
T02D2513:205b-14: // bgrang phreng ldan zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi nor bu dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2513:205b-15: nu ma 'dzin zhes bya ba ni nu ma bzung ba ste /
T02D2513:205b-16: lha mo yang phyag gnyis pa sku mdog gser mo
T02D2513:205b-17: lag pa gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud par
T02D2513:205b-18: byed pa ste / gshin rje gshed kyi lha mo
T02D2513:205b-19: gnyis phyag gnyis mnga' bar bshad pa 'dis nye bar
T02D2513:205b-20: mtshon pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:205b-21: la la na re rang gi bdag po dang 'dra
T02D2513:205b-22: bar thams cad bsam mo zhes zer te 'dis ni
T02D2513:205b-24: mchod pa'i dus su ni nu ma 'dzin pa med par bya'o //
T02D2513:205b-25: 'jigs shing skrag mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni 'dir
T02D2513:205b-26: de nas zhes nye bar mtshon pa'i tshig gi bsgom
T02D2513:205b-27: par gyis zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar ro //
T02D2513:205b-28: de bzhin du rigs las kyang 'di nyid kyi 'og nas ston to //
T02D2513:205b-29: sprin zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa'o //
T02D2513:205b-31: zhes bya ba ni gal te rnyed na gzhan dang
T02D2513:205b-32: mi 'gro ba nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang
T02D2513:205b-33: ldan pa'i rig ma bzhi la mngon par sbyor bar
T02D2513:205b-34: byas la des ji lta ba bzhin du mchod par
T02D2513:205b-35: sbyed pa ni rnal 'byor pa des de bzhin gshegs
T02D2513:205b-36: pa thams cad rang gi dam tshig gis 'khyud pa'i
T02D2513:205b-37: sku spro bar bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2513:205b-38: 'dis ni gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bshad pa yin no //
T02D2513:205b-39: nang gi gsang sngags bzlas brjod cing //
T02D2513:205b-40: zhes bya ba ni nang gi bzlas pas so //
T02D2513:205b-41: de nyid spyod yul ba zhes bya ba ni rang
T02D2513:205b-42: gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyi yul te 'dis ni de
T02D2513:205b-43: kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor gsungs pa yin no
T02D2513:206a-0: // rnal 'bor 'di la ni nu ma 'dzin pa med pas sdigs mdzub la sogs @206a * //
T02D2513:206a-1: ba ci rigs par gzung ngo //
T02D2513:206a-2: 'dir yang 'am gyi sgras ni phyogs gzhan ston par byed pa yin par shes par bya ste /
T02D2513:206a-3: sgom pa po gcig gis gsum char bya bar mi
T02D2513:206a-4: rigs pas sgrub pa po gcig gis de kho na
T02D2513:206a-5: nyid dang / gsang ba dang gsang ba chen po
T02D2513:206a-6: rnams rim bzhin du bsgom par bya'o zhes shes par
T02D2513:206a-7: bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gsum nye bar bkod
T02D2513:206a-8: nyid dang / de / ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rim
T02D2513:206a-9: pa ni 'og nas bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams
T02D2513:206a-10: la yang 'di bzhin shes par bya ste /
T02D2513:206a-11: la la ra de kho na nyid la sogs par ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:206a-12: de yang nye bar mtshon pa ni ting nge 'dzin
T02D2513:206a-13: thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos
T02D2513:206a-14: pa yin te / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi
T02D2513:206a-15: zhes pa lha thams cad la dmigs pa'i bdag nyid
T02D2513:206a-16: can gyi stobs te thogs pa med pa'i nus pa
T02D2513:206a-17: rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings
T02D2513:206a-19: de 'gengs shing rdzogs par byed pa'i bcom ldan 'das
T02D2513:206a-20: ni de'i ngo bos rnal 'byor pa'i sems la skyed
T02D2513:206a-21: par mdzad pa rnam par snang mdzad gang yin pa
T02D2513:206a-22: de la de skad bya ste /
T02D2513:206a-23: de nyid la dmigs pa'i don 'dis 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
T02D2513:206a-24: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bshad par sku
T02D2513:206a-25: gsung thugs kyi rim pa dang rjes su mthun par
T02D2513:206a-26: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin gsungs te
T02D2513:206a-27: / aom zhes bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i
T02D2513:206a-28: ye shes nyid yi ge aa zhes bya bar shes
T02D2513:206a-29: / par bya ste / thams cad du yang ye
T02D2513:206a-30: shes ji lta ba nyid gsang sngags kyi yi ge
T02D2513:206a-31: yin no zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T02D2513:206a-32: tshig gi lam zhes bya ba ni lung gi chos ma lus pa'i ngo bo nyid du //
T02D2513:206a-33: dbu rgyan thams cad mkhyen pas byas //
T02D2513:206a-34: zhes bya ba la thams cad mkhyen pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
T02D2513:206a-35: des dbu rgyan byas pa ni gtso bo'i rin po
T02D2513:206a-36: che'i dbu rgyan gang la mnga' ba de la de
T02D2513:206a-37: skad ces bya'o // gdan ni bzhi dang ldan zhes
T02D2513:206a-38: bya ba la zla ba'i gdan te nye bar mtshon
T02D2513:206a-39: pa 'dis ni gzhan dag gi yang gdan du zla
T02D2513:206a-41: la la ni lha mo bzhi dang gdan gcig pas
T02D2513:206a-42: gdan ni bzhi dang ldan zhes bya ba'o zhes bya
T02D2513:206a-43: zer ro // phyag gnyis padma rnam par 'byed //
T02D2513:206a-44: ces bya ba ni g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis
T02D2513:206b-0: padma'i sdong bu @206b g-yon pa'i sta zur gyi gnas
T02D2513:206b-1: su 'dzin la / g-yas kyi padma khu tshur gyis
T02D2513:206b-2: rang gi snying gar padma'i 'dab ma 'byed pa la
T02D2513:206b-3: brtson pa ste 'dir de la blta zhing zhes bya
T02D2513:206b-4: ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D2513:206b-5: yang tshig gi lam zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'i chos ma lus pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D2513:206b-6: rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:206b-7: la rnam pa thams cad ni skyes bu chen po'i
T02D2513:206b-8: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po
T02D2513:206b-10: mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
T02D2513:206b-11: rgya che ba ni yul na gnas pa dang gsal ba dang rdzogs pa nyid dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2513:206b-12: chos kyi rgyal po ni chos gnyis ka'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug ste /
T02D2513:206b-13: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:206b-14: h'um zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu'i ye shes yi ge h'um ngo //
T02D2513:206b-15: mthing shun bzang po zhes bya ba ni sku mdog mthing shun lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:206b-16: sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs cod pan can //
T02D2513:206b-17: zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa cod pan la
T02D2513:206b-18: bzhugs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces
T02D2513:206b-19: bya ste / 'dis ni shar du mi bskyod pa
T02D2513:206b-20: bri bar bya'o zhes gang bshad pa der rdo rje
T02D2513:206b-21: sems dpa'i 'bri bar rigs pa yin no //
T02D2513:206b-22: dbu rgyan thams cad mkhyen pas byas //
T02D2513:206b-23: zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'od dpag med kyi gnas su yang 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
T02D2513:206b-24: 'di dag gi rjes su 'brangs pas rin chen 'byung
T02D2513:206b-25: ldan dang don yod grub pa'i gnas su yang rang
T02D2513:206b-26: gi de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2513:206b-27: shin tu 'brel ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba gnyis bri ste /
T02D2513:206b-28: rdo rje sems dpa'i mi bskyod pa //
T02D2513:206b-30: rdo rje chos ni 'jig rten dbang //
T02D2513:206b-31: rdo rje las ni rab sgrub stsol //
T02D2513:206b-32: zhes gsungs pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa
T02D2513:206b-33: nyid mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sgrar bshad pa
T02D2513:206b-35: rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs //
T02D2513:206b-36: zhes bya ba ni stan gyi nang du mtho gang
T02D2513:206b-37: gis mchod par rkang pa bzhag nas phyogs gnyis su
T02D2513:206b-38: brkyang ste / g-yon phyogs cung zad dbab par bya'o
T02D2513:206b-39: zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid can te des gnas pa'o
T02D2513:206b-40: brkyang ste / // la la na re gang rnal
T02D2513:206b-41: 'byor dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas pas 'dug par
T02D2513:206b-43: de ltar kun du khyab pa nyid //
T02D2513:206b-44: ces bya ba 'dir de dag gis zhes nye bar sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2513:207a-0: @207a * // de bzhin du rigs la sogs pa rnams la yang de ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:207a-1: rga shi rnams kyi pha rol 'gro //
T02D2513:207a-2: zhes bya ba ni de dang bral ba'i don to //
T02D2513:207a-3: sems chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems chen po ni gnyis kyis dben pa'o //
T02D2513:207a-4: de'i rdzogs par byed pa ni gdul bya rnams kyi
T02D2513:207a-5: sems rang bzhin gyis rnam par byang ba nyid du
T02D2513:207a-6: gnas pa'i mi bden pa'i kun du rtog pa bsal
T02D2513:207a-7: ba de ltar rdzogs shing don de kun nas mthar
T02D2513:207a-8: phyin par byed pa de'i stobs te nus pa gang
T02D2513:207a-9: yin pa de nyid mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2513:207a-10: rdo rje'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2513:207a-12: gtso bor gyur pa bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje de ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:207a-13: de nyid ni rdo rje thugs te sems can gyi
T02D2513:207a-14: don bya ba la 'jug pa la thogs pa med
T02D2513:207a-15: pa'i pha rol gnon pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro
T02D2513:207a-16: // de la dmigs pas na ting nge 'dzin de la ming de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:207a-17: tram gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa //
T02D2513:207a-18: zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid yi ye shes yi ge tram ste /
T02D2513:207a-19: de las bsgrubs pa ni de bzhin du gzhan dag
T02D2513:207a-20: gis ji lta ba bzhin du 'di nyid bsgoms pas
T02D2513:207a-21: 'tshang rgya ba nyid thob pa'o zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2513:207a-22: to // de bzhin du thams cad la yang 'bras
T02D2513:207a-23: bu nye bar len pa'i gzhir gyur pas na lha
T02D2513:207a-24: rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs su gdags te
T02D2513:207a-25: to // / gdul bya rnams 'bras bu la gzhol bas 'jug pa'o //
T02D2513:207a-26: rin chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rin chen ni rin po che'i rigs so //
T02D2513:207a-27: rin chen mngon par mtho ba zhes bya ba ni
T02D2513:207a-28: gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su
T02D2513:207a-29: rdzogs par byed pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
T02D2513:207a-30: de'i ye shes ni des bskyed pa ste ye shes
T02D2513:207a-31: kyi tshogs kyi 'bras bu stsol bas rin chen 'byung
T02D2513:207a-32: ldan te / ting nge 'dzin de la yang ming de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:207a-33: de la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:207a-34: kham gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa //
T02D2513:207a-35: zhes bya ba la ye shes ni bya ba nan
T02D2513:207a-36: tan sgrub pa ste de nyid yi ge kham yin
T02D2513:207a-37: no // kham gi yi shes las bsgrubs pa ni nges par 'byung ba'o //
T02D2513:207a-38: ting 'dzin phyag rgyas legs zhugs pa //
T02D2513:207a-39: zhes bya ba ni ji srid du bshad pa'i mtshan
T02D2513:207a-40: nyid can gyi bsam gtan gyi phyag rgyas shin tu
T02D2513:207b-1: zhes bya ba ni sku mdog mar ka ta'i 'od
T02D2513:207b-2: 'bar ba ste ljang gu zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2513:207b-3: // la la dag ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ma
T02D2513:207b-4: ra ka ta lta bu'o zhes zer mod kyi de
T02D2513:207b-5: ni mi rigs te bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mdog
T02D2513:207b-6: 'chad pa'i skabs yin gyi 'od ni ma yin no
T02D2513:207b-7: // // legs par 'grub phyir slar yang sdud //
T02D2513:207b-8: ces bya ba ni sems dbang du gyur pa legs
T02D2513:207b-9: par 'grub pa'i phyir spros pa rnams slar nye bar
T02D2513:207b-10: sdud pa ste / 'di yang rnal 'byor pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa yin te /
T02D2513:207b-11: 'di'i 'og ma rnams la yang 'di bzhin khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2513:207b-12: 'od zer chen pos rab gsal zhing //
T02D2513:207b-13: zhes bya ba la 'od zer chen po ni ye
T02D2513:207b-14: shes kyi snang ba'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i
T02D2513:207b-15: phyir bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa'i chos kyi
T02D2513:207b-16: sku'o // de dang 'dra ba ni de'i rgyu mthun
T02D2513:207b-17: pa las byung ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i tshul
T02D2513:207b-18: 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:207b-19: nam mkha'i snying po ni nam mkha'i skye gnas can no //
T02D2513:207b-20: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa nyid dang /
T02D2513:207b-22: thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa nyid la sogs pas mnyam pas na nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
T02D2513:207b-23: gtan tshigs de nyid kyis na 'du byed thams cad spangs pa'i zhes bya'o //
T02D2513:207b-24: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nam
T02D2513:207b-25: mkha' dang mnyam par 'du byed thams cad kyi go
T02D2513:207b-27: de nyid ni bya bsgrub pa'i ye shes yongs su gyur pa las byung bas /
T02D2513:207b-28: ye shes kyi rdo rje ni bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa'o //
T02D2513:207b-29: de la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:207b-30: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2513:207b-31: rjes su 'brangs nas 'dir rigs kyis bsdus pa'i ye
T02D2513:207b-32: shes kyi cha rnams yin par shes par bya'o //

T02D2513:207b-35: zhes bya ba ni 'od dmar po dang 'od kyi phreng ba dmar po gang la yod pa'o //
T02D2513:207b-36: de bas na de ni lha rnams 'jigs pas sems myos te zhes bya ba ste /

T02D2513:207b-38: bar byed ces bya ba ste lag pa gnyis kyi
T02D2513:207b-39: sor mo thams cad kun nas thal mo sbyar ba
T02D2513:207b-40: byas pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces
T02D2513:208a-1: byang chub yan lag 'bras brgyan pa'i //
T02D2513:208a-2: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag ni
T02D2513:208a-3: sbyin pa la sogs pa 'am byang chub kyi yan
T02D2513:208a-4: lag bdun no // de'i 'bras bu ni 'tshang rgya'o //
T02D2513:208a-5: de nyid ni rgyan te snying po yin la de
T02D2513:208a-6: rtog pa'i sbyor ba las yang dag par 'byung ba
T02D2513:208a-7: gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste
T02D2513:208a-8: de bas na de bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2513:208a-9: ye shes kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la

T02D2513:208a-15: pa'i rnam par rtog pas mi shigs pas na rdo
T02D2513:208a-16: no // te / rje'o // de'i 'jo tshul ni rnam par rol pa ste /

T02D2513:208a-26: nye bar mtshon pa 'dis ni lha mo thams cad kyang tshul 'di nyid do zhes zer ro //
T02D2513:208a-27: dgod cing zhes bya ba ni dbus dang g-yas kyi zhal lo //
T02D2513:208a-28: zhal ras khro bag bcas zhes bya ba ni zhal
T02D2513:208a-29: dbus ma'i g-yon pa'i cha khro bag tu bcas la
T02D2513:208a-30: zhal gyi cha'i phyed ni dgod bag tu gnas pa
T02D2513:208a-31: gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:208a-32: shin tu gdug pa'i cig shos rnams tshar gcod pa

T02D2513:208a-35: g-yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste //
T02D2513:208a-36: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya g-yon pa'i rdo rje
T02D2513:208a-37: khu tshur las byung ba'i khro bo'i sdigs mdzub mdzad
T02D2513:208a-38: pas gnas shing de kho na nyid la gnas pas
T02D2513:208a-39: de gzigs zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:208a-40: dngos med dngos po'i mtshan nyid can //
T02D2513:208a-41: zhes bya ba ni dngos po rnams med cing mig
T02D2513:208a-42: yor lta bu'i tshul gyis gzugs chen po'i dngos po'i
T02D2513:208a-43: mtshan nyid can khams gsum lta bu'i rnam par 'jug
T02D2513:208a-44: pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i bdag nyid can
T02D2513:208b-0: gang yin @208b pa de la de skad ces bya
T02D2513:208b-1: ste / don dam par ni gnyis su med pa'i

T02D2513:208b-3: ste / don to // bsgom par bya zhes bya

T02D2513:208b-5: ste / don to // sems kyis so // sgyu
T02D2513:208b-6: 'phrul zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sgyu 'phrul

T02D2513:208b-10: skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa'o //

T02D2513:208b-15: de la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //

T02D2513:208b-17: sangs rgyas kyi sku rnams 'byung ba bsgom par gyis
T02D2513:208b-18: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sku rnams 'byung
T02D2513:208b-19: ba nyid de de lta bu'i lus gang yin pa

T02D2513:208b-21: sprul pa rnams sprul bar mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //

T02D2513:208b-24: pa'i sbyor ba gsungs pa yin no //

T02D2513:208b-26: padma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la padma'i gzugs kyis ni /
T02D2513:208b-27: ji ltar padma rab dmar yang //
T02D2513:208b-28: zhes bya ba'i dpes bstan pas na /
T02D2513:208b-29: 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i ngo bo nyid kyis so //
T02D2513:208b-30: rnam par rol pa ni sems can gyi don gyi phyir rnam par brtse ba'o //
T02D2513:208b-31: des sangs rgyas rnams kyis sam sangs rgyas rnams bzhin
T02D2513:208b-32: du rgyal mtshan nyid can thob cing bsnyes pa ste
T02D2513:208b-33: yum gos dkar mo gang yin pa de la de
T02D2513:208b-34: skad ces bya'o // de nyid ni mi phyed pa'i
T02D2513:208b-35: ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na ye
T02D2513:208b-36: skad ces bya'o // shes rdo rje'o // de la
T02D2513:208b-37: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni
T02D2513:208b-38: skad ces bya'o // shes rdo rje'o // bshad zin to // sgeg pa'i cha lugs la gnas pa //
T02D2513:208b-39: zhes bya ba ni cung zad bzhad pa'i tshul can no //
T02D2513:208b-40: ma ra ka ta'i 'od dang ldan //
T02D2513:208b-41: zhes bya ba ni ma ra ka ta lta bu'i
T02D2513:208b-42: 'od zer gyi mdangs gang yin pa de la de
T02D2513:208b-44: sku mdog ljang gu zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:208b-45: sangs rgyas spro ba kun du 'khrug //
T02D2513:208b-46: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyang yin la spro
T02D2513:208b-47: bar mdzad pa yin pas na de la de skad
T02D2513:208b-48: ces bya ste de rnams kyi sku la khyab pa'o
T02D2513:209a-0: // @209a * // sems can thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:209a-1: la sems can thams cad dbang du byas pa de
T02D2513:209a-2: la rag las pa nyid kyi thugs rje chen po'i
T02D2513:209a-3: stobs kyis bzhud cing 'gro bas na de la de
T02D2513:209a-5: ngo bo nyid de la mngon par dga' ba'i rnal
T02D2513:209a-6: 'byor pa'i sems can rnams smin cing dga' bar byed
T02D2513:209a-7: pa ste de nyid ni ye shes kyi rdo rje'o
T02D2513:209a-8: // dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:209a-9: sems ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje sems ma dang /
T02D2513:209a-10: rdo rje rin chen ma dang rdo rje chos ma
T02D2513:209a-11: dang rdo rje las ma'o zhes bya ba ni mtshan
T02D2513:209a-13: rol pas rjes su mnyes mdzad ma //
T02D2513:209a-14: zhes bya ba ni sgeg pa dang rjes su mthun pas rol par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2513:209a-15: ji ltar rigs pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi bdag po'i sa bon las bsgrub pa ste /
T02D2513:209a-16: kha dog dang gzugs dang phyag mtshan yang de dang 'dra ba 'chang las rdo rje sems ma dang /
T02D2513:209a-17: rdo rje chos la nu ma 'dzin pa med pa
T02D2513:209a-18: de'i phyag gnyis pas sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa 'dzin
T02D2513:209a-19: par bya'o // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya
T02D2513:209a-20: ba la sogs pa la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
T02D2513:209a-21: ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste de thabs
T02D2513:209a-22: dang shes rab kyi bden pas dga' zhing mnyes par
T02D2513:209a-23: byed pas na de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:209a-24: de la dmigs pa la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:209a-25: sku gsum rgyal ba bye ba phrag bdun gyis zhes
T02D2513:209a-26: bya ba ni chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang
T02D2513:209a-27: / sprul pa'i sku'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyal ba
T02D2513:209a-28: bye ba phrag bdun gyis yang dag par ston pa'o
T02D2513:209a-29: / // gsang sngags glu yis zhes bya ba la ni gsang sngags gsungs pas so //
T02D2513:209a-30: bstod ces bya ba ni rnam par mkhyen zhing bsngags par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2513:209a-31: yi ge dgu pa zhes bya ba ni aom zhes
T02D2513:209a-32: bya ba la sogs pa'i gsang sngags kyi ngo bo
T02D2513:209a-34: thabs dgu can zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2513:209a-35: sgeg pa dpa' ba mi sdug pa //
T02D2513:209a-36: dgod dang khro dang 'jigs rung dang //
T02D2513:209a-37: snying rje rngam dang zhi ba ni //
T02D2513:209a-38: gar thabs dgu ru shes par bya //
T02D2513:209a-39: zhes bya ba ste de rnams gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
T02D2513:209a-40: gdul bya rnams kyi bsam pa'i bye brag gis de
T02D2513:209a-41: dag dang ldan pas de skad gsungs pa yin no
T02D2513:209a-42: // lha dgu yis ni gnas su mdzad //
T02D2513:209a-43: ces bya ba ni lha dgus bzhir mdzad pa'i rgyal
T02D2513:209a-44: ba'i gnas gang yin pa de la de skad ces
T02D2513:209b-0: bya'o // don gyis @209b ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2513:209b-1: aom las spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad de ser po /
T02D2513:209b-2: tsa las mig tu 'khor los sgyur ba ste ser po /
T02D2513:209b-3: le las mgrin par mi g-yo ba ste nag po /
T02D2513:209b-4: tsu las snying gar btsug na nor bu ste dmar po /
T02D2513:209b-5: le las dpung mgor don yod pa'i zhags pa ste nag po /
T02D2513:209b-6: cu las lta bar skul byed ma ste /
T02D2513:209b-8: de las brla gnyis su rdo rje 'chad ba ste nag po /
T02D2513:209b-9: sv'a las byin pa gnyis su ral pa gcig ma ste nag po /
T02D2513:209b-10: h'a las rkang pa gnyis kyi steng du rdo rje
T02D2513:209b-11: sen mo can dkar po ste de dag bzhugs pa'o
T02D2513:209b-12: // ston ka'i 'dam bu'i mdog ces bya ba ni
T02D2513:209b-13: sku mdog ston ka'i 'dam bu'o zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2513:209b-14: // to // na chud skal ldan dar la bab //
T02D2513:209b-15: ces bya ba ni na tshod gzhon zhing dar la bab pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2513:209b-16: rig sngags thams cad sgrol mdzad ma //
T02D2513:209b-17: zhes bya ba ni lha mo thams cad kyi nang
T02D2513:209b-18: na yum 'di ni shin tu yang sems can rnams
T02D2513:209b-19: sgrol bar mdzad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:209b-20: zhal dang po ni sku mdog dang mthun la g-yas
T02D2513:209b-21: g-yon gnas pa'i zhal gnyis kyi sku mdog bstan pa
T02D2513:209b-22: ni zhal dbus ma ni sku'i mdog can nyid yin
T02D2513:209b-23: te thams cad du yang de bzhin no //
T02D2513:209b-24: mche ba zla ba tshes pa 'dra //
T02D2513:209b-25: zhes bya ba ni tshes gcig gi zla ba lta bu'o //
T02D2513:209b-26: ljags ni glog bzhin skyod par mdzad //
T02D2513:209b-27: ces bya ba ni lce glog ltar g-yo ba'o //
T02D2513:209b-28: tshems kyis sgrogs gnon rnam par gdangs //
T02D2513:209b-29: zhes bya ni ma mchu'i sgros tshems kyis mnan pas rnam par gdangs pa ni cung zad gdangs pa'o //
T02D2513:209b-30: rtsa ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pas so //
T02D2513:209b-31: se gol gtogs zhes bya ba ni ba dan gsum pa'i phyag gis se gol gtogs pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2513:209b-32: stod g-yogs pang par rnam par bcings //
T02D2513:209b-33: zhes bya ba ni steng nas bla gos gyon pa pang bar bcings zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:209b-34: cho 'phrul rnams pa sna tshogs dang //
T02D2513:209b-35: zhes bya ba ni kun brjod pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2513:209b-36: cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs pa gang yin pa
T02D2513:209b-37: de dang ngo // thal mo sbyor bar byed la brtson //
T02D2513:209b-38: zhes bya ba ni thal mo sbyor ba'o //

T02D2513:209b-41: rgyal ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D2513:209b-43: mtha' yas pa ni tshad med pa'o //
T02D2513:210a-0: @210a * // de rnams kyi ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga ste /
T02D2513:210a-1: de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das yum skul byed ma la yang de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:210a-2: de nyid ni stobs te des lha dgu'i tshogs kyi
T02D2513:210a-3: rdo rje gdug pa rnams las rnam par rgyal bas
T02D2513:210a-4: na de skad ces bya ste de la dmigs pa
T02D2513:210a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin
T02D2513:210a-6: to // gser gyi mdog dang ldan zhes bya ba ni ser po'o //
T02D2513:210a-7: rol stang stabs kyis gnas pas gnon //
T02D2513:210a-8: zhes bya ba ni rol pa'i stang stabs kyi mtshan
T02D2513:210a-9: nyid ni sngar bshad pa ste de nyid ni gzhir
T02D2513:210a-11: des gnon cing bdag gis mdzad pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
T02D2513:210a-12: rol pa'i stang stabs kyis bzhugs zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:210a-13: sangs rgyas sprin spros thob par mdzad //
T02D2513:210a-14: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sprin spros pas
T02D2513:210a-15: thob par mdzad ces bya ba gdul bya'i skye bo
T02D2513:210a-16: rnams kyi kye shes skyed par mdzad pas de skad
T02D2513:210a-17: ces bya'o // chos mdzod ces bya ba ni ye
T02D2513:210a-18: shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur ces bya
T02D2513:210a-19: ces bya'o // ba'i don to // sangs rgyas rin
T02D2513:210a-20: chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sangs rgyas
T02D2513:210a-21: rnams kyi sprin ni tshogs so //
T02D2513:210a-22: sangs rgyas kyi sprin de'i ye shes ji skad du
T02D2513:210a-23: bshad pa ni rnyed par dka' bas na rin po
T02D2513:210a-24: che ste / sangs rgyas kyi sprin ye shes de nyid la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:210a-25: des sngon gyi smon lam nye bar bsags pas snang
T02D2513:210a-26: bar gyur cing 'gro ba ma lus pa'i yid la
T02D2513:210a-27: 'dod pa'i don rdzogs par mdzad pa nyid du so
T02D2513:210a-28: sor snang bar byed pa ste rin chen sgrol ma
T02D2513:210a-30: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:210a-31: ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mtshungs //
T02D2513:210a-32: zhes bya ba ni dkar ba'o //
T02D2513:210a-33: padma la bzhugs pa zhes bya ba ni padma de la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2513:210a-34: gal te de skad bshad mod kyi 'o na kyang
T02D2513:210a-35: padma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te bskyed pa'i
T02D2513:210a-36: rim pa las byung ba'i yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:210a-37: rol pa'i stang stabs brtson pa ste //
T02D2513:210a-38: zhes bya ba ni rol pa'i stang stabs kyis de
T02D2513:210a-39: la bzhugs nas gdug pa rnams zlog par mdzad pa
T02D2513:210a-40: la rab tu 'bad pas brtson par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2513:210a-41: rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba ni phyogs thams cad du gzigs pa'o //
T02D2513:210a-42: nyal dang zhes bya ba la 'dir ni 'khor lo'i sngags rnams yin par shes par bya ste /
T02D2513:210b-0: @210b 'dis ni mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2513:210b-1: 'jigs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:210b-2: la ser sna nye bar bsags pas rang gi sems
T02D2513:210b-3: nyid phyi dang nang gi bgegs rnams su snang ste
T02D2513:210b-5: de 'jigs pa ni nye bar zhi ba ste /
T02D2513:210b-6: de 'jigs par nus pa ni bdag dang bdag gir
T02D2513:210b-7: gnyis su rtog pa la kun du spyod pa la
T02D2513:210b-8: kun du 'dug pa'i ser sna spor bar nus pa'i
T02D2513:210b-9: ye shes gang yin pa de nyid ni rdo rje
T02D2513:210b-10: ste / de'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa nyid
T02D2513:210b-11: dang de thob pa'i thabs kyi bdag nyid can du
T02D2513:210b-12: gyur pas bcom ldan 'das yum khro gnyer can la
T02D2513:210b-14: de la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:210b-15: thams cad bcing ba bskyed pas te //
T02D2513:210b-16: zhes bya ba ni gdug pa thams cad kyi bcing ba ste bgegs byed pa'i nus pa med pa'o //
T02D2513:210b-17: de skyed par mdzad pas na de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:210b-19: sems can ma lus des 'dul byed //

T02D2513:210b-21: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje sgrog ni mi shes pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D2513:210b-22: de'i 'gro ba ni ji ltar bcings pa 'di rnam par mi shigs par 'gyur zhes rtog pa ste /
T02D2513:210b-23: bcom ldan 'das yum rdo rje lu gu rgyud la de skad ces bya ste /
T02D2513:210b-24: de nyid ye shes rdo rje'o //
T02D2513:210b-25: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:210b-26: thub pa skyes mchog ces bya ba ni bar chad
T02D2513:210b-27: med par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
T02D2513:210b-28: ba ste / des na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mchog tu gyur pa'o //
T02D2513:210b-29: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs //
T02D2513:210b-30: zhes bya ba ni sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis gnas pa'o //
T02D2513:210b-31: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi //
T02D2513:210b-32: sprin rnams de bzhin 'phro bar mdzad //
T02D2513:210b-33: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa'i sprin
T02D2513:210b-34: rnams kyis khams gsum khyab par mdzad pa dang de
T02D2513:210b-35: bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sprin rnams kyang 'phro
T02D2513:210b-36: ba mdzad do zhes bya bar sbyar te bsgom par
T02D2513:210b-37: bya'o zhes ba ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D2513:210b-38: byams pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la byams
T02D2513:210b-39: pa'i stobs mnga' bas na byams pa'i stobs te 'phags
T02D2513:211a-0: pa byams pa'o // ye shes nyid kyis bdud bzhi las @211a * //
T02D2513:211a-1: rgyal ba'i mtshan nyid can yin pas na rnam par rgyal ba ste de nyid ni rdo rje'o //
T02D2513:211a-2: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:211a-3: shes rab ye shes mchog thob pa //
T02D2513:211a-4: zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi mchog ni chos bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D2513:211a-5: zab mo'i tshul ni ston pa po//
T02D2513:211a-6: zhes bya ba ni dngos po rnams gnyis su med par ston pa'o //
T02D2513:211a-7: zur phud gsum zhes bya ba ni zur phud gsum dang ldan pas na de skad ces gsungs so //
T02D2513:211a-8: 'jo sgeg thabs kyis rol pa ste //
T02D2513:211a-9: zhes bya ba ni shas cher sgeg pa'i stang stabs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2513:211a-10: shes rab 'chang zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o //
T02D2513:211a-11: shes rab yon tan mchog gis bklubs //
T02D2513:211a-12: zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po 'phags pa 'jam
T02D2513:211a-13: dpal gyi lha'i nga rgyal gyis brgyan par byas pa'o
T02D2513:211a-14: // sangs rgyas 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni 'tshang rgya bar yid la 'dod pas so //
T02D2513:211a-15: 'jam pa'i rab mchog gi zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2513:211a-16: pa la 'jam pa ni byis pa'i cha lugs 'chang
T02D2513:211a-17: ba'o // de nyid phul du byung bas na rab po //
T02D2513:211a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi des par 'byed
T02D2513:211a-19: pa'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid
T02D2513:211a-20: du gyur pas na mchog go //
T02D2513:211a-21: shes rab dang ye shes ni gnyis kyis rnam par dben pa'i shes rab dang ye shes so //
T02D2513:211a-22: rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'jig pas na rdo
T02D2513:211a-23: rje ste de rtogs pa'i tshul gyis snang zhing rab
T02D2513:211a-24: tu gsal bas na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal
T02D2513:211a-25: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:211a-26: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:211a-27: de la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:211a-28: 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' lhag ma rnams bstan
T02D2513:211a-29: pa yin no // grangs med pa zhes bya ba
T02D2513:211a-30: ni tshig 'di grangs med pa nyid ston pa ni
T02D2513:211a-31: ma yin gyi 'on kyang mang po ston pa ste
T02D2513:211a-32: pa yin no // / de rnams ni bzhis ma
T02D2513:211a-33: tshang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' stong yod par shes
T02D2513:211a-34: pa yin no // / par bya'o // sa bon yig 'bru rnams las 'khrungs //
T02D2513:211a-35: zhes bya ba ni ming gi yi ge'i dang po las byung ba'o //
T02D2513:211a-36: ye shes phyag rgya'i sbyor ba can //
T02D2513:211a-37: zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa bsgom pa'i rim pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2513:211a-38: sna tshogs nyams kyis dga' bar mdzad //
T02D2513:211a-39: ces bya ba ni sgeg pa la sogs pa'i gar
T02D2513:211b-0: gyi nyams kyis de la mngon par zhen pa @211b
T02D2513:211b-1: rnams gar stabs kyis nyams de dang des dga' ba
T02D2513:211b-2: skyed par mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:211b-3: gsang sngags zlos pas bsgom par bya //
T02D2513:211b-4: zhes bya ba ni 'dir byed pa'i tshig med par byas nas mtshams sbyar te /
T02D2513:211b-7: sangs rgyas la sogs pa spros te //
T02D2513:211b-8: so so'i sngags brjod pa ni yi ge de las
T02D2513:211b-9: spro ba dang bsdu ba dang gnas dang brtan par
T02D2513:211b-10: gyur par rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rtag tu dran
T02D2513:211b-12: 'dir bsgres te bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de
T02D2513:211b-13: dag thams cad kyang phyag dang po gnyis ni bsam
T02D2513:211b-15: g-yas kyi gnyis pas ni mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02D2513:211b-16: g-yon gyi gnyis pas ni rang gi phyag rgya rgyal
T02D2513:211b-17: mtshan 'dzin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag
T02D2513:211b-18: go // 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhes bya ba ni de dang 'brel pa'o //
T02D2513:211b-19: gzi brjid dang ldan zhes bya ba ni 'bar ma ste zhes bya ba dang sbyar te /
T02D2513:211b-20: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang gdan du ldan pas na de skad ces gsungs so //
T02D2513:211b-21: mdog ni dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra //
T02D2513:211b-22: zhes bya ba ni sku mdog sdo nag go //
T02D2513:211b-23: sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
T02D2513:211b-24: zhes bya ba ni mtha' yas dang rig ldan nag
T02D2513:211b-25: pos dbu skra bcings pa 'jog po gser mdog dang
T02D2513:211b-26: ldan pas ni rna rgyan byas pa /
T02D2513:211b-27: padma chen po gser btso ma'i mdog dang ldan pas ni lag gdub byas pa /
T02D2513:211b-28: karko ta mdog dkar bas ni se ral khar byas pa /
T02D2513:211b-29: nor can mdog padma dmar po lta bus ni ska rags byas la /
T02D2513:211b-30: dung skyong dang padma mdog dkar ba dang dmar bas
T02D2513:211b-31: ni rkang gdub byas pa ste de dag thams cad
T02D2513:211b-32: kyang gdengs ka bskyil pa dang nor bu dang ldan
T02D2513:211b-33: pa'o // rol pa'i stang stabs can zhes bya ba
T02D2513:211b-34: ni rol pa'i stang stabs dang ldan pas na de
T02D2513:211b-35: pa'o // skad ces bya'o // ma he chibs zhes
T02D2513:211b-36: bya ba ni 'di skad gsungs su zin kyang rgyud
T02D2513:211b-37: chen po'i rjes su 'brangs nas ma hes nye bar
T02D2513:211b-38: mtshon pa gshin rje chung ma dang bcas pa yin
T02D2513:211b-40: de'i zhes bya ba ni ma hes nye bar mtshon pas gshin rnge'o //
T02D2513:211b-41: dbu yi steng na mi 'khrugs bzhugs //
T02D2513:211b-42: zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i dbu'i steng na
T02D2513:211b-43: bzhugs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces
T02D2513:211b-44: bya'o // steng na sku gsum zhes bya ba la
T02D2513:211b-45: sogs pa ni steng gi char sku gsum gyi bdag
T02D2513:212a-1: dpal gyis legs par brgyan par byas pa la de'i
T02D2513:212a-3: mda' yang gsor zhes bya ba ni mda' gsor bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D2513:212a-4: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can //
T02D2513:212a-5: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur la mdzub mo bsgreng bas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2513:212a-6: lha mo yis ni g-yas nas 'khyud //
T02D2513:212a-7: ces bya ba la sogs pa la g-yas logs na
T02D2513:212a-8: gnas pa'i lha mo mdog de nyid dang 'dra bas
T02D2513:212a-10: lha mo de'i g-yas na autpala sngon po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2513:212a-11: g-yon pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la g-yon
T02D2513:212a-12: logs na gnas pa'i lha mos g-yas kyis 'khyud la
T02D2513:212a-13: de'i g-yon na ni padma dkar po thogs pa'o //
T02D2513:212a-14: sngar ma bred nas phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2513:212a-15: zhes bya ba ni 'jigs shang bred nas phyag 'tshal zhing mgo btud pa ste /
T02D2513:212a-16: de nyid kyis na sngar ma ste myos par gyur pa'o //
T02D2513:212a-18: zhes bya ba ni 'od zer dmar ba ste de
T02D2513:212a-19: nyid kyis na 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i 'od kyi
T02D2513:212a-21: sangs rgyas sprin 'phros thob par mdzad //
T02D2513:212a-22: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sprin rnams 'phro
T02D2513:212a-23: bas mngon par 'dod pa'i don gdul bya'i skye bo
T02D2513:212a-24: rnams kyis kun nas thob cing rnyed bar mdzad pas
T02D2513:212a-25: na sangs rgyas sprin 'phros thob par mdzad de sprul
T02D2513:212a-26: pa'i sprin gyis sems can don mdzad ces bya ba'i
T02D2513:212a-27: don to // bsgoms nas su zhes bya ba ni
T02D2513:212a-28: 'dir ji skad du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan
T02D2513:212a-29: par bsgoms pa 'di bdag por 'gyur ro zhes bya
T02D2513:212a-30: don to // bar sbyar ro // nyal lam zhes
T02D2513:212a-31: bya ba ni yang gi sgras ni bsdad pa'am sdod
T02D2513:212a-33: kun du zos shing zhes bya ba 'dis ni bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig bstan to //
T02D2513:212a-34: legs par bsams te zhes bya ba ni gdug pa rnams tshar gcod cing 'jig pa'o //
T02D2513:212a-35: 'dod pa lnga'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2513:212a-36: rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang
T02D2513:212a-37: / snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa dang /
T02D2513:212a-38: mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid can gyi gzugs dang sgra
T02D2513:212a-39: dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i mtshan nyid can
T02D2513:212a-40: gyi 'dod pa'i bdag nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta
T02D2513:212a-41: bu'am ma skyes par mos pa sngon du 'gro bas
T02D2513:212a-42: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa mchod pa'i yid
T02D2513:212a-43: la byed pas nye bar longs spyod na gos pa
T02D2513:212b-0: med cing @212b sdig pa'i snod du mi 'gyur ro
T02D2513:212b-1: // de bas na chos thams cad la brten pa
T02D2513:212b-2: med pas na nam mkha' lta bur zhes gsungs pa
T02D2513:212b-3: // yin no // de skad du gzhan dag las kyang /
T02D2513:212b-4: chags pa ye shes 'dod pa yis //
T02D2513:212b-5: rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan bsten //
T02D2513:212b-6: byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par bya //
T02D2513:212b-7: byang chub dpa' bo chags pas bya //
T02D2513:212b-8: gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas //
T02D2513:212b-9: mchod pa byed pas mchod par bya //
T02D2513:212b-10: bcom ldan de nyid sna tshogs pa //
T02D2513:212b-11: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhi //
T02D2513:212b-12: sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas //
T02D2513:212b-13: lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya //
T02D2513:212b-14: de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa //
T02D2513:212b-15: sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso //
T02D2513:212b-16: dril rnam gsum shes byas nas //
T02D2513:212b-17: sangs rgyas la sogs dbul bar bya //
T02D2513:212b-18: de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa //
T02D2513:212b-20: ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas //
T02D2513:212b-21: lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya //
T02D2513:212b-22: de nyid sangs rgyas sna tshogs pa //
T02D2513:212b-23: sangs rgyas thogs med rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2513:212b-24: reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas //
T02D2513:212b-25: bdag gi rigs la dbul bar bya //
T02D2513:212b-26: de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02D2513:212b-27: mi bskyod pa yi tshul brnyes pa'o //
T02D2513:212b-28: gzugs dang sgra dang ro la sogs //
T02D2513:212b-29: rtag tu sems ni sbyar bar bya //
T02D2513:212b-30: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2513:212b-31: gsang ba snying po bsdus pa'o //
T02D2513:212b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2513:212b-33: gshed byed ces bya ba la sogs pa la gshed byed ni 'phrog pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2513:212b-34: de nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad byed pa'am /
T02D2513:212b-35: gdug pa rnams 'joms pa'i phyir slong bar byed pas na gshed byed thams cad slong bar byed pa'o //
T02D2513:212b-36: de nyid ni thogs pa med pa'i phyir ye shes
T02D2513:212b-37: kyang yin la rdo rje yang yin pas de skad
T02D2513:212b-38: ces bya'o // yang na gshed byed thams cad slong
T02D2513:212b-39: bar byed cing skyed par byed pa'i ye shes rdo
T02D2513:212b-40: rje yin pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:212b-41: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis gshin rjer 'jig rten
T02D2513:212b-42: du grags pa gsod pa ni zlog par mdzad pa
T02D2513:212b-43: ste / 'dul ba'i thabs dang bcas pas nyon mongs pa'i gnas las bzlog ste /
T02D2513:212b-44: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la 'jug par mdzad pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:212b-45: de la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:213a-0: @213a * // mi'u thung zhes bya ba ni mi thung gi khyad par dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2513:213a-1: 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor te nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2513:213a-2: de'i 'od zer de la mnga' bas na de skad ces bya ste /
T02D2513:213a-3: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po rab 'phro ba //
T02D2513:213a-5: rol pa'i stabs kyis padmar bzhugs//
T02D2513:213a-6: zhes bya ba la rol pa'i stang stabs kyis padma'i gdan la bzhugs pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:213a-7: shes rab mthar byed ces bya ba'i don gyis na
T02D2513:213a-8: padma'i steng na khyab 'jug chung ma dang bcas pa
T02D2513:213a-9: de'i steng na bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2513:213a-10: du bzhugs pa'o // rnam par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa'o//
T02D2513:213a-11: tshems kyis sgros kyang mnan zhes bya ba ni mche bas ma mchu'i sgros gnon par mdzad pa ste /
T02D2513:213a-12: zhal gsum las g-yon gyi zhal steng gi tshems kyis sgros mnan pa'o //
T02D2513:213a-13: sna tshogs rgyan gyis 'bar ba ste //
T02D2513:213a-14: zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa ni sgeg pa
T02D2513:213a-15: la sogs pas yan lag 'gyur bar byed pa'i gar
T02D2513:213a-16: stabs rnams dang ldan pas 'bar ba'o //
T02D2513:213a-17: spyi bo'i steng ni spyi gtsug go //
T02D2513:213a-18: dngos po bsgom byas na zhes bya ba ni rab
T02D2513:213a-19: tu dang zhing mos pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bsam
T02D2513:213a-20: pas bsgom pa'o // gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes
T02D2513:213a-21: bya ba la sogs pa la gdug pa thams cad
T02D2513:213a-22: zil gyis mnan pa gang gis kyang mi thub pas
T02D2513:213a-23: gzhan gyis mi thub pa ste /
T02D2513:213a-24: de nyid ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D2513:213a-25: dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:213a-26: spyan gsum pa zhes bya ba 'dir ldan zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D2513:213a-27: rol pa'i stabs kyis padmar zhugs //
T02D2513:213a-28: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:213a-29: de lta mod kyi padma mthar byed ces bya ba'i
T02D2513:213a-30: don gyi rjes su 'brangs nas padma'i steng na tshangs
T02D2513:213a-31: pa chung ma dang bcas pa de'i steng na bcom
T02D2513:213a-32: ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2513:213a-33: khro bo'i lta bas rtog par mdzad //
T02D2513:213a-35: khro gnyer bsnyer bas rab tu 'jigs //
T02D2513:213a-36: khro bo'i lta bas rab tu 'dzum //
T02D2513:213a-37: khro bo'i lta bas mnyam gzhag na //
T02D2513:213a-38: khams gsum dag kyang 'jigs par byed //
T02D2513:213a-39: ces bshad ba ni khro bo'i lta ba'i mtshan nyid de des gzigs par mdzad pas na /
T02D2513:213a-40: khro bo'i lta bas rtog mdzad pa //
T02D2513:213a-42: ljags ni bskyod mdzad la zhes bya ba ni ljags
T02D2513:213a-43: spyod par mdzad cing 'jigs pas na ljags ni skyod
T02D2513:213b-1: sangs rgyas gzugs ni mang po dag / ces bya
T02D2513:213b-2: ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sku du ma dag 'phro
T02D2513:213b-3: bar byed pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de
T02D2513:213b-6: nye bar mtshon pas na 'phro ba dang bsdu ba dang gnas pa dang brtan par bya'o //
T02D2513:213b-7: bsgoms byas nas zhes bya ba ni 'dir thun gsum du goms par bya'o zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2513:213b-8: rta mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la rab
T02D2513:213b-9: mchog tu gyur pa'i rta mchog thams cad 'joms par
T02D2513:213b-10: byed pa'i ngo bo nyid du dbu gsum gyi steng
T02D2513:213b-11: du 'jog par mdzad pas na rta mchog ste de
T02D2513:213b-12: nyid ni ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D2513:213b-13: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:213b-14: bgegs kyi gshed ces bya ba ni dngos grub ma lus pa'i bgegs su gyur pa 'joms pa'o //
T02D2513:213b-15: me yi dkyil 'khor bzhugs zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis bskor ba'o //
T02D2513:213b-16: autpala sngon po'i 'dab ma'i mdog / ces bya ba
T02D2513:213b-17: ni autpala sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu'i mdog dang
T02D2513:213b-18: gzi mdangs yod pas na de skad ces bya ba
T02D2513:213b-19: ste sku mdog sngon po zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2513:213b-20: // zhabs kyis bgegs ni mnan pa sta //
T02D2513:213b-21: zhes bya ba ni zhabs g-yon pas padma'i steng na
T02D2513:213b-22: tshogs kyi bdag po gnas pa gnon par mdzad pa
T02D2513:213b-23: gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:213b-24: gnyis pa padma'i steng na bzhugs //
T02D2513:213b-25: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi
T02D2513:213b-26: gnyis pa ste zhabs g-yas pa padma la 'jog par
T02D2513:213b-27: mdzad pas na bcom ldan 'das 'di yang rol pa'i
T02D2513:213b-28: stabs kyis padma la bzhugs par bsgom par bya'o zhes
T02D2513:213b-30: ye shes mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'o //
T02D2513:213b-31: bgegs thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2513:213b-32: bgegs thams cad rnam par gzhom pa ni rnam par
T02D2513:213b-33: 'jig pa ste / des rnam par rgyal ba mnga'
T02D2513:213b-34: bas na de skad ces bya ste de nyid ni
T02D2513:213b-36: de la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:213b-37: mig g-yon zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa yo pa'o //
T02D2513:213b-38: h'um gis snying ga'i phyogs kyang bkang //
T02D2513:213b-39: zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i phyogs na gnas pa'i yi ge h'um gi sgras lus khyab pa'o //
T02D2513:213b-40: mthing shun gyi ni mdog can te //
T02D2513:213b-41: zhes bya ba ni kha dog gzhan dang shin tu ma 'dres pa'i mthing gi mdog can no //
T02D2513:214a-1: ba rnams rnam pa thams cad du sdom pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:214a-2: bgegs kyi chu mjings [*mjing] zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2513:214a-3: pa la ma rig pa'i mun pas nye bar bsags
T02D2513:214a-4: pa'i sems kyi rgyun rnam par spyod bar mdzad pas
T02D2513:214a-5: bgegs kyi chu po'i mjings [*mjing] 'joms pa'o //
T02D2513:214a-6: spyan g-yo ba ni phyogs thams cad du legs par gzigs pa la brtson pa'o //
T02D2513:214a-7: de nyid nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pas na 'bar ba'o //
T02D2513:214a-8: chang pas bzung ste blta ba dang //
T02D2513:214a-9: zhes pa ni khu tshur dam du bcas pas dam du bzung ba'o //
T02D2513:214a-10: sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dus
T02D2513:214a-11: thams cad pa'i me tog sna tshogs pa chu las
T02D2513:214a-12: skyes pa dang thad las skyes pa'i mchog rnams khyad
T02D2513:214a-13: par du spel zhing bkod pas bcings shing dkris pa
T02D2513:214a-14: ste / des rtsa bar bcings pa'i cod pan gyi
T02D2513:214a-15: dbu rgyan rin po che las byas pa gang yin
T02D2513:214a-16: pa de la de skad ces bya la /
T02D2513:214a-17: de mnga' bas ni bcom ldan 'das mi g-yo mgon la yang de skad ces bya ste /
T02D2513:214a-18: dbu'i steng du dus thams cad pa'i me tog gi phreng bas dbu rgyan byas pa'o //
T02D2513:214a-20: zhes bya ba ni gdul bya rnams mos par byed
T02D2513:214a-21: pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o
T02D2513:214a-22: zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D2513:214a-23: de ltar zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du'o //
T02D2513:214a-24: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa gang
T02D2513:214a-25: dus thams cad du spyod lam rnam bzhir bsgom mo
T02D2513:214a-27: sgom par byed ces bya ba ni 'dir 'di ltar ro //
T02D2513:214a-28: bla na med pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:214a-29: la chos thams cad phyin ci ma logs par khor
T02D2513:214a-30: du chud pa ni byang chub pa'o //
T02D2513:214a-31: de las khyad par du gyur pa gzhan med pas de nyid ni bla na med pa'o //
T02D2513:214a-33: zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rgyun 'phags pa'i lam la rdzogs pas gnas pa ste /
T02D2513:214a-34: 'di dag gis ni byang chub rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan to //
T02D2513:214a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:214a-36: la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin
T02D2513:214a-37: byed pa ni sgrub pa po ma lus pa'i mngon
T02D2513:214a-38: par 'dod pa'i dngos grub stsol ba'i phyir sad par
T02D2513:214a-39: mdzad pa'o // de la mi g-yo ba ni mi 'gul ba'o //
T02D2513:214a-40: ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gang yin pa
T02D2513:214a-41: de la des rnam par bsgyings pa ni sems can
T02D2513:214a-42: ma lus pa'i don rdzogs par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2513:214b-0: @214b de rnam par rol pa mnga' bas na bcom
T02D2513:214b-1: ldan 'das mi g-yo ba la de skad ces bya
T02D2513:214b-3: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:214b-4: ming ni 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ste //
T02D2513:214b-7: zhes gsungs pas na 'dod pa ma lus pa'i bdag
T02D2513:214b-8: por gyur pas na mtshan de ltar bsgrags zhes tshig
T02D2513:214b-10: dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa'i //
T02D2513:214b-11: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i dbu
T02D2513:214b-12: rgyan gyi cod pan dang ldan pa ste gtso bo'i
T02D2513:214b-13: rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2513:214b-14: dpral bar khro gnyer bsdus mdzad pa //
T02D2513:214b-15: zhes bya ba ni dpral ba ni smin ma'i bar
T02D2513:214b-16: du khro gnyer bsdus par mdzad pa gang yin pa
T02D2513:214b-17: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:214b-18: 'bar ba ste zhes bya ba ni dngos po khyad par can dang ldan pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:214b-19: dkyil 'khor dmar po zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2513:214b-20: 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya ni 'og nas 'chad do //
T02D2513:214b-21: rol pa'i stabs ni rol pa'i stang stabs mdzad pa'o //
T02D2513:214b-22: 'og gi bgegs la sdang bar mdzad //
T02D2513:214b-23: ces bya ba ni 'og gi bgegs rnams skrag par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2513:214b-24: sangs rgyas spros pas kun du khyab //
T02D2513:214b-25: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi khro bas kun du 'khrigs pas lus la khyab pa'o //
T02D2513:214b-26: bla med ye shes thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2513:214b-27: zhes bya ba ni thams cad la mchog tu gyur pa'i ye shes thob pa'i don du'o //
T02D2513:214b-28: ting nge 'dzin bzang po zhes bya ba ni sems mchog tu rtse gcig pa thob bas so //
T02D2513:214b-29: snying po thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:214b-30: la sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs
T02D2513:214b-31: thams cad kyi snying po ni gnyis su med pa'i
T02D2513:214b-32: ye shes so // de thams cad nas 'gugs pa ni 'dren pa'o //
T02D2513:214b-33: de rnam par rgyal ba sta gdug pa rnams zil
T02D2513:214b-34: gyis gnon pa'i mtshan nyid mnga' bas na de skad
T02D2513:214b-35: ces bya'o // de nyid ye shes rdo rje ste //
T02D2513:214b-36: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:214b-37: sku ni sprin sngon 'dra ba ste //
T02D2513:214b-38: zhes bya ba na sku sprin sngon po dang 'dra
T02D2513:214b-39: bar sngo ba mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o
T02D2513:214b-40: // dbu rgyan la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs //
T02D2513:214b-41: zhes bya ba ni cod pan la mi bskyod pa 'jog pa'o //
T02D2513:214b-42: rol stabs mdzad ces bya ba ni rol pa'i stang stabs mdzad pa'o //
T02D2513:214b-43: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2513:215a-0: @215a * // sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis bskul ba'i //
T02D2513:215a-1: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sbyor ba'o //
T02D2513:215a-2: de'i ye shes ni 'khyud pa la sogs pa ste
T02D2513:215a-3: gnas skabs der ci rigs par rigs lngar bzhugs pa'i
T02D2513:215a-4: lha thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba rnam par
T02D2513:215a-6: des bskul bar so sor rig pas rab tu dga'
T02D2513:215a-7: ba'i bdag nyid can bdag gir mdzad ces bya ba'i
T02D2513:215a-8: bar du'o // gzhan dag ni lha dang gnyis su
T02D2513:215a-9: med pa'i nga rgyal gyi bdag nyid can gyi sbyor
T02D2513:215a-10: ba bsgom pa ni ye shes kyis bskul ba'o zhes
T02D2513:215a-11: bar du'o // 'dod do // bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D2513:215a-12: dbang bdag brdeg pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dbang bdag ni lha chen po'o //
T02D2513:215a-13: de la brdeg pa ston par gyur pa la sogs
T02D2513:215a-14: pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal gsal bar mdzad pa ste
T02D2513:215a-15: / de'i ye shes gang yin pa de rnam par
T02D2513:215a-16: rgyal ba 'di la mnga' bas dbyig sngon la de
T02D2513:215a-17: skad ces bya ste de nyid rdo rje'o //
T02D2513:215a-18: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don bshad zin to //
T02D2513:215a-19: mig dmar skra 'bar gyen du brdzes //
T02D2513:215a-20: zhes pa ni mig dmar po mnga' bas na mig dmar ro //
T02D2513:215a-21: yang de nyid ni dbu skra 'bar zhing 'od dang
T02D2513:215a-22: ldan pas gyen du brdzes pa gang la mnga' ba
T02D2513:215a-23: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:215a-25: zhes bya ba ni padma'i gdan gyi steng na khro
T02D2513:215a-26: bo'i nga rgyal gyis stang stabs dang bcas pas bzhugs
T02D2513:215a-27: pa'o // dran po ni drag po'i las mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:215a-28: tsham dam bcas pas gtor zhes bya ba ni tsam
T02D2513:215a-29: ngam dang bcas shing rol pa'i stang stabs zhes bya
T02D2513:215a-30: ba dang khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis bzhugs pas tsham
T02D2513:215a-31: dam bcas zhes bya ste stang stabs des bgegs rnam
T02D2513:215a-32: 'thor zhing skrod par byed pa bskyed pas de skad
T02D2513:215a-33: ces bya'o // phyogs bcu'i zhes bya ba ni rang rang gi phyogs su'o //
T02D2513:215a-34: 'bar ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor //
T02D2513:215a-35: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:215a-36: sprin zhes bya ba ni 'dir ldan pa'i tshig tu shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:215a-37: sgom pa'i mchog gis zhes bya ba sgom pa'i mchog thob pas so //
T02D2513:215a-38: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni 'dir de bzhin du bsgom pa'o //
T02D2513:215b-0: 'chol ba zhes bya ba la 'chol @215b ba'i rgyud
T02D2513:215b-1: las bshad pa'i kun du spyod pa la ni 'chol
T02D2513:215b-2: ba zhes bya ba'i sgrar brjod do //
T02D2513:215b-3: de'i ye shes ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar rtogs pa'o //
T02D2513:215b-4: de'i stobs ni thogs pa med pa'i nus pa'o //
T02D2513:215b-5: des rnam par rgyal ba ni de dang 'dra bas
T02D2513:215b-6: rjes su 'gro ba'i sems can med pas na khro
T02D2513:215b-7: bo stobs po che la de skad ces bya ste
T02D2513:215b-9: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:215b-10: sku gsum ldan pa zhes bya ba ni sku gsum
T02D2513:215b-11: gyi bdag nyid can sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo
T02D2513:215b-12: rje'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas de skad ces
T02D2513:215b-13: bya ste / thams cad la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:215b-14: 'od bzang ba zhes bya ba ni 'od dmar po'o //
T02D2513:215b-15: 'od ma gang 'od kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D2513:215b-16: zhes bya ba ni kun nas 'od zer mdog gang gis sku rab tu mdzes pa'o //
T02D2513:215b-17: ngos na lha mo rab bzhugs pa //
T02D2513:215b-18: zhes bya ba ni ngos gnyis na gsang ba chen
T02D2513:215b-19: po'i de kho na nyid lnga'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o
T02D2513:215b-20: // rigs kyi yum ni bzhi po rnams //
T02D2513:215b-21: zhes bya ba ni la la ni rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa yin par 'dod la /
T02D2513:215b-22: gzhan dag ni spyan la sogs pa yin no zhes
T02D2513:215b-23: zer mod kyi de gnyis las phyogs snga ma ni
T02D2513:215b-24: mi rigs so // de dang ldan zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D2513:215b-25: phyag rgya 'di dag kyang gang gi phyir sngar bshad
T02D2513:215b-26: mod kyi 'on kyang bskyed pa'i rim pa la dgongs
T02D2513:215b-27: pa nyid kyis na gtso bo nyid du bstan pa'i
T02D2513:215b-28: phyir yang phyag rgya 'di dag nye bar dgod pa
T02D2513:215b-30: rjes chags zhes bya ba ni rjes su dgyes pa'i bdag nyid can yin pas so //
T02D2513:215b-31: spros bcas dga' ston yin zhes bya ba ni 'khor
T02D2513:215b-32: los sgyur ba'i spro ba dang bcas pa'i dga' ston
T02D2513:215b-33: te / kun du dga' ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:215b-34: 'dir lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02D2513:215b-35: gtsug tor 'od zer lnga pa can //
T02D2513:215b-36: zhes bya ba ni 'dir de nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:215b-37: kun du 'khor lo'i phreng bar ldan //
T02D2513:215b-38: zhes bya / ba ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du'o //
T02D2513:215b-39: 'khor lo'i bar na rdo rje gnas //
T02D2513:215b-40: 'od zer phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02D2513:215b-41: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phreng ba'i nang du
T02D2513:215b-42: 'od kyi 'khor byas pas rjes su 'brel ba'i rdo
T02D2513:215b-43: rje phreng ba'i 'od zer gyi rnam pa can pas
T02D2513:216a-0: brgyan pa ste / nye bar mtshon pa 'dis na de'i nang du rin po che dang @216a * //
T02D2513:216a-2: autpala'i phreng bas kyang brgyan par shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:216a-3: byang chub snying po don gnyer ba //
T02D2513:216a-4: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi snying po mngon par 'dod pas so //
T02D2513:216a-5: 'dod pa thob ces bya ba ni 'jig rten dang
T02D2513:216a-6: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams
T02D2513:216a-7: cad byed do // byang chub snying po zhes bya
T02D2513:216a-8: ba la sogs pa la byang chub kyi snying po
T02D2513:216a-9: ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2513:216a-10: des gdul bya'i skye bo'i bsam pa rnam pa thams
T02D2513:216a-11: cad du rdzogs par byed cing brgyan pa dang spud
T02D2513:216a-12: par mdzad pas na byang chub kyi snying po thams
T02D2513:216a-13: cad kyis brgyan pa ste 'khor los sgyur pa'o //
T02D2513:216a-14: de nyid kyi ye shes na 'khor lo'i ngo bo
T02D2513:216a-15: nyid yin pas na ye shes 'khor lo'i rdo rje'o
T02D2513:216a-16: // dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:216a-17: gong du de dag la brten nas ting nge 'dzin
T02D2513:216a-18: gyi khyad par las nges par 'byung pa'i gsang sngags
T02D2513:216a-19: bye ba phrag du ma gsungs so zhes bya ba'i
T02D2513:216a-20: don de nyid rim bzhin du bstan pa yin te
T02D2513:216a-21: gsang sngags dam pa'i tshogs dang lha rnams tha mi
T02D2513:216a-22: dad par gzhag pa yin pas ci rigs par bsgrub
T02D2513:216a-23: pa'i phyir 'khor los sgyur ba dang por nye bar
T02D2513:216a-25: sku gsum zhes bya ba ni rang dang rjes su
T02D2513:216a-26: mthun pa'i sku gsum dang ldan pas na de skad
T02D2513:216a-27: ces gsungs so // b'i dza p'u ra ne'u le can //
T02D2513:216a-28: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pa na b'i dza p'u ra'o //
T02D2513:216a-30: ngos la rgyan rnams thams cad kyis //
T02D2513:216a-31: brgyan pa'i gnod spyin mo bzhi dag / ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2513:216a-32: gzhan dag ni 'di dag phyogs rnam pa bzhi na gnas so zhes zer ro //
T02D2513:216a-33: rdo rje bdud rtsi lag nas pas //
T02D2513:216a-35: a'a: dang h'um las byung ba yi //
T02D2513:216a-36: zla ba rdo rje lag par bsam //
T02D2513:216a-37: yi ge aom las gdu bu ni //
T02D2513:216a-38: ser po mkhrig mar bsam par bya //
T02D2513:216a-39: bam ni zla ba'i mdog 'dra ba //
T02D2513:216a-40: de las bdud rtsi'i char rab 'bab //
T02D2513:216a-41: dri med ser mor mngon phyogs pa /
T02D2513:216a-42: mkhas pas bum pa bzhin du blta //
T02D2513:216a-43: mdzub mo la ni nor bu bzang //
T02D2513:216a-44: rdzogs bzangs zhes bya gung mo la //
T02D2513:216a-45: srin lag la ni nor spyin te //
T02D2513:216a-46: nor spyin chen po mthe'u chung la //
T02D2513:216a-47: mthe bong bi tsi kunda li //
T02D2513:216a-48: ki li ma li mkhrig mar te //
T02D2513:216b-0: sgo dbang spyod pa'i dbang po dag / lag @216b pa'i ngos la rnam par bsam //
T02D2513:216b-1: sngags pas gnod gnas chu dbang ni //
T02D2513:216b-2: lag pa'i dbus su rnam par bsam //
T02D2513:216b-3: dris bsgos lag pa'i dbus su ni //
T02D2513:216b-4: rang rang sngags kyis rim bzhin bsam //
T02D2513:216b-5: dang por yi ge aom dang ni //
T02D2513:216b-7: bzhi yi mtha' dang de 'og tu //
T02D2513:216b-8: sv'a h'ar bcas pa sngags su bsgrags //
T02D2513:216b-9: rdo rje bdud rtsi lag par bsam //
T02D2513:216b-10: 'di ltar spyi bor cho ga bzhin //
T02D2513:216b-11: mkhas pas chu yi spyin blugs brgya //
T02D2513:216b-12: nyin re zhing ni legs par dbul //
T02D2513:216b-13: rin po che zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2513:216b-14: rin po che ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu la
T02D2513:216b-15: sogs pa'o // spyin pa ni sems can thams cad
T02D2513:216b-16: la stobs pa ste de lta bu'i rin po che'i
T02D2513:216b-17: char 'bebs pas na de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:216b-18: de nyid spyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu
T02D2513:216b-19: phyin pa'i ye shes kyi sprin dang ldan pas na
T02D2513:216b-20: / snon gnas pa la ye shes kyi sprin zhes bya ste de nyid rdo rje'o //
T02D2513:216b-21: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:216b-22: rta bdun ldan pa'i shing rtar zhugs //
T02D2513:216b-23: zhes bya ba ni rta bdun gshibs pa'i shing rta la gnas pa'o //
T02D2513:216b-25: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las byung
T02D2513:216b-26: pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs
T02D2513:216b-27: su rgyas pa'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D2513:216b-28: phyogs bcu bsrung par brtson pa ste //
T02D2513:216b-29: zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i gdug
T02D2513:216b-30: pa rnams las bsrung pa'i phyir brtson zhing rab tu
T02D2513:216b-32: mig dang kha ni 'drub par byed //
T02D2513:216b-33: ces bya ba ni gdug pa rnams kyi mig dang
T02D2513:216b-34: kha 'drub par mdzad par bsgom par bya ste snga
T02D2513:216b-35: ma bzhin no // nye par spyod pa rnams spangs te //
T02D2513:216b-36: zhes bya ba ni mi bden pa'i rnam par rtog
T02D2513:216b-37: pa bsal la rnam pa thams cad du lha mo
T02D2513:216b-39: h'um mdzad ces bya ba ni yi ge h'um gi skra legs par sgrogs pa la brtson pa'o //
T02D2513:216b-40: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni 'od zer can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
T02D2513:216b-41: dbang du zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa de nyid kyis so //
T02D2513:216b-42: sdang ba thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:216b-43: la sdang ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs par byed
T02D2513:216b-44: pa ni gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa ste lha
T02D2513:216b-46: de nyid ni thogs pa med cing mchog tu gyur
T02D2513:216b-47: pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas na ye shes kyi
T02D2513:217a-2: dmigs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:217a-3: de steng kha dog lnga po dag //
T02D2513:217a-4: rab tu 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs //
T02D2513:217a-5: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te kha dog ser po la sogs pa'o //
T02D2513:217a-6: slar yang de la kha dog lnga'i //
T02D2513:217a-7: sangs rgyas bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs mdzad //
T02D2513:217a-8: ces bya ba ni khro bo'i 'od 'bar bas gdon
T02D2513:217a-9: bsal pa'i sems can la rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu'i
T02D2513:217a-10: bum pa phyag gnyis kyis 'dzin pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2513:217a-11: pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo zhes sbyar
T02D2513:217a-12: ro // nad thams cad ces bya ba la sogs
T02D2513:217a-13: pa la nad thams cad ni rims la sogs pa'o
T02D2513:217a-14: ro // // nye par zhi ba ni bsal ba
T02D2513:217a-15: ste de nus pa'i ye shes thogs pa med pa
T02D2513:217a-16: gang yin pa ste de'i ngo bo nyid du gyur
T02D2513:217a-17: pas na ri khrod kyi shing lo can la yang
T02D2513:217a-19: de nyid ni rdo rje 'bar pa'i gzugs can te mi bzad pa'i srung ba'o //
T02D2513:217a-20: de la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:217a-21: sprul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka rgyas //
T02D2513:217a-22: zhes bya ba ni sprul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka
T02D2513:217a-23: cod phan gyi steng du 'jogs pas rgyas shing khyad
T02D2513:217a-24: par gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D2513:217a-25: // de nyid ni nor bu 'bar bas brgyan pa
T02D2513:217a-26: ste zhes bya ba ni sprul mgo rnams kyi steng
T02D2513:217a-27: na 'od 'bar ba de'i dbus na gnas pa'i nor
T02D2513:217a-28: bu las byung pa'i 'od zer mdzes pas 'bar pa'i
T02D2513:217a-29: nor bus rnam par brgyan pa'o //
T02D2513:217a-31: zhes bya ba ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar pa'o //
T02D2513:217a-33: zhes bya ba ni rab tu 'phro ba'i 'ja' 'dra
T02D2513:217a-34: pa'i ye shes kyi phreng ba gang la yod pa
T02D2513:217a-35: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:217a-36: kun nas 'bar ba rnams kyis khebs //
T02D2513:217a-37: zhes bya ba ni 'bar pa'i tshogs kyis khebs pa'o //
T02D2513:217a-38: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de
T02D2513:217a-39: ltar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan 'phro
T02D2513:217a-40: pa phyag gi padma gnyis kyis yi ge bam las
T02D2513:217a-41: byung pa'i bum pa bdud rtsi'i chu sa yongs su
T02D2513:217a-42: gang ba'i zla ba'i mdog ltar dkar pa thogs par
T02D2513:217a-43: bsgom mo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2513:217a-44: kha ni dza yis rnam brgyan pa //
T02D2513:217a-45: zhes bya ba ni bum pa de yi ge dzas
T02D2513:217a-46: kha nye par mdzes par byas par bsgom mo zhes
T02D2513:217b-0: sbyar ro // @217b la la ni dug gis brgyal par bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02D2513:217b-1: dug gis phog pa rnams la ldungs //
T02D2513:217b-2: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas de rnams 'dod chags
T02D2513:217b-3: la sogs pa'i dug gis brgyal pa'i sems can rnams
T02D2513:217b-4: la ldugs par mdzad par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2513:217b-5: dug gis phog pa rnams la zhes bya ba ni dug med par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:217b-6: de ltar bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni dug sel ma'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D2513:217b-7: nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2513:217b-8: nyon mongs pa thams cad ni 'dod chags la sogs
T02D2513:217b-9: pa'o // de dag nyid thams cad ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
T02D2513:217b-10: de dag nyid thabs med par bsten na 'bras bu
T02D2513:217b-11: yid du mi 'ong pa 'byin pas na dug ste
T02D2513:217b-12: de nye par 'joms par mdzad pas na dug sel
T02D2513:217b-14: de nyid gdengs ka'i dbang po ste klu rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa'o //
T02D2513:217b-15: de nyid gzhig par mi nus pa dang mi ldog pa'i phyir rdo rje ye shes so //
T02D2513:217b-16: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:217b-17: thor tshugs rgyal pa'i sku gzugs bzhugs //
T02D2513:217b-18: zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i sku
T02D2513:217b-19: ni rgyal pa'i sku ste de thor tshugs kyi dbus
T02D2513:217b-20: na bzhugs pa gang yin pa de la de skad
T02D2513:217b-21: ces bya'o // padma dkar po lta bur snang //
T02D2513:217b-22: zhes bya ba ni padma dag pa dang 'dra pa'o //
T02D2513:217b-23: nyams sems stobs ldan zhes bya ba ni gar stabs kyi ro'i nyams dang nye par ldan pa'o //
T02D2513:217b-24: bgrang nor phreng ba can zhes bya ba ni bgrang phreng dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2513:217b-25: rol pa'i stangs stabs zhes bya ba ni rol pa dang bcas pas so //
T02D2513:217b-26: rin chen ri phug nang bzhugs pa //
T02D2513:217b-27: zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i ri phug gi dbus na bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2513:217b-28: rnal 'byor sems pas zhes bya ba ni ha la
T02D2513:217b-29: ha la'i thabs dang shes rab sgom par byed pas
T02D2513:217b-30: so // rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2513:217b-31: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings ji lta ba
T02D2513:217b-32: bzhin du gnas pa la lhag par mos pas yang
T02D2513:217b-33: dag ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa bsal pa'i
T02D2513:217b-35: nang gi bzlas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:217b-36: la bsam gtan gyi bzlas pas sngags zlos pa ste
T02D2513:217b-37: / gcig dang gnyis dang gsum la sogs pa'i gzugs 'phro bas bsgom pa ni ma yin no //
T02D2513:217b-38: 'dod pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:217b-39: la 'dod pa thams cad ni yongs su dag pa'i
T02D2513:218a-1: rab tu bsgrub pa ni sgrub pa po'i rgyud la
T02D2513:218a-2: rdzogs par mdzad pas na 'dod pa thams cad rab
T02D2513:218a-3: tu sgrub pa'o // de nyid ni ha la ha la 'di yin pas ni de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:218a-4: de nyid ni gdul bya'i skye bo ma lus pa'i
T02D2513:218a-5: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dug 'joms pa nyid kyis
T02D2513:218a-6: thogs pa med pa'i shin tu sim pa'i ye shes
T02D2513:218a-7: dang ldan pas na yongs su mnyes par byed pa
T02D2513:218a-9: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:218a-10: srin mo zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:218a-11: thor tshugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la thor
T02D2513:218a-12: tshugs dang cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i spyi bo de
T02D2513:218a-13: nyid la mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa zhes bya ba
T02D2513:218a-14: ni de nyid kyi mgo la mi bskyod pa bzhugs
T02D2513:218a-15: pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D2513:218a-16: // lag na khrag gis bkang pa'i thod pa thogs
T02D2513:218a-17: ba zhes bya ba ni mi'i khrag gis yongs su
T02D2513:218a-18: bkang pa'i mi'i thod pa lag pa g-yas kyi dang
T02D2513:218a-19: po la thogs pa gang yin pa de la de
T02D2513:218a-20: // skad ces bya'o // g-yon pa gcig gis ni sdigs mdzub byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2513:218a-21: rol pa'i stabs kyis zhes bya ba ni rol pa'i stang stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2513:218a-22: 'di lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2513:218a-23: bshad ma thag pa'i bzlas pa dang sgom pa 'di
T02D2513:218a-24: lta bu dang ldan pas so //
T02D2513:218a-25: h'um gis h'um mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni khro
T02D2513:218a-26: bo la zhen pa'i h'um sgra sgrogs par brtson pa'o
T02D2513:218a-27: // sems can kun don phun tshogs pa'i //
T02D2513:218a-28: zhes bya ba ni spyin pa la sogs pas sems
T02D2513:218a-29: can thams cad kyi don bya ba'i phyir nye par
T02D2513:218a-30: bsags pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs phun
T02D2513:218a-31: sum tshogs pa'i rgyu dang yang dag par ldan pas
T02D2513:218a-32: so // sems can thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la sems can thams cad de /
T02D2513:218a-33: gdug pa rnams gsod pa'i mchog yin la /
T02D2513:218a-34: de nyid kyis na rab ste pad dkar ma'o //
T02D2513:218a-35: de nyid ni byang chub kyi snying por bdud bzhi
T02D2513:218a-36: las rnam par rgyal pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2513:218a-37: stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na byang
T02D2513:218a-38: chub kyi snying po rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs zhes
T02D2513:218a-39: bya'o // dmigs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:218a-40: phyed zur pa ni rnam par rol //
T02D2513:218a-41: ces bya ba ni g-yon logs dpag bsam gyi shing la brten pas rten pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2513:218b-0: 'jam @218b pa'i khro bo rdo rje yis //
T02D2513:218b-1: zhes bya ba ni gshin rje gshed kyis so //
T02D2513:218b-2: de yis mgo ni mnan nas bzhugs //
T02D2513:218b-3: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang po 'jam dpal gyi sbyor pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2513:218b-4: gnod spyin mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2513:218b-5: gnod spyin mo thams cad kyi sgrub pa ni rang
T02D2513:218b-6: dbang du bya ba nyid rdzogs par byed pa ste
T02D2513:218b-7: / de la mchog tu gyur pa ni 'jam dpal rang gi khro bo dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2513:218b-8: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:218b-9: yi ge gsum pa mig gsum gzugs //
T02D2513:218b-10: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i yi ge gsum gyi gzugs can no //
T02D2513:218b-12: khyab 'jug lha chen mes po che //
T02D2513:218b-13: zhes bya ba ste khyab 'jug ni nor lha'o //
T02D2513:218b-14: lha chen po ni bde byed do //
T02D2513:218b-15: mes po chen po ni tshangs pa'o //
T02D2513:218b-16: rang gi mtshon thogs la zhes bya ba ni mtshon
T02D2513:218b-17: cha thogs pa ni nye par mtshon pa tsam ste
T02D2513:218b-18: de la khyab 'jug ni mdog sngon po lag pa
T02D2513:218b-19: bzhi pa / g-yas dang g-yon na dbyug pa dang rdo rje dang /
T02D2513:218b-20: dung dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa nam mkha' lding la zhon pa'o //
T02D2513:218b-21: lha chen po ni shel gyi mdog can mgrin pa sngo ba /
T02D2513:218b-23: stag gi pags pa gyon pa //
T02D2513:218b-26: g-yas na mdung rtse gsum pa dang rdo rje dang ta ma ru thogs pa ;
T02D2513:218b-27: g-yon gnyis na kha tv'am ga dang thod pa khrag
T02D2513:218b-28: gis bkang ba thogs pa cig gis au ma la
T02D2513:218b-29: 'khyud pa khyu mchog la zhon pa'o //
T02D2513:218b-30: tshangs pa ni mdog ser po lag pa bzhi pa
T02D2513:218b-31: g-yas na rdo rje dang phreng ba dang g-yon na
T02D2513:218b-32: dbyig pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang dad pa
T02D2513:218b-33: la zhon pa ste de dag kyang rin po che'i
T02D2513:218b-35: rdo rje'i ting 'dzin bsgom nas ni //
T02D2513:218b-36: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pas so //
T02D2513:218b-37: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis bskul na //
T02D2513:218b-38: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal
T02D2513:218b-39: 'byor pas 'dod pa'i rgyal pos lha chen po la
T02D2513:218b-40: sogs pa gang yang rung ba bkug nas khro bo
T02D2513:218b-41: ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2513:218b-42: rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che //
T02D2513:218b-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i spyi'i dam tshig bsgom
T02D2513:218b-44: zhing khyad par gyi dam tshig ji lta pa yang
T02D2513:218b-45: bstan nas mngon par 'dod pa'i las grub par gyis
T02D2513:218b-46: shig ces bskul pa byas la /
T02D2513:219a-0: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas kyang sdigs mdzub byas nas bsgrubs na @219a * //
T02D2513:219a-1: 'jigs pas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2513:219a-2: 'jig rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jig
T02D2513:219a-3: rten thams cad kyi lha rnams sgrub par byed pas
T02D2513:219a-4: spun gsum la 'di skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:219a-5: de nyid kyis na mig gsum pa //
T02D2513:219a-6: zhes bya ba la lha chen po'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par rol pa ni rnam par brtse ba'o //
T02D2513:219a-7: ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i thogs pa med par shes pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2513:219a-8: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:219a-9: dkyil 'khor la ma gtogs pa'i lha cung zad tsam zhig bstan nas /
T02D2513:219a-10: da ni 'dir ma gtogs pa gzhan dag kyang bstan
T02D2513:219a-11: pa'i phyir gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:219a-12: gsungs so // gsang sngags zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags kyi skyes bu ste /
T02D2513:219a-14: sa bon gang yin pa sbyar byas te zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2513:219a-15: rdo rje'i yig 'bru rnams bsgoms pas //
T02D2513:219a-16: zhes bya ba ni rgyud kyi nang na rab tu
T02D2513:219a-17: grags pas rang rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge'am
T02D2513:219a-18: ming gi dang po'i yi ge dang de bzhin du
T02D2513:219a-20: 'phrog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'phrog
T02D2513:219a-21: ma ni yi ge ha las skyes pa bu lnga
T02D2513:219a-22: brgyas yongs su bskor pa rnam par bsams na 'grub
T02D2513:219a-23: par 'gyur ro // dpa' can yang zhes bya ba
T02D2513:219a-24: ni dpa' can la sogs pa gnod spyin mo lnga
T02D2513:219a-26: ting nge 'dzin rab tu ston pa'i gzhung gi le'u
T02D2513:219a-27: la ting nge 'dzin rim par phye ba zhes bya
T02D2513:219a-31: // / ting nge 'dzin yongs su shes pas rang gi
T02D2513:219a-32: bstan pa la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la phan
T02D2513:219a-33: pa'i gsang sngags kyi mthu bstan par bya dgos pas
T02D2513:219a-34: na de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas le'u
T02D2513:219a-35: lnga pa gsang sngags kyi ye shes rnam par bsgyings
T02D2513:219a-36: pa'i rim par phye ba gsungs te /
T02D2513:219a-37: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2513:219a-39: zhi la rdul dang bral pa'i mchog / ces bya
T02D2513:219a-40: ba gsungs te 'dod chags la sogs pa nye par
T02D2513:219a-42: des rdul dang bral pa ni rnyog pa dang bral pa ste /
T02D2513:219a-43: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2513:219b-0: de'i mchog ni dam tshig gi phyag rgyar gyur pa nyid de yum sangs @219b rgyas spyan no //
T02D2513:219b-1: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:219b-2: de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni mngon sum du
T02D2513:219b-3: mdzad pa ste spyan gyi gsang sngags ston pa'i rnam
T02D2513:219b-4: par thugs rtsi gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i don
T02D2513:219b-5: to // gsang sngags ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams
T02D2513:219b-6: cad la yang lha de'i gsang sngags ston pa'i rnam
T02D2513:219b-7: par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad par shes par bya'o
T02D2513:219b-8: to // // ting nge 'dzin la dmigs par mdzad pas ni 'di skad ston te /
T02D2513:219b-9: mtshan ma thob pa nyid kyis zhi ba la sogs
T02D2513:219b-10: pa'i las la gsang sngags rab tu sbyar par bya'o
T02D2513:219b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum zhes bya
T02D2513:219b-13: ba ni rigs de'i yum du gyur pa'i phyir ro
T02D2513:219b-14: // ye shes skyed par mdzad pas sna tshogs pa'i
T02D2513:219b-15: las kyi bya ba mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D2513:219b-16: ye shes skyed par mdzad pas sems can gyi khams
T02D2513:219b-17: sna tshogs shing ma lus pa'i las mdzad pa nyid
T02D2513:219b-18: kyis na mngon par 'dod pa'i bya ba rdzogs par
T02D2513:219b-20: las kun rab tu rdzogs mdzad pas //
T02D2513:219b-21: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams sgrub par mdzad pas so //
T02D2513:219b-22: dgyes pa ni sems can gyi khams thams cad bde par byas par gzigs pas dgyes pa'o //
T02D2513:219b-23: bdud kyi dpung rnams 'dar gyur te //
T02D2513:219b-24: zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams 'joms par byed pa'i bdud kyi sde rnams g-yos pa'o //
T02D2513:219b-25: sangs rgyas rdo rjes dran byed //
T02D2513:219b-26: ces bya ba ni rang nyid la yongs su skyob
T02D2513:219b-27: pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad rjes su dran par
T02D2513:219b-28: gyur pa'o // 'di'i 'og ma rnams la yang so
T02D2513:219b-29: sor sngags brjod pa na rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D2513:219b-30: sogs pa rjes su dran pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2513:219b-31: du don 'di nyid kyis bsgre par bya'o //
T02D2513:219b-32: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin no //
T02D2513:219b-33: rigs kyi bdag pos byas pa'i 'tsho pa nye par
T02D2513:219b-34: zhi par bya ba la ni rigs kyi yum gyi
T02D2513:219b-35: gsang sngags dran par bya zhing bsgom mo zhes shes
T02D2513:219b-36: par bya'o // sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi bskyed yum //
T02D2513:219b-37: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams dang 'brel pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi zhi ba bskyed pa'am /
T02D2513:219b-38: yang na gal te sgrub pa po zhi ba byed
T02D2513:219b-39: kyang sngags pa gzhan gyis phur bus btab pas sgrub
T02D2513:220a-0: pa po la bya pa'i dngos grub mi stsol @220a
T02D2513:220a-2: de'i tshe shes par byas nas de rnams kyi gzugs brnyan byas la phur bus btab ste /
T02D2513:220a-3: slar phyung nas sangs rgyas spyan gyi gsang sngags bzlas
T02D2513:220a-4: pa'i 'o mas bkrus na de'i tshe de rnams zhi
T02D2513:220a-5: bar 'gyur ro // de nas de'i mngon par 'dod
T02D2513:220a-6: pa'i dngos grub stsol par 'gyur bsam 'di la ni
T02D2513:220a-7: bar 'gyur ro // / sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi bskyed yum //
T02D2513:220a-9: 'di dag kyang nges par shes par bya ba ni
T02D2513:220a-10: gzhan gyis bkrir mi rung ba la sogs pa'i sgrub
T02D2513:220a-11: pa po'i dbang du byas pa yin te /
T02D2513:220a-12: ting nge 'dzin thob pas dgug pa la sogs pa
T02D2513:220a-13: la 'jog pa'i tshul dang 'dra par shes par bya'o
T02D2513:220a-14: // rdo rje dam tshig gis bskul na //
T02D2513:220a-15: zhes bya ba ni nges par bskul ba'o //
T02D2513:220a-16: ma grub rnams la grub par stsol //
T02D2513:220a-17: zhes bya ba ni dngos grub ma grub pa rnams la dngos grub stsol par mdzad pa'o //
