T02D2513:223a-32: ces bya'o // char pa che na gcod 'gyur la //
T02D2513:223a-33: zhes bya ba ni khro bo stobs po che'i rnal
T02D2513:223a-34: 'byor gyis nam mkha' la gnas pa'i chu'i tshogs rnams
T02D2513:223a-35: 'thungs par lhag par mos nas mtshon cha phyag rgyas
T02D2513:223a-37: char pa chung na rab tu 'bebs //
T02D2513:223a-38: zhes bya ba yang sbyor ba 'di nyid nas bshad do //
T02D2513:223a-39: kun du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la kun
T02D2513:223a-40: nas thams cad du 'bar bas snying por byas pas
T02D2513:223a-41: bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i rgyal po la de skad
T02D2513:223a-42: ces bya ste de la dmigs pas na de skad
T02D2513:223b-0: ces bya'o // @223b rkang g-yas zhes bya ba la
T02D2513:223b-1: sogs pa la rkang pa g-yas pa'i mthil du zla
T02D2513:223b-2: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'og tu yi ge aa las
T02D2513:223b-3: sna tshogs rdo rje de'i yang 'og tu yi ge
T02D2513:223b-4: dza: las rdo rje lcags kyu kha thur du bltas
T02D2513:223b-5: pa rnam par bsams la mtshan de bsgrub par bya
T02D2513:223b-6: ba'i gzugs brnyan mnan no zhes bya bar sbyar ro
T02D2513:223b-7: ces bya'o // // sku gsum ye shes stobs ldan pas //
T02D2513:223b-8: zhes bya ba ni sku gsum gyi ye shes byin
T02D2513:223b-9: gyis brlabs la khro ba dang bcas pas g-yon phyogs
T02D2513:223b-10: su lus cung zad 'dud par bya'o //
T02D2513:223b-11: khro gnyer rim par bsnyer byas te //
T02D2513:223b-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dpral ba bskul ba byas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:223b-13: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo
T02D2513:223b-14: rje ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i ye shes ni gdug
T02D2513:223b-15: pa rnams 'dul ba'i thabs kyi ye shes te des
T02D2513:223b-16: rab tu 'bar bas gtum por gyur pa ste khro
T02D2513:223b-18: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:223b-19: gtso bo zhes bya ba ni 'dir dran zhes bya ba dang rjes su sbyar ro //
T02D2513:223b-20: dgug byed cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2513:223b-21: sku gsum gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2513:223b-22: 'di ni rtag tu sku gsung thugs mi zad pa'i
T02D2513:223b-23: ye shes kyi mthar thug pa yin pas na sku
T02D2513:223b-24: gsum rdo rje'i ye shes so //
T02D2513:223b-25: de nyid h'um bzhis bsnyen par dka' ba'i ngo bo nyid pas na 'bar ba'o //
T02D2513:223b-26: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thabs dang
T02D2513:223b-27: shes rab kyi khro bo'i gzugs kyis srid pa gsum
T02D2513:223b-28: po ma lus pa'i bdag por gyur cing mi shes
T02D2513:223b-29: pa'i bud shing rnams bsregs pas na 'bar ba'i rdo
T02D2513:223b-30: rje'o // de nyid bgegs rnams 'jig cing rnyog par byed pas na 'jigs pa chen po ste /
T02D2513:223b-31: bcom ldan 'das gnod mdzes la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:223b-32: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:223b-33: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sku mdog nag po zhal
T02D2513:223b-34: g-yas dkar g-yon dmar pa phyag gnyis 'jig rten gsum
T02D2513:223b-35: las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba /
T02D2513:223b-36: g-yas gnyis na rdo rje dang 'khor lo bsnams pa
T02D2513:223b-37: g-yon gnyis na lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa
T02D2513:223b-38: / mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can g-yon brkyang pas
T02D2513:223b-39: bzhugs pa yi ge h'um las byung bar shes par
T02D2513:224a-2: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D2513:224a-3: ye shes kyis 'joms zhes bya ba ni rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes dang bral ba'o //
T02D2513:224a-4: lcags kyu yis ni rnam dral te //
T02D2513:224a-5: zhes bya ba ni snying gar ro //
T02D2513:224a-6: rdo rje zhags pas bcings nas su //
T02D2513:224a-9: gnod mdzes kyi rnal 'byor pas rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste /
T02D2513:224a-10: nam mkha'i dbyings na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2513:224a-11: thams cad lcags kyu dang zhags pa ji lta ba
T02D2513:224a-12: bzhin du bsnams pa'i gnod mdzes kyi sbyor ba la
T02D2513:224a-13: zhugs pas bsgrub par bya ba rdo rje rlung gi
T02D2513:224a-14: dkyil 'khor la bskyon la dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i
T02D2513:224a-15: gzugs su bskyed la bu mo 'gugs pa la brtson
T02D2513:224a-16: par bsams nas ming dang spel ba'i sbyor bas sngags
T02D2513:224a-17: bzlas pa bya zhing dgug par bya'o //
T02D2513:224a-19: rab tu myur bar g-yo ba'i mig / mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni //
T02D2513:224a-20: 'bar ba'i lta ba zhes grags te //
T02D2513:224a-21: 'gro ba thams cad dgug par gsungs //
T02D2513:224a-22: zhes gsungs pa'i 'bar ba'i lta ba'ang dgug pa'i las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2513:224a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sngar bshad pa'i
T02D2513:224a-24: gsang sngags kyis kyang mngon par 'dod pa'i las bsgrub
T02D2513:224a-25: tu rung ste gang 'di'i gdul bya'i skye bo rnams
T02D2513:224a-26: la rab tu snang ba'i dbang du mdzad nas spyan
T02D2513:224a-27: la sogs pa'i las so sor nges par bshad kyi
T02D2513:224a-28: 'o na kyang rnal 'byor pa'i mos pa'i dbang gis
T02D2513:224a-29: de dag thams cad kyang las thams cad mdzad pa
T02D2513:224a-30: yin no// da ni thams cad kyi spyi'i las kyi tshig rnams kyi don gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2513:224a-31: ye shes chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:224a-32: la ye shes chen po ni lha rnams sprul pa'i
T02D2513:224a-33: ye shes so // de'i rnam par bsgyings pa ni
T02D2513:224a-34: rnam par rol pa ste sangs rgyas la sogs pa
T02D2513:224a-35: ye shes so // 'gugs pa'o // de'i dga' ston
T02D2513:224a-36: ni des dga' ston mdzad pa ste rnal 'byor pa
T02D2513:224a-37: rnams kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par
T02D2513:224a-38: ye shes so // 'gugs pa'o // mdzad pa'o //
T02D2513:224a-39: de la dmigs pas na ting nge 'dzin de la
T02D2513:224a-40: yang ming de skad ces bya ste /
T02D2513:224a-41: las kyi tshogs bskyed pa'i rnam pa la thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:224b-0: @224b sku gsum gyi mchog rdo rje 'chang skyed par
T02D2513:224b-1: mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni sku gsum gyi bdag
T02D2513:224b-2: nyid can rdo rje 'dzin pa bskyed pa'o //
T02D2513:224b-3: de nyid ni sangs rgyas byang chub ste de kho
T02D2513:224b-4: na nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag po'i ngo bo
T02D2513:224b-6: 'byin zhes bya ba ni phyung ba ste las kyi tshogs rnams shes par bya ste /
T02D2513:224b-7: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rjes su dran nas las kyi tshogs rnams bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:224b-8: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te las 'di
T02D2513:224b-9: dag thams cad la de yongs su rdzogs par bya
T02D2513:224b-10: ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bskul ba bya ste
T02D2513:224b-11: dngos grub thams cad ni de la rag las pa
T02D2513:224b-13: de bas na 'di nyid kyi 'og nas /
T02D2513:224b-14: rgyal po kun gyi gnas la bzhugs //
T02D2513:224b-15: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2513:224b-16: kun gyi sems rab rdzogs mdzad pa //
T02D2513:224b-17: yang dang yang du rab bskul bar //
T02D2513:224b-19: byang chub chen po rdo rje 'chang ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid de /
T02D2513:224b-20: de dran pa sngon du 'gro bas las kyi tshogs rnams bshad pa yin no //
T02D2513:224b-21: des ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te byang chub
T02D2513:224b-22: kyi sems bsgom pa brtan par gyur pas khams gsum
T02D2513:224b-23: po sems tsam du shes nas las rnams byas na
T02D2513:224b-25: 'khor lo che la rnam gnas nas //
T02D2513:224b-26: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po la 'dug pas so //
T02D2513:224b-28: gnod mdzes kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa ste /
T02D2513:224b-29: dkyil 'khor de la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas de'i
T02D2513:224b-30: sngags bzlas shing sangs rgyas kyi sprin gnod mdzes kyi
T02D2513:224b-31: sbyor bas zhugs pa lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams
T02D2513:224b-32: pa spros pas 'gugs par byed pa'o //
T02D2513:224b-33: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
T02D2513:224b-34: rdo rje 'chang ba'i sprin ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sprin no //
T02D2513:224b-35: gzhan dag la yang de bzhin no //
T02D2513:224b-36: dgug par gsungs pa 'di ni gtso bo ma yin gyi /
T02D2513:224b-37: snga ma nyid dus dang po bya bar yang shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:224b-38: de bas na gzhan dag las kyang //
T02D2513:224b-39: sngags kyi sems dpas bya ba ni //
T02D2513:224b-40: rdo rje gsang ba rmad po che //
T02D2513:224b-41: khro bo rgyal po bkug nas ni //
T02D2513:224b-42: sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mchod //
T02D2513:225a-0: da ni rnal 'byor thams cad kyi mngon par 'dod @225a * //
T02D2513:225a-1: pa'i bu mo la sogs pa dgug pa yin te /
T02D2513:225a-2: kun mkhyen ye shes rang bzhin gtso //
T02D2513:225a-3: zhes bya ba ni sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2513:225a-4: rang sngags skyes bur bdag bsgoms na //
T02D2513:225a-5: zhes bya ba ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa
T02D2513:225a-6: gang yang rung ba'i rang gi lha'i skur rang gi
T02D2513:225a-7: sngags kyi bdag nyid rnam par bsams pa'o //
T02D2513:225a-8: rlung la rkang pa bzhag nas su //
T02D2513:225a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rkang pa'i 'og
T02D2513:225a-10: tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhag pa gang yin pa
T02D2513:225a-11: de la de skad ces bya ste /
T02D2513:225a-12: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bskyon zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:225a-13: lcags kyus snying nas drangs nas ni //
T02D2513:225a-14: zhes bya ba ni lcags kyus snying drangs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:225a-16: rnal 'byor pa rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po
T02D2513:225a-17: dang ldan pas de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug
T02D2513:225a-18: ste / mngon par 'dod pa'i bu mo dam tshig
T02D2513:225a-19: gi phyag rgya'i gzugs su bskyed la rlung gi dkyil
T02D2513:225a-20: 'khor la bskyon te de la mngon par phyogs par
T02D2513:225a-21: ste / drangs shing / rang gi lha'i gzugs kyis lcags kyu dang zhags pa thogs te /
T02D2513:225a-22: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bcings la drangs nas
T02D2513:225a-23: khyer te 'ongs par bsam pa dang dkyil 'khor pa
T02D2513:225a-24: rnams kyang de 'gugs par brtson par bsam zhing bdag
T02D2513:225a-25: nyid kyang ming dang spel pa'i sbyor bas gsang sngags
T02D2513:225a-27: skyes pa dgug pa la ni sbyor ba 'di nyid go bzlog pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:225a-28: thag ring po nas dgug na bsgrub par bya ba
T02D2513:225a-29: gal te yongs su bskams par 'gyur ba yang srid
T02D2513:225a-30: pas / de ltar mi 'gyur par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2513:225a-31: rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad ni //
T02D2513:225a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te bsams zhes
T02D2513:225a-33: bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i mgo bo la'o
T02D2513:225a-34: // de ni zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2513:225a-35: 'di skad ston pa yin te rlung gi dkyil 'khor
T02D2513:225a-36: la bskyon te thag ring po nas dgug na bsgrub
T02D2513:225a-37: par bya ba'i mgo la zla ba'i steng na bcom
T02D2513:225a-38: ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po
T02D2513:225a-39: bdud rtsi 'bab pa bsams la dgug par bya'o zhes
T02D2513:225a-40: pa'o // rdo rje dkyil 'khor las byung ba //
T02D2513:225a-41: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2513:225a-42: gyi steng du rnam par bzhugs par bsgom mo zhes
T02D2513:225b-0: rdo rje lcags kyu sku chen @225b po //
T02D2513:225b-1: zhes bya ba ni yi ge dza: las byung ba'i
T02D2513:225b-2: lcags kyu 'bar ba phyag na bsnams pa'i rang gi
T02D2513:225b-3: lha'o // 'di ni bu mo dgug pa'i sbyor ba'i khyad par ro //
T02D2513:225b-5: rdo rje dkyil 'khor las byung ba //
T02D2513:225b-6: rdo rje lcags kyu sku chen po //
T02D2513:225b-7: zhes bya ba rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2513:225b-8: gzugs su yongs su gyur par bsgoms la de la
T02D2513:225b-9: bskyon nas bu mo dgug par bya'o zhes zer ro
T02D2513:225b-10: // rdo rje gsum gsungs khro bo ni //
T02D2513:225b-11: zhes bya ba ni sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i
T02D2513:225b-12: yi ge las byung ba zhal gsum pa mi bskyod
T02D2513:225b-13: pa'i gtsug gi nor bu can /
T02D2513:225b-14: sku mdog sngo ba rol pa'i stang stabs kyis bzhugs
T02D2513:225b-15: par khro bo rdo rje sa 'og bsgom mo zhes
T02D2513:225b-17: gsal shing rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa yis //
T02D2513:225b-18: zhes bya ba ni gsal shing dang zhags pa la sogs pa dang ldan pas 'di skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:225b-19: de yang phyag g-yas pa gnyis na gsal shing dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
T02D2513:225b-20: g-yon gnyis na rdo rje dang zhags pa bsnams pa yin par rigs so //
T02D2513:225b-21: nye bar mtshan pa 'dis na g-yas kyi cig shos la ni ral gri /
T02D2513:225b-22: g-yon na dgra sta bsnams par la la 'dod do //
T02D2513:225b-23: drangs na zhes bya ba ni lcags kyus drangs nas
T02D2513:225b-24: zhags pas bcings la bsgyel ba'i tshul du byas pa'o
T02D2513:225b-25: // 'di skad ston pa yin te rnal 'byor pa
T02D2513:225b-26: ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje sa 'og rnal
T02D2513:225b-27: 'byor pas de'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor bas 'dug ste
T02D2513:225b-28: // / de nyid kyis snga ma bzhin du lha
T02D2513:225b-29: ma yin gyi bu mo 'gugs bzhin par bsams la
T02D2513:225b-30: ming dang spel nas de'i sngags bzlas pa'i sbyor bas
T02D2513:225b-32: lha ma yin gyi bu mo dgug pa'i khyad par gyi sbyor ba'o //
T02D2513:225b-33: gzas zin tshe na khar bcug ste //
T02D2513:225b-34: rdzas rgyal rdo rje lcags kyus bsgrub //
T02D2513:225b-35: ces bya ba ni gzas zin pa'i tshe na rdzas
T02D2513:225b-36: khar bcug la rdo rje lcags kyus dgug pa'i sbyor
T02D2513:225b-37: bas nam mkha'i khams thams cad na gnas pa'i 'phags
T02D2513:225b-38: pa gshin rje gshed la sogs pa 'gugs pa la
T02D2513:225b-39: brtson pa rnams dgug pa la sogs pa byas te
T02D2513:225b-40: bsgrub par bya'o // 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2513:225b-41: rnal 'byor pas gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste /
T02D2513:226a-0: gzas zin pa'i tshe rdzas khar bcug la der 'phags @226a * //
T02D2513:226a-1: pa gshin rje gshed la sogs pa ji lta ba
T02D2513:226a-2: bzhin du dgug pa la sogs pa byas la zla
T02D2513:226a-3: ba'am nyi ma gzas zin pa la blta bzhin du
T02D2513:226a-4: ji srid gzas ma btang gi bar du bzlas par
T02D2513:226a-5: bya'o // de nas bsrung ba byas pa de ltar
T02D2513:226a-6: bsgrubs pa'i rdzas kyi rgyal po 'di nyid kyis drag
T02D2513:226a-7: po la sogs pa gang yang rung pa'i ming bris
T02D2513:226a-8: la rkang ba g-yon bas mnan te bsgrub par bya
T02D2513:226a-9: ba yang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bskyon
T02D2513:226a-10: bya'o // te / gshin rje gshed la sogs pa
T02D2513:226a-11: rnams kyis lcags kyus drang zhing zhags pas bcings nas
T02D2513:226a-13: de bzhin du ming spel ba'i sbyor bas gsang sngags bzlas na khugs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2513:226a-14: bud med dgug pa la ni rkang ba g-yas pas mnan no //
T02D2513:226a-15: sangs rgyas 'khor lo legs bsams te //
T02D2513:226a-16: 'jam pa'i rdo rje rnam par bsgom //
T02D2513:226a-17: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil
T02D2513:226a-18: 'khor gyi dbus su ji skad bshad pa'i 'jam dpal
T02D2513:226a-19: gyi skur bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2513:226a-20: lag na rdo rje lcags kyu thogs //
T02D2513:226a-21: zhes bya ba ni phyag gnyis na rdo rje dang lcags kyu bsnams pa ste /
T02D2513:226a-22: snying gar 'di nyid bsgom zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
T02D2513:226a-23: 'di skad ston pa yin te 'jam dpal gyi rnal
T02D2513:226a-24: 'byor ba rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug
T02D2513:226a-25: ste / rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2513:226a-26: la ji skad du gsungs pa'i gshin rje gshed kyi
T02D2513:226a-27: skur de'i gsang sngags kyis bsgoms la snga ma bzhin
T02D2513:226a-29: mngon par 'dod pa'i gnod sbyin mo'i snying gar zhugs pa dang /
T02D2513:226a-30: de bskal ba'i me bzhin du sreg par 'gyur la
T02D2513:226a-31: rang gi mdun na bsil bar gyur pa'i lam yod
T02D2513:226a-32: pa la a'a gtstsha zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis 'jam
T02D2513:226a-33: dpal rdo rje la skyabs su 'gro bar mngon par
T02D2513:226a-34: 'dod par bsams la gshin rje gshed kyi gsang sngags
T02D2513:226a-35: yi ge kshi dang spel bas sngags bzlas la dgug
T02D2513:226a-36: par bya'o // phyag rgya gsang sngags spyor ba dang //
T02D2513:226a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gshin rje gshed
T02D2513:226a-38: la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor bas rang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D2513:226a-40: rang gi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags las byung ba'i
T02D2513:226a-41: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa grangs med pas nam
T02D2513:226b-1: 'khor lo dang rdo rje la sogs pa rang gi
T02D2513:226b-2: mtshan ma dang lcags kyu phyag na bsnams pas bsgrub
T02D2513:226b-3: par bya ba 'gugs par gyur par bsam zhing khyad
T02D2513:226b-4: par gyi sbyor bas dgug par bya'o //
T02D2513:226b-5: 'di ni dgug pa spyi'i yin pas /
T02D2513:226b-6: dgug par bya ba'i gnas su gsungs //
T02D2513:226b-7: zhes bya ba yin te dgug pa thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa yin no //
T02D2513:226b-9: zhes bya ba ni gal te spyi dang khyad par
T02D2513:226b-10: gyi sbyor ba dag gis 'gugs pa la sogs pa
T02D2513:226b-11: mi byed na de'i tshe de 'grub par mi 'gyur
T02D2513:226b-12: ro // de bas na gnyis kas kyang bya'o zhes bya bar gnas so //
T02D2513:226b-13: rgyal po'i zhabs drung kun gnas pas //
T02D2513:226b-14: zhes bya ba ni rgyal po ni sngags thams cad kyi'o //
T02D2513:226b-15: kun gyi gnas la bzhugs zhes bya ba ni gnyis
T02D2513:226b-16: su med pa'i ye shes nyid kyis lha thams cad
T02D2513:226b-17: kyi sku la rnam par bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2513:226b-18: yang dang yang du bskul par bya //
T02D2513:226b-19: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das bdag la dngos
T02D2513:226b-20: grub bstsal du gsol zhes skad cig re re zhing
T02D2513:226b-22: ci'i phyir zhe na rgyal po kun gyi gnas la bzhugs pas bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:226b-23: gzhan dag ni dgug pa'i las rnams la bcom ldan
T02D2513:226b-24: 'das gnod mdzes nyid bskul bar bya'o zhes zer ro
T02D2513:226b-25: // ye shes kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:226b-26: la ye shes kyis rnam par rgyal ba ni gdug
T02D2513:226b-27: pa'i rang bzhin zil gyis gnon pa ste zil gyis
T02D2513:226b-28: gnon pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces
T02D2513:226b-29: // bya ste / ral pa gcig ma'o //
T02D2513:226b-30: de nyid rdo rje ste dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:226b-31: gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pa yis //
T02D2513:226b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ral ba gcig
T02D2513:226b-33: ma'i rnal 'byor bas de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
T02D2513:226b-34: 'dug la snga ma bzhin du klu'i bu mo 'gugs
T02D2513:226b-36: bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang mdung can ma'i sngags spel zhing bzla'o //
T02D2513:226b-37: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas chags pa'i //
T02D2513:226b-38: zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa la rjes su chags pas bdag nyid kyis te /
T02D2513:226b-39: bcom ldan 'das ma 'di yang sku mdog sngo bo cod pan la mi bskyod pas brgyan pa /
T02D2513:226b-40: ral gri dang lcags kyu dang rdo rje dang sdigs
T02D2513:226b-41: mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang khrag gis yongs
T02D2513:227a-1: ba'i thod pa dang dgra sta phyag na bsnams pa /
T02D2513:227a-2: rol pa'i stang stabs kyis legs par bzhugs pa /
T02D2513:227a-3: yi ge h'um las byung ba mchog tu klu'i bu mo 'gugs par shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:227a-4: nam mkha' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nam mkha' ni go 'byed do //
T02D2513:227a-5: chen po ni thams cad du khyab pa ste /
T02D2513:227a-6: sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir mgyogs pa'i shugs
T02D2513:227a-7: dang ldan pa'i sems kyis khyab par gang yin pa
T02D2513:227a-8: de la de la de skad ces bya ba ste
T02D2513:227a-9: / des na 'jug par dka' pa'i phyir rgya mtsho
T02D2513:227a-10: dang chos mthun par gnas pa na skul byed ma
T02D2513:227a-12: de nyid 'da' bar mi bya bas na dam tshig go //
T02D2513:227a-13: de la dmigs pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2513:227a-14: sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba ni spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad dgod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2513:227a-16: skul byed ma'i rnal 'byor bas de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la /
T02D2513:227a-17: klu'i bu mo la sogs pa rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bskyon te /
T02D2513:227a-18: 'phags ma tsun de'i sku nam mkha' khyab pa rnams kyis 'gugs par byed par bsams la /
T02D2513:227a-19: de bzhin gsang sngags bzlas nas bkug ste nye bar longs spyad bar bya'o //
T02D2513:227a-20: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la thams cad khyab pas nam mkha' ste /
T02D2513:227a-21: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa chos nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D2513:227a-22: de nyid mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o //
T02D2513:227a-23: des rnam par rgyal ba ni gdug pa rnams zil
T02D2513:227a-24: gyis gnon pa la brtson pa yin pa de la
T02D2513:227a-25: de skad ces bya ste khro gnyer can no //
T02D2513:227a-26: de nyid mchog ste de la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o /
T02D2513:227a-27: chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa la chos chen po lung dang rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2513:227a-28: de nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi 'dren pas na bdud rtsi'o //
T02D2513:227a-29: de nyid ni dam tshig ste rgyu rdzogs pa gang yin pa ste /
T02D2513:227a-30: de yang 'dir rdo rje khro gnyer can gyi rnal
T02D2513:227a-31: 'byor bas de'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te nye bar
T02D2513:227a-33: yang na zhes bya ba la yang smos pas ni
T02D2513:227a-34: 'gog pa'i rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pas sam
T02D2513:227a-35: / rdo rje phra mo la sogs pa bsgoms pas sems rtse gcig pa thob pa'o //
T02D2513:227a-36: skye bo med pa'i zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang la sogs par ro //
T02D2513:227b-0: gsang sngags @227b bye ba bzlas nas su //
T02D2513:227b-1: zhes bya ba ni yi ge'i phreng ba bzlas pas so //
T02D2513:227b-2: las rnams thams cad bya bar gsungs //
T02D2513:227b-3: zhes bya ba ni sngags de yis so //
T02D2513:227b-4: 'di skad ston pa yin te lha'i bu mo mchog
T02D2513:227b-5: dgug pa la sogs pa ji skad du gsungs pa'i
T02D2513:227b-6: cho ga gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad
T02D2513:227b-7: la rdo rje phra mo la sogs pa bsgoms pas
T02D2513:227b-8: sems rtse gcig pa thob pa'am bzlas brjod bye ba
T02D2513:227b-9: byas nas bya'o // bskrad pa la sogs pa ni bzlas brjod bye pa ma byas pa'am /
T02D2513:227b-10: sems rtse gcig pa ma thob pas kyang dad pa
T02D2513:227b-11: brtan por byas pas la la byar rung ba yod
T02D2513:227b-12: do // gzhan dag slob dpon smod pa dang //
T02D2513:227b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mngon spyod kyi yul gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2513:227b-14: nye bar mtshon pa 'dis ni dkon mchog gsum la gnod par byed pa la sogs pa'ang bsdu'o //
T02D2513:227b-15: byang chub dngos grub legs par thob //
T02D2513:227b-16: ces bya ba ni mngon spyod kyi yan lag 'dis
T02D2513:227b-17: mngon spyod bya bar 'os pa la las byas la
T02D2513:227b-18: sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs kyi bdag nyid
T02D2513:227b-19: can gyi byang chub rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2513:227b-20: sku gsum ye shes las byung ba //
T02D2513:227b-21: zhes bya ba la sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung ba'i gsod pa'o //
T02D2513:227b-22: dgra la yang zhes bya ba la yang rgyud gzhan dag las /
T02D2513:227b-23: phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi //
T02D2513:227b-24: lus dang dag sems bsad par ni //
T02D2513:227b-25: khyad par dag tu bsgom par bya //
T02D2513:227b-26: dgra rnams la ni gdon mi za //
T02D2513:227b-27: zhes gsungs pas 'dir so ma nyi mi bya ste
T02D2513:227b-28: 'di nyid kyis ni gcig tu bya ba bdag gi
T02D2513:227b-29: ngo bo nyid bstan pa yin no //
T02D2513:227b-30: 'di ston pa yin te sems can thams cad gsod
T02D2513:227b-31: pa dang gtsug lag khang la sogs pa rnam par
T02D2513:227b-32: 'jig pa dang / slob dpon la gnod par byed
T02D2513:227b-33: pa la sogs pa mngon spyod kyi yan lag bya
T02D2513:227b-34: bar 'os pa la lha'i bsrung ba dang bral bar
T02D2513:227b-35: 'jig pa dang / bya ste / bskal ba du
T02D2513:227b-36: mar dmyal ba la sogs par gnas par 'gyur ro
T02D2513:227b-37: zhes snying rje'i sems bskyed la mi bskyod pa la
T02D2513:227b-38: sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bskyod par bya'o
T02D2513:227b-39: zhes bsams nas med par bya ba'am /
T02D2513:227b-40: bsad pa'i dngos po dmigs la gshin rje gshed la
T02D2513:227b-41: sogs pa'i rnal 'byor bas mngon spyod kyis bya ba'i
T02D2513:227b-42: las bya'o // khrag gam chu yis zhes bya ba
T02D2513:227b-43: la sogs pa ni cho ga gsungs pa yin te
T02D2513:228a-0: las bya'o // / mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni bsrub @228a * //
T02D2513:228a-1: bar bya ba'i gzugs brnyan no //
T02D2513:228a-2: khro bo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o //
T02D2513:228a-3: gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na //
T02D2513:228a-4: zhes bya ba ni bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas pas so //
T02D2513:228a-5: sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig / ces bya
T02D2513:228a-6: ba ni sbyor ba phul du byung bar gsungs pa
T02D2513:228a-7: yin te / ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar de
T02D2513:228a-8: rnams la ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni mi srid
T02D2513:228a-9: yin te / la / 'dir de dag gis mngon
T02D2513:228a-10: spyod bya ba'i phur bu bshad pa la yang ma
T02D2513:228a-11: yin na ci'i phyir gsungs she na /
T02D2513:228a-12: de ni bden te de dag 'chi bar 'gyur ba mi srid pa nyid yin mod kyi /
T02D2513:228a-13: 'on kyang sbyor ba 'di nyid la dngos grub mchog stsol ba las mi ldog ba la bya'o //
T02D2513:228a-15: 'ga' zhig sbyor ba ma thob pas //
T02D2513:228a-16: sangs rgyas gsod pa'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2513:228a-17: de la phan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2513:228a-18: dngos grub myur bar rab tu bsgom //
T02D2513:228a-20: chus brlan pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D2513:228a-21: bshad ma thag pa'i don nyid gsal bar bstan pas
T02D2513:228a-22: so // khro bo'i mdun du bcings nas su //
T02D2513:228a-23: zhes bya ba ni khro po'i nga rgyal drag pos bya'o //
T02D2513:228a-24: khro bo 'khrugs pa yis zhes bya ba ni thams
T02D2513:228a-25: cad du khro bo'i lus 'bar pas khyab pa'i tshul
T02D2513:228a-26: gyis so // kha bzhin rnam par bsgyur byas te //
T02D2513:228a-27: zhes bya ba ni kha bzhin rnam par bsgyur pa
T02D2513:228a-28: ni 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs can te rnam par
T02D2513:228a-29: bsgyur ba des du mar rnam par bsgyur ba ste
T02D2513:228a-30: / rang gi las kyi rjes su mthun pa'i stobs dang ldan pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:228a-32: zhes pa 'dis ni che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa yin no //
T02D2513:228a-33: ma mo'i gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D2513:228a-34: mngon spyod kyi gnas kyi nges pa gsungs pa ste
T02D2513:228a-35: / gang na mo bdun po gnas pa ni ma mo'i gnas so //
T02D2513:228a-36: shin gcig tu zhes bya ba ni shing gzhan gyi
T02D2513:228a-37: grib mas ma non pa zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2513:228a-38: // de'i rkang rjes la zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang pa rjes kyi sa'o //
T02D2513:228a-39: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni chu bo'i dogs gnyis
T02D2513:228a-40: kyis la sogs pa yang bsdus te de dag gis
T02D2513:228a-41: gzugs brnyan bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02D2513:228a-42: mi rus las byas phur bu dag / ces bya
T02D2513:228b-0: ba ni mi'i rus pa las byas @228b ba'i phur
T02D2513:228b-1: bus so // phur bu yis ni zhes bya ba
T02D2513:228b-2: ni lte ba yan chad stod bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i
T02D2513:228b-3: gzugs can la smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs
T02D2513:228b-4: bus so // su byas pa'o // 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2513:228b-5: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa yang rung ba'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2513:228b-6: ji skad du bshad pa'i phur bu blangs nas ngos
T02D2513:228b-7: bzhir yi ge h'um bzhi spyi bor gcig bkod la
T02D2513:228b-8: de nyid kyis ngur khrod du sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D2513:228b-9: bris la rkang rjes kyis dang dug la sogs pa
T02D2513:228b-10: rnams kyis de'i gzugs brnyan byas te /
T02D2513:228b-11: dug la sogs pa sems par byas pa'i ta la'i
T02D2513:228b-12: 'dab ma la sogs par de'i ming dang spel te
T02D2513:228b-13: gsang sngags bris la de'i khong du bcug ste sa
T02D2513:228b-14: la sogs pas kyang bkab la /
T02D2513:228b-15: yi ge aa' sa bon las sngar bris pa'i sna
T02D2513:228b-16: tshogs rdo rje'i steng du lho phyogs su mngon du
T02D2513:228b-17: phyogs par bzhag la gnod mdzes kyis bsgrub par bya
T02D2513:228b-18: ba'i snying drangs nas gzhug pa dang bcing ba byas
T02D2513:228b-19: la / 'og nas bshad pa'i phur bu'i gsang sngags
T02D2513:228b-20: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i phur bus snying gar btab
T02D2513:228b-21: la nang gi yi ge pas mtshan pa'i sna tshogs
T02D2513:228b-22: rdo rje bris pa'i kham phor gyis bkab ste /
T02D2513:228b-23: de yang sad bkab la de'i steng du rkang ba
T02D2513:228b-24: g-yon pas mnan te nyi ma phyed dam mtshan phyed
T02D2513:228b-25: na gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2513:228b-26: gdon gyi las thams cad la phub ma dang rdo
T02D2513:228b-27: ba dang ni ma pa'i lo ma dang skyur rtsabs
T02D2513:228b-28: dang / ske tshe la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D2513:228b-29: 'bras chan dmar po rang nyid khro bo'i nga rgyal
T02D2513:228b-30: dang ldan pas nang gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga
T02D2513:228b-31: ji lta ba bzhin du bza' bar bya'o //
T02D2513:228b-32: dgra'i khyim sgor zhes tshig mang po snos pas ni
T02D2513:228b-33: grong rdal la sogs pa yang bzung ste phur bu
T02D2513:228b-34: zhes bya bar rjes su sbyar par bya'o //
T02D2513:228b-35: sbyor ba 'di dag la yang brkos te gzhug ces bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2513:228b-36: shes dang mi shes rnam spangs pa //
T02D2513:228b-37: zhes bya ba ni shes pa dang mi shes pa'i
T02D2513:228b-38: rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'am yang na gnyis
T02D2513:228b-39: su med pa'i rnam par 'jug pa'i ye shes ni
T02D2513:228b-40: shes pa'o // mi shes pa ni de nyid mi
T02D2513:228b-41: shes pa ste de dang bral pas na mi shes
T02D2513:228b-42: spangs pa ste spangs pa ni dor ba'o //
T02D2513:228b-43: 'di skad ston pa yin te 'di dag thams cad
T02D2513:228b-44: ni sems tsam mo zhes nges par bsams la gshin
T02D2513:228b-45: rje gshed la sogs pa gang yang rung pa'i nga
T02D2513:229a-2: las kyi rjes su mthun pa'i bskul tshig dang spel
T02D2513:229a-3: pa'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la
T02D2513:229a-4: / dgra'i khyim sgro la sogs par brkos te gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2513:229a-5: thod pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D2513:229a-6: ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad dang
T02D2513:229a-7: ldan pa'o // 'am gyi sgra ma rnyed na gzhan dag kyang rung pa'o //
T02D2513:229a-8: rdo rje'i tshig gis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i
T02D2513:229a-9: tshig gis byin gyis brlabs pas na rdo rje'i tshig
T02D2513:229a-10: go // 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2513:229a-11: che ge mo skrod ces bya ba dang spel ba
T02D2513:229a-12: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i
T02D2513:229a-13: gsang sngags ji skad du bshad pa'i thod pa la
T02D2513:229a-14: dug la sogs pa rnams kyis legs par bris la
T02D2513:229a-15: / rdo rje'i tshig gis brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su
T02D2513:229a-16: bzlas te dgra'i sgo khang la sogs par pas na
T02D2513:229a-17: grong la sogs pa skrod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2513:229a-18: 'chi ba'am bskams par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sod
T02D2513:229a-19: cig pa'am skoms shig ces bya ba spel ba'i gsang
T02D2513:229a-21: nye bar mtshon pa 'dis na skrod cig ces pa la sogs pa yang yongs su bsdu'o //
T02D2513:229a-22: 'di skad ston pa yin te khro bo gang yang rung ba'i nga rgyal du byas nas /
T02D2513:229a-23: lha chen po gcer bu skra bshig ba lho phyogs
T02D2513:229a-24: na gnas pa 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i sngags dang phyag
T02D2513:229a-26: rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che //
T02D2513:229a-27: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa //
T02D2513:229a-28: dam tshig 'das na myur bar ni //
T02D2513:229a-29: rigs rgyud bcas pa thal bar byed //
T02D2513:229a-30: aom ha na sa ma ya h'um phat ces brjod
T02D2513:229a-31: la sngar bshad pa'i khro bo ti r'i nti ri'i
T02D2513:229a-32: dam tshig byin la kha zhing tsha ba'i bkra mi
T02D2513:229a-33: shis pa'i me tog rnams kyis mchod la de blangs
T02D2513:229a-34: nas de yang rang gi las bya bar bsgo ste
T02D2513:229a-35: slar btang na grong ngam grong khyer gyi lho phyogs
T02D2513:229a-36: kyi 'bus zos pa'i ta la'i 'dab ma la sogs
T02D2513:229a-37: pa la bdag nyid mngon par 'dod pa'i las dang
T02D2513:229a-38: rjes su mthun par bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang
T02D2513:229a-39: spel pa'i spyod pas gshin rje gshed la sogs pa
T02D2513:229a-40: gang yang rung pa'i gsang sngags mi rus la sogs
T02D2513:229a-41: pa phyag rgyas gtor pa'i tshul gyis sam yi ge
T02D2513:229a-42: phyin phyogs su bris la dug la sogs pa dang
T02D2513:229a-43: ni ma pa'i lo ma la sogs pa dang mi
T02D2513:229a-44: gtsang bas bskus te gsang sngags brgya rtsa bzlas la
T02D2513:229a-45: me tog de lan bdun mngon par bzlas pa byas
T02D2513:229b-0: nas / de'i @229b 'og tu ta la'i 'dab mar sbyar te me tog lhag ma rnams kyis dkri'o //
T02D2513:229b-1: de nas dgra'i sgo khang cog bus dong byas la
T02D2513:229b-2: nyi ma phyed dam mtshan phyed na sba bar bya'o
T02D2513:229b-3: // de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2513:229b-4: pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ji skad
T02D2513:229b-5: du bshad pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim pas sgrub
T02D2513:229b-6: pa la lan bdun zhugs pa'i sgrub pa po la
T02D2513:229b-7: dngos grub mi stsol na phur bus gdab pa 'di
T02D2513:229b-9: de rnams kyi sku gsum ni sku dang gsung dang
T02D2513:229b-10: thugs te ngo bo nyid dang longs spyod rdzogs pa

T02D2513:229b-13: phur bus te bdud rtsi thab sbyor la sogs pa'i

T02D2513:229b-20: // thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la

T02D2513:229b-22: ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i ye shes

T02D2513:229b-34: sku gsum rdo rje'i mthar thug pa //
T02D2513:229b-35: zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo
T02D2513:229b-36: rje'i mthar thug pa ste bsgrub par bya ba'i zhal
T02D2513:229b-37: gsum zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02D2513:229b-38: sbyang zhes bya ba ni mi rus la sogs pa

T02D2513:229b-40: po zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D2513:229b-42: zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um las byung ba
T02D2513:229b-43: zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa sku mdog nag po
T02D2513:229b-44: rol pa'i stang stabs kyis bzhugs pa /
T02D2513:229b-45: mi bskyod pa'i gtsug gi nor bu can /
T02D2513:230a-0: phyag na ral gri dang lcags @230a * //
T02D2513:230a-6: rdo rje gsum gyi phur bu bsam //
T02D2513:230a-7: zhes bya ba ni sku gsung thugs kyi phur bu'o //
T02D2513:230a-8: bdag nyid chen po stobs po che //
T02D2513:230a-9: zhes bya ba ni stobs po che'am rdo rje h'um mdzad chen po la sogs pas so //
T02D2513:230a-10: bdud rtsi thab sbyor rdo rje dang //
T02D2513:230a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gzugs can gyi phur bus so //
T02D2513:230a-12: rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis zhes bya ba ni khro
T02D2513:230a-13: bo'i sbyor pa dang ldan pas 'di la phur bus
T02D2513:230a-14: gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bsam pa brtan pos
T02D2513:230a-15: so // steng du 'ang dam tshig de nyid ni //
T02D2513:230a-16: zhes bya ba ni thugs ka nas brtsams te ji
T02D2513:230a-17: srid dbu'i bar rdo rje phur bu de nyid bsam
T02D2513:230a-18: par bya'o // dam tshig ni nges par bsgom par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:230a-19: 'di skad ston pa yin te gang gi tshe rnal
T02D2513:230a-20: 'byor bas bsgrub pa bdun gyis kyang ma grub na
T02D2513:230a-21: / rdo rje sems dpa' 'am gang yang rung pa'i
T02D2513:230a-22: nga rgyal du ji lta ba bzhin du byas la
T02D2513:230a-23: snga ma ltar mi rus la sogs pa las byas

T02D2513:230a-32: bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2513:230a-33: zhes bya ba 'dis ni bsam gtan gyi phur bu nyid gsungs pa'o //
T02D2513:230a-34: rgyal chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang /

T02D2513:230a-37: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyang de'i phur bus 'debs zhes bya ba bsdam dang sbyar ro //
T02D2513:230a-38: spyi'i gsang sngags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa phur bus
T02D2513:230a-39: 'debs pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid gtso bo nyid
T02D2513:230a-40: de phur bus gdab pa de la ni de bzhin

T02D2513:230a-43: khyad par gyi gsang sngags kyis thams cad kyis phur
T02D2513:230a-44: bu gdab pa la ni sku rdo rje la sogs
T02D2513:230b-1: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyang zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang sbyar ro //
T02D2513:230b-2: 'di skad ston pa yin te sku rdo rje'i rnal
T02D2513:230b-3: 'byor bas rang gi bsgrub par bya ba'i de bzhin
T02D2513:230b-4: gshegs pa mdun du bsams la de la gnyis pa

T02D2513:230b-8: phur bus gdab pa'i gsang sngags ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2513:230b-9: du zlos shing phur bus 'debs par bsams la /
T02D2513:230b-10: phyag rgya dang tsham dam gyis phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02D2513:230b-11: sku la sogs pa'i phur bus gdab pa ni khyad par gyi gsang sngags gsungs pa la /
T02D2513:230b-12: sku'i ye shes ni rnams par snang mdzad kyis ye shes so //
T02D2513:230b-13: de'i rnam par bsgyings pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa

T02D2513:230b-15: mdzad pa'o // de nyid ni rdo rje ste dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:230b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i sku'i phur ba'i
T02D2513:230b-17: gsang sngags gsungs pa'i rnam pa la thugs rtse gcig
T02D2513:230b-18: tu mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:230b-19: rdo rje'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo
T02D2513:230b-20: rje'i sku ni rnam par snang mdzad de de nyid
T02D2513:230b-21: dam tshig go // gnyis su med pa ni gnyis
T02D2513:230b-22: su med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa las
T02D2513:230b-23: byung ba de'i phur bu yin la de'i don gsang
T02D2513:230b-24: sngags 'byung zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2513:230b-25: stang stabs kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa ni phan tshun zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
T02D2513:230b-26: phan tshun dkri pa'i tshul du bya ba ni lag
T02D2513:230b-27: pa g-yon pa sgrubs la de'i steng du g-yas pa
T02D2513:230b-28: bzhag ste / g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung la sogs pas g-yas pa'i mthe'u chung la sogs pa bzung ste /
T02D2513:230b-29: phan tshun dkri ba lta bur byas la g-yon pa'i
T02D2513:230b-30: mthe bo g-yas pa'i lag mthil gyi dbus su bkug
T02D2513:230b-31: la bzhag ste / mthe bo dang sbyar ba ni
T02D2513:230b-32: mthe bo sbyor ba ste des rdo rje phur bu
T02D2513:230b-33: gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:230b-34: snang mdzad zhabs kyis mnan nas su //
T02D2513:230b-35: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor bas bzung pa'o //
T02D2513:230b-36: btab pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba la'o //
T02D2513:230b-37: sku gsung ye shes las byung ba'i //
T02D2513:230b-38: zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs las
T02D2513:231a-0: byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang @231a *
T02D2513:231a-2: dam tshig mchog gi bzhengs par mdzad //
T02D2513:231a-3: ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2513:231a-4: mdzad rdo rje phur bu'i rnam par yongs su gyur
T02D2513:231a-5: par bsgom pa ni dam tshig ste de nyid mchog
T02D2513:231a-7: gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur //
T02D2513:231a-8: zhes bya ba ni gal te rdo rje phur bu
T02D2513:231a-9: 'byung ba ma bsgoms par sngags dang phyag rgya 'ba'
T02D2513:231a-10: zhig rab tu sbyar na de'i tshe mngon par 'dod
T02D2513:231a-11: pa'i dngos grub nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D2513:231a-12: 'di skad ston pa yin te rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2513:231a-13: kyi rnal 'byor pas khros pas rang gis bsgrub par

T02D2513:231a-15: te tsham dam gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2513:231a-16: de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bcings pa las byung ba'i
T02D2513:231a-17: 'khor lo 'bar ba yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D2513:231a-18: phur bu bsgrub par bya ba la sogs pa'i mgo
T02D2513:231a-19: nas brtsams te rkang pa'i mthar thug gi bar du
T02D2513:231a-20: gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du phur bus btab par bsam
T02D2513:231a-21: mo // yang na btab pa tsam gyis sems dpa' che //
T02D2513:231a-22: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //

T02D2513:231a-25: dam tshig gis zhes bya ba la ni bcom ldan
T02D2513:231a-26: 'das de nyid tsham dam gyi phyag rgyas slar yang
T02D2513:231a-27: bsdu ba'i sbyor ba mchog gis cho ga bzhin du
T02D2513:231a-28: gnas ji lta bar slar bsdu'o zhes bstan to //
T02D2513:231a-29: bzhengs par mdzad ces bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba la btab nas gyen du bzhud pa'o //
T02D2513:231a-30: gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur //
T02D2513:231a-31: zhes bya ba ni stang stabs rjes su ma bsdus
T02D2513:231a-32: pa'i nyes pas srin po la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D2513:231a-33: nye bar gnod pa byed pa'i glags rnyed par 'gyur
T02D2513:231a-34: bas gnod par 'gyur ba'i don to //
T02D2513:231a-36: sngags pas gang yang rung bzung nas //
T02D2513:231a-37: de la 'ang byams pa nyid du bya //
T02D2513:231a-38: rdo rje gar la gnas nas kyang //
T02D2513:231a-39: de nas phyag rgya legs par bsdu //
T02D2513:231a-40: las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis //
T02D2513:231a-41: rdo rje gnas su gzhag par bya //
T02D2513:231a-42: gzhan du gsang ba pa kun dang //
T02D2513:231a-43: srin po rnams ni gnod byed de //
T02D2513:231a-44: glags skabs tshol bar byed pa yis //
T02D2513:231a-45: gnod byed rnams ni 'tshe byed cing //
T02D2513:231b-0: glags tshol rjes mthun shes @231b nas ni //
T02D2513:231b-1: sngags pa la ni rab gnod byed //
T02D2513:231b-2: de bas rnam pa thams cad du //
T02D2513:231b-3: sgrub pa po ni blo ldan pas //
T02D2513:231b-4: rdo rje'i gnas ni shes byas la //
T02D2513:231b-5: stang stabs bsdu la sbyar bar bya //
T02D2513:231b-7: 'di yang mtshams sbyar ba bstan pa las shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:231b-9: snga ma bzhin du stang stabs bya ba dag byas nas /

T02D2513:231b-11: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2513:231b-12: gar byas nas cho ga bzhin du rked pa g-yon

T02D2513:231b-14: rdo rje thugs kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:231b-15: la rdo rje thugs kyi ye shes chen po ni
T02D2513:231b-16: thugs rdo rje'i ye shes so //
T02D2513:231b-17: de'i rnam par snang mdzad bsgyings pa ni de bzhin
T02D2513:231b-18: gshegs pa la sogs pa'i thugs kyi phur bus rnal
T02D2513:231b-19: 'byor pa'i mngon par 'dod ba'i don rdzogs par mdzad

T02D2513:231b-21: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //

T02D2513:231b-23: pa la chen po ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa

T02D2513:231b-25: des phur bus 'dabs pas de'i don tu gsang sngags phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2513:231b-26: rtse mo lnga pa bcings nas su //
T02D2513:231b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2513:231b-28: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas srin lag gnyis po
T02D2513:231b-29: go bzlog ste gung mo'i nang du gzhug / mthe

T02D2513:231b-31: sbyar bar byas la gung mo gnyis dam por sbyar
T02D2513:231b-32: ba'i tshigs gsum pa'i gnas su mdzub mo bkug nas
T02D2513:231b-33: rdo rje dang 'dra bar nas gang tsam gyis ma
T02D2513:231b-34: rig par bzhag na rtse mo lnga pa bcings pa
T02D2513:231b-35: 'gyur te / des rdo rje'i phur bu gdab par
T02D2513:231b-36: byas par 'gyur bas rdo rje phur bu gdab par
T02D2513:231b-38: rdo rje thugs kyi zhabs kyis mnan //
T02D2513:231b-39: zhes bya ba ni thugs rdo rje'i sbyor bas gzung ba'o //
T02D2513:231b-40: sku gsum ye shes las byung ba'i //

T02D2513:231b-43: 'jig rten dbang phyug ces bya ba la sogs pa

T02D2513:232a-0: bo'o // de nyid dam tshig ste de'i rnam par bsgyings pa ni @232a * //
T02D2513:232a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i gsung gi phur

T02D2513:232a-4: gsung gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gsung gi dam tshig ni 'jig rten dbang phyug go //

T02D2513:232a-6: des phur bu 'debs pas na de'i don du gsang sngags phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
T02D2513:232a-7: rdo rje sor mo bcum pa yi //
T02D2513:232a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la thal mo khong

T02D2513:232a-25: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga'i rnam pas so //
T02D2513:232a-26: mnan gyur 'di la the tshom med //
T02D2513:232a-27: ces bya ba 'dis ni bsam gtan gyi phur bu bsgom pa gtso bo bstan to //
T02D2513:232a-28: mnyes shing zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa

T02D2513:232a-31: de nyid kyis na mgu ba mnyes pa'o //
T02D2513:232a-32: rdo rje dbyangs ni 'di skad gsungs //

T02D2513:232a-36: zhes bya ba ni sku'i phur bu'o //
T02D2513:232a-37: ae ma'o zhi ba chos kyi tshig / ces bya ba ni gsung gi phur bu'o //
T02D2513:232a-38: ae ma'o ye shes phur bu gdab //
T02D2513:232a-39: ces bya ba ni thugs kyi phur bu'o //
T02D2513:232a-40: gsang sngags kyi phur bu zhes bya ba ni gang

T02D2513:232a-42: kyi phur bu'o // bde gshegs bka' yi rjes su byed //
T02D2513:232a-43: ces bya ba ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'
T02D2513:232b-0: rjes su @232b byed pa'i don gyis na 'di skad
T02D2513:232b-1: ston te / gsang sngags kyi phur bu gdab pa

T02D2513:235b-26: to // dngos grub phyir ni mngon phyogs nas //

T02D2513:238b-25: bya'o // ro // bcing ba'i 'og tu mnyes par

T02D2513:238b-29: gar bskyod pa ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2513:238b-30: bya'o // ro // ste / aom badzra a'a be sha h'um zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar ro //

T02D2513:238b-32: rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'ba' zhig kyang ston par
T02D2513:238b-34: rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcing ba las mdzub

T02D2513:238b-37: sha ya h'um zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar ro
T02D2513:238b-38: // rdo rje sogs le'u phyag rgya ni gshin rje
T02D2513:238b-39: gshed la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i sbyor ba

T02D2513:239a-0: @239a * // ro // mthe bong zhes bya ba
T02D2513:239a-1: ni mthe bo dang gung mo chan pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2513:239a-2: dang stobs po che'i sbyor bas so //
T02D2513:239a-3: aom badzra kro dha ma h'a pa la /

T02D2513:239a-6: de bas na tshar gcod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2513:239a-7: skam pa'i phyag rgya dang rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D2513:239a-8: aom badzra k'i lik'i la ya sarba ba ghn'i na badzra dha ra aadzny'a ya /
T02D2513:239a-9: buddha sa tyen h'um h'um h'um phat ces pa'i gsang
T02D2513:239a-10: sngags 'dis 'khrul 'khor thams cad dbyung ba la sbyar
T02D2513:239a-11: ro // gsang sngags 'di la yang sarba bighn'a na
T02D2513:239a-12: zhes bya ba bor la bsgrub par bya ba'i ming
T02D2513:239a-13: ro // gzhug go // rdo rje nam mkha' lding
T02D2513:239a-14: gi phyag rgya ni rta mgrin la sogs pa gang
T02D2513:239a-15: yang rung ba'i khro yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje
T02D2513:239a-16: nam mkha' lding gi gzugs kyis dug la sogs pas
T02D2513:239a-17: phog pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i mgo bor rdo rje
T02D2513:239a-18: nam mkha' lding gi bdud rtsi'i rgyun yongs su ldugs
T02D2513:239a-19: ro // gzhug go // par bsams la / rnal
T02D2513:239a-20: 'byor pas kyang de'i tshul du bya zhing aom badzra
T02D2513:239a-21: m'a r'a ya na bi sha me pa m'a ya
T02D2513:239a-22: aa mri ta aambu me ghee h'um zhes brjod cing
T02D2513:239a-23: ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar ro //
T02D2513:239a-24: rdo rje mda'i phyag rgyas pha rol gyi dpung bshig pa'i sbyor ba ni 'di yin te /
T02D2513:239a-25: khro bo gang yang rung ba'i nga rgyal du byas la yi ge ba las gzhu /
T02D2513:239a-26: aa las byung ba'i gzhu rgyud dang bcas pa g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la /
T02D2513:239a-27: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur la sogs pas h'um
T02D2513:239a-28: las byung ba'i mda'i char h'um dang phat kyi mde'u
T02D2513:239a-29: dang bcas pa h'um gi mda' me 'bar ba dang
T02D2513:239a-30: 'dra ba lag pas drangs nas gzhu lag par bzhag
T02D2513:239a-31: la khros pas phyogs bzhir h'um phat ces brjod la
T02D2513:239a-32: 'phangs te des kyang pha rol gyi dpung thal bar
T02D2513:239a-34: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i khro bo gang
T02D2513:239a-35: yang rung ba'i sku se'u'i me tog ltar dmar ba'i
T02D2513:239a-36: autpala la dmar pos rna rgyan byas par bdag nyid
T02D2513:239a-37: bsams la snga ma bzhin du gzhu blangs te phat
T02D2513:239a-38: las mda' de'i ltong gi phyogs su 'dod pa'i rgyal
T02D2513:239a-39: po dbus su rdo rje dbang /
T02D2513:239b-0: rdo rje rtse gcig ba 'dra @239b ba'i mde'u'i rtsa
T02D2513:239b-1: bar rdo rje chags pa mde'u'i rtse mor rnam par
T02D2513:239b-2: rgyal ba'i rdo rje ltong du mi bskyod pa bkod
T02D2513:239b-3: la bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i zla ba la yi
T02D2513:239b-4: ge kshmam bsam / yi ge ka las bsgrub par bya ba mdun du bsams la /
T02D2513:239b-5: badzra dri shti ma ta zhes bya ba mig tu bkod la /
T02D2513:239b-6: rdo rje lta ba kun chags pas //
T02D2513:239b-7: rab tu dga' zhang gdangs pa'i mig //
T02D2513:239b-8: de yis bud med bltas na ni //
T02D2513:239b-9: rtag tu dbang du gyur pa yin //
T02D2513:239b-10: zhes bya ba 'dis rdo rje blta bar byas la 'dod pa ni bdag go zhes bsgom zhing /
T02D2513:239b-11: aom takki ho che ge mo ba zhing /
T02D2513:239b-12: aom takki ho che ge mo ba bo la snying
T02D2513:239b-13: gar lcags kyu dmar po gsang bar nag po nu
T02D2513:239b-14: ma g-yas dang g-yon du dkar po snying /
T02D2513:239b-15: gar ljang gu'i rnam pas brdeg par bya'o //
T02D2513:239b-16: mda' re res phug pa'i 'og tu yang mda' las
T02D2513:239b-17: byung ba'i rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje la sogs
T02D2513:239b-18: pa'i grangs ji lta ba bzhin du de'i lus la
T02D2513:239b-19: zhugs nas dbang du byas par gyur par bsams la
T02D2513:239b-20: / mun pa sel ba'i 'od zer dmar pos nang gi lus thams cad dang /
T02D2513:239b-21: de nyid kyis phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i lus
T02D2513:239b-22: la khyab pa dang nye du dang mdza' bshes kyi
T02D2513:239b-23: tshogs rnams kyis sa la 'gyel ba las slong bar
T02D2513:239b-24: byed bzhin par gnas la 'du shes med cing khrag
T02D2513:239b-25: rab tu skyug pa la thug par bsams la /
T02D2513:239b-26: rang gi dam tshig gi lha mo rang gi lus
T02D2513:239b-27: las phyung bas bkug nas rkang mthil gyi 'og tu
T02D2513:239b-28: gzhag la sgrub pa pos bshad ma thag pa'i chogs
T02D2513:239b-29: ji lta ba bzhin du srung ba bya'o //
T02D2513:239b-30: mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D2513:239b-31: khu tshur gnyis ni zhes bya ba ni lag pa
T02D2513:239b-32: gnyis kyis rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings par
T02D2513:239b-33: byas pa'i khu tshur gyis yul gzhig pas glang po
T02D2513:239b-34: che'i rgyab tu zhon te 'khor los sgyur ba ji
T02D2513:239b-35: lta ba bzhin du nga rgyal byas la 'khor los
T02D2513:239b-36: sgyur ba'i phyag rgya gos kyis bkag pa bcings te
T02D2513:239b-37: de las byung ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshogs kyis
T02D2513:239b-38: pha rol gyi dpung rnam par gtor bar bsams la
T02D2513:239b-39: phyag rgya 'phang tshul du bya ste 'khor lo can
T02D2513:239b-40: gyi phyag rgya 'dis g-yul las sgrol bar byed do
T02D2513:239b-41: // khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gnyis dkris la
T02D2513:239b-42: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mthe'u
T02D2513:239b-43: chung gnyis kyis lu gu rgyud kyi tshul du dkris
T02D2513:239b-44: // la / gshin rje gshed la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i sbyor ba bya ste /
T02D2513:240a-0: he ru ka'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya @240a * //
T02D2513:240a-2: aom ha ru ka badzra sarba dushta ma yu mung
T02D2513:240a-3: dha ba ra ba na dza ka h'um phat ces
T02D2513:240a-4: brjod la byin gyis brlab pa dang dbang bskur ba
T02D2513:240a-5: byas te / dpral bar bzhag la gsang sngags 'di
T02D2513:240a-6: nyid lan bdun bzlas ta dur khrod du 'jug pa
T02D2513:240a-7: la sogs pa bya'o zhes bstan to //
T02D2513:240a-8: dur khrod du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2513:240a-9: gar byed pa ste lha chen po'i gzugs ji lta
T02D2513:240a-10: ba bzhin du bsgoms la gar byed cing de'i phyag
T02D2513:240a-11: rgya bcing ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:240a-12: ma mo rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni khyab 'jug
T02D2513:240a-13: ma la sogs pa ste de rnams phyag rgyas byin
T02D2513:240a-14: gyis brlab pa la 'di nyid sbyar ro //
T02D2513:240a-15: lha rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan pa
T02D2513:240a-16: la ni rang gi bdag po'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2513:240a-17: rgya lag pa gnyis kyis bcings pa yin zhes bstan
T02D2513:240a-18: to // thams cad kyi rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge rnams ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2513:240a-19: so so'i las kyi phyag gya ma gsungs pa dag
T02D2513:240a-20: gi yang phyag rgya dang po'i g-yas dang g-yon gnyi
T02D2513:240a-21: gar byas pa las byung ba'i rdo rje khu tshur
T02D2513:240a-22: gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u las gsungs pa'i rang
T02D2513:240a-23: gi mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i tshul du ni las kyi
T02D2513:240a-24: phyag rgya'o // phyag rgya chen po ma gsungs pa
T02D2513:240a-25: yang las kyi phyag rgya nyid rang gi mtshan ma
T02D2513:240a-26: dang bcas pa ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D2513:240a-27: la lar ni drag po'i sgrub par bstan pa la
T02D2513:240a-28: ni phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa'i man ngag ji
T02D2513:240a-29: skad du bstan pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2513:240a-30: las kyi tshogs lhag ma rnams la ni de lhag ma yin no zhes zer ro //
T02D2513:240a-31: gzhan dag ni sgra ji bzhin par bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02D2513:240a-32: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas /
T02D2513:240a-33: rin chen cod phan phreng dbang bskur //
T02D2513:240a-34: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dang chos dang las
T02D2513:240a-35: dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis ci rigs pas
T02D2513:240a-36: rgyas btab nas rnam par snang mdzad dang byams pa
T02D2513:240a-37: la ni rdo rje rin chen ma'i sngags dang phyag
T02D2513:240a-38: rgya 'khor lo dang rin po che'i cod pan gyis
T02D2513:240a-39: dbang bskur bar gsungs pas dbang bskur ro //
T02D2513:240a-40: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa la ni sems
T02D2513:240a-41: ma rdo rje la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas
T02D2513:240a-42: so // ji skad du bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2513:240a-43: pa rnams dang spyan la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba
T02D2513:240a-44: so // dang / lhag ma dbang bskur ba ma
T02D2513:240a-45: gsungs pa la ni rang gi bdag po dang rjes
T02D2513:240a-46: su mthun par dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la dar
T02D2513:240b-0: dbyangs dang phreng bas dbang bskur @240b ba ni thams
T02D2513:240b-2: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ni //
T02D2513:240b-3: rgyab tu mdud pa ltar dor bya //
T02D2513:240b-4: zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i 'og tu badzra
T02D2513:240b-5: tu shya ho zhes bya ba dang thal mo brdabs
T02D2513:240b-6: pas mnyes par byas la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
T02D2513:240b-7: kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dbu rgyan
T02D2513:240b-8: cod pan gyi rtse mo'i cha la badzra ra ksha
T02D2513:240b-9: ham zhes bya ba bkod la de las byung ba'i
T02D2513:240b-10: 'od zer ljang gus go bgos par bsams nas /
T02D2513:240b-11: go cha'i tshul du des bdag nyid go bgos la
T02D2513:240b-12: ji lta ba bzhin du bgyid ba dang bcas pas
T02D2513:240b-13: rna ba gnyis kyi mtha' ma la sogs pa nas
T02D2513:240b-14: dgrol zhing dar dbyangs dpyangs pa la sogs pa'i tshul
T02D2513:240b-15: du bya'o // 'khor lor zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2513:240b-16: pa la de'i 'og tu ting nge 'dzin rim par
T02D2513:240b-17: phye ba las gsungs pa'i rigs kyis rang gi ting
T02D2513:240b-18: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2513:240b-19: 'khor lo yang dag par zhugs par bsam mo //
T02D2513:240b-20: de nas mchod yon phul la bzhin 'dzum pas rdo
T02D2513:240b-21: rje gar las byung ba'i sgeg cing dga' ba'i rdo
T02D2513:240b-22: rje snying gar gnas pas zhes dang bcas shing 'dzum
T02D2513:240b-23: pa'i mig gis phyag bya bas phyag byas la /
T02D2513:240b-24: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02D2513:240b-25: rdo rje chen po las che ba //
T02D2513:240b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' deng bdag grub //
T02D2513:240b-27: ces de kho na nyid kyis yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2513:240b-28: sangs rgyas sa rab ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:240b-29: la rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pas mchod pa
T02D2513:240b-30: bzhin ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2513:240b-31: pa'i sa rab tu rdzogs par byed cing mthar phyin
T02D2513:240b-33: phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyang bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02D2513:240b-34: sangs rgyas ni 'dir sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin par
T02D2513:240b-35: brjod ces gsungs pas rdo rje 'chang ba nyid yin
T02D2513:240b-36: par bzung ste / phan yon dang bcas pas brjod
T02D2513:240b-37: pa'i dbang du byas nas thams cad las mchog tu
T02D2513:240b-38: gyur pa'i don ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:240b-39: gsang ba'i mchod pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2513:240b-40: cung zad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:240b-41: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis 'gying bag tu byas
T02D2513:240b-42: nas g-yon phyogs su sgeg pas mgo cung zad btung
T02D2513:240b-43: ba ni sgeg mo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2513:240b-44: h'um zhes bya bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:240b-45: la g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis mdzub mo
T02D2513:241a-1: pa'i mdzub mo gar gyi rnam pas glu len cing
T02D2513:241a-2: pi wang bsgreng ba lta bur byas la sgeg pas
T02D2513:241a-3: lus cung zad bskyod pa ni glu ma'i phyag rgya
T02D2513:241a-4: ste phreng ba ma'i 'og tu shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:241a-5: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rin
T02D2513:241a-6: po che'i khu chur dag gis mgo bo la rin
T02D2513:241a-7: po che'i phreng ba bcing ba'i tshul du bya ba
T02D2513:241a-8: ni phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2513:241a-9: phreng ba yis zhes bya ba ni phreng ba ma'i'o //
T02D2513:241a-10: lha rnams kun la zhes bya ba ni lha thams
T02D2513:241a-11: cad la ste phreng ba ma ni sgeg mo'i 'og
T02D2513:241a-13: lag pa gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji
T02D2513:241a-14: lta ba bzhin du gar bya ba ni gar mkhan
T02D2513:241a-15: ma'i phyag rgya'o// phyi'i mchod pa bstan pa'i phyir me tog ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te //
T02D2513:241a-16: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis gar byas pa las
T02D2513:241a-17: byung ba'i rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag pa
T02D2513:241a-18: la phab ste snying gar me tog 'bul ba'i tshul
T02D2513:241a-19: du bya ba ni me tog ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2513:241a-20: bdug spos rtse mo'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:241a-21: la de bzhin du rdo rje bcing ba byas la
T02D2513:241a-22: bzlog ste / bsgrengs nas gung mo bdug spos kyi
T02D2513:241a-23: rtse mo'i tshul du byas nas gar gyis 'og tu
T02D2513:241a-24: bdug spos dbul ba'i tshul du bya zhing lag pa
T02D2513:241a-25: rnam grangs bskor ba ni bdug pa ma'i phyag rgya'o
T02D2513:241a-26: bzlog ste / // mthe bo gnyis zhes bya ba
T02D2513:241a-27: la sogs pa la de bzhin du rdo rje bcing
T02D2513:241a-28: ba las byung ba'i g-yas g-yon gyi mthe bong gnyis
T02D2513:241a-29: bsgrengs la mar me 'bul ba'i tshul du lag pa
T02D2513:241a-30: bskor ba ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2513:241a-31: dung gi tshul du zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:241a-32: la de bzhin du rdo rje'i thal mo dung 'dra
T02D2513:241a-33: bar byas pa yongs su bskor nas dung phor nyid
T02D2513:241a-34: dang mchod yon 'bul ba'i tshul du byas la yang
T02D2513:241a-35: slar bzlog nas de nyid dang gar bya ba'i sbyor
T02D2513:241a-36: bas byug pas byug pa'i tshul gyis lha thams cad
T02D2513:241a-37: la byug pa ni byug pa ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2513:241a-46: ta ba badzra gandhe zhes bya ba dang rim bzhin sbyar ro //
T02D2513:241a-48: snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la de'i 'og
T02D2513:241a-49: tu sgeg mo'i sa bon gyi yi ge bsams te
T02D2513:241a-50: / de'i phreng ba las bdag nyid rdo rje sgeg mo'i gzugs su yongs su gyur par bsams la /
T02D2513:241b-0: bshad @241b ma thag pa'i de'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2513:241b-1: de'i tshe de nyid kyi gsang sngags 'don cing spro ba dang bsdu ba thams cad byas nas /
T02D2513:241b-2: lha mo sgeg mo'i gzugs kyis 'dod pa dang dga'
T02D2513:241b-3: ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams
T02D2513:241b-5: de nas bsdus la rang gi lus kyi nang du
T02D2513:241b-6: chud pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje la yang dag par
T02D2513:241b-7: dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang
T02D2513:241b-8: du byas la bzhag ste yid kyis ja: h'um bam
T02D2513:241b-10: de bzhin du dri'i bar gyi mchod pa rnams la yang bya'o //
T02D2513:241b-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yi
T02D2513:241b-12: ge aom 'don cing rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis kyis
T02D2513:241b-13: rdza rnga la sogs pa sil snyan brdung ba'i tshul
T02D2513:241b-14: bya'o // de bzhin du rnga yab g-yob pa'i tshul dang nyi ma 'dzin pa'i tshul dang /
T02D2513:241b-15: lag pa g-yas g-yon gnyis brkyang la srin lag gi
T02D2513:241b-16: tshigs dbu ma bkug nas ba dan gsum pa'i tshul
T02D2513:241b-17: du bsgrengs nas lag pa gnyis brkyang la steng du
T02D2513:241b-18: bteg pa ltar gzhag pa dang /
T02D2513:241b-19: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rin po che'i phyi ma 'gyed pa ltar bya'o //
T02D2513:241b-20: lha bshos dbus ba ni go sla'o //
T02D2513:241b-21: de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo gnyis brkyang bas na bza' dbul ba dang /
T02D2513:241b-22: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis na bza' bskon pa'i tshul du bya ba dang /
T02D2513:241b-23: lag pa g-yon pas tshad med pa lta bu ni lha thams cad kyi gzhal yas khang ngo //
T02D2513:241b-24: mkhrig ma'i steng du gdu bu 'dogs pa'i tshul du
T02D2513:241b-25: byas pas gdu bu dbul ba dang do shal 'dogs
T02D2513:241b-26: pa'i tshul gyis do shal dbul ba dang /
T02D2513:241b-27: zhabs la rkang gdub dbul ba'i tshul gyis rkang rgyan
T02D2513:241b-28: bya ba dang snyan la snyan rgyan bya ba dang
T02D2513:241b-29: / de bzhin du mgul rgyan bya ba dang /
T02D2513:241b-30: dpung pa'i rtsa ba'i 'og tu dpung rgyan bya ba'i tshul dang /
T02D2513:241b-31: de nas sor bzhi'i 'og tu srung skud kyi tshul
T02D2513:241b-32: gyis srung skud bya ba dang me kha la'i tshul
T02D2513:241b-33: du sked par ska rags bya ba ste /
T02D2513:241b-34: de dag dang gzhan dag kyang shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:241b-35: g-yon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur du byas
T02D2513:241b-36: pa'i mthe bo'i steng du lag pa g-yas pa kha
T02D2513:241b-37: thur du bstan la brkyang ba'i gdugs kyi tshul gyis
T02D2513:241b-38: gdugs dbul ba dang lag pa g-yon pa pang bar
T02D2513:241b-39: bsam gtan bya ba ltar bzhag la lag pa g-yas
T02D2513:241b-40: pa kha thur du bstan te bla re bskyed pa'i
T02D2513:242a-0: bsam @242a * // pas nam mkha' la yongs su bskor ro //
T02D2513:242a-1: rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:242a-2: ni sgo dbye ba'i yin par shes par bya'o zhes
T02D2513:242a-4: gzhan dag ni mchod pa'i dbang du byas pa'i bdag
T02D2513:242a-5: nyid yin gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod pa'i 'bras bu
T02D2513:242a-6: la mi dad pa dang mi shes pa'i sgo 'phang
T02D2513:242a-7: 'byed pa'i dril bu'i sgras rang gi lhag par mos
T02D2513:242a-8: pas bsgom pa'i don gyi 'bras bu ster ba'i nus
T02D2513:242a-9: pas dril bu nyid gsang sngags dkrol bas dbye ba
T02D2513:242a-12: dril bu dkrol bas yid kyis rang bzhin gyi mchod
T02D2513:242a-13: pa'i tshogs kyi 'bras bu phyin ci ma log pa
T02D2513:242a-14: stsol bar byin gyis rlobs par 'gyur ba yin no
T02D2513:242a-15: // de bas na gzhan dag las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par byas nas sam /
T02D2513:242a-16: lha rnams rab tu bsgrubs nas dril bu dkrol lo zhes gsungs te /
T02D2513:242a-17: bshad pa 'di dag kyang dril bu dkrol lo //
T02D2513:242a-18: mchod pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2513:242a-19: badzra satva su sam gra h'a ta zhes bya ba
T02D2513:242a-20: la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i snying po glu blang ba
T02D2513:242a-21: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang rjes su mthun
T02D2513:242a-22: pa'i klu len cing bstod pa'i mchod pa bya'o //
T02D2513:242a-23: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams rang gi bde
T02D2513:242a-24: ba'i bdag nyid can sems so sor rtogs pa'i rnam
T02D2513:242a-25: par bsgoms la sgeg mo la sogs pa'i rig pa'i
T02D2513:242a-26: lha mo rnams kyis bdag go zhes lus kyi ngo
T02D2513:242a-27: bo nyid kyi mchod pa'i dga' stobs rnams kyis 'gro
T02D2513:242a-28: ba ma lus par bkang la de dang tha mi
T02D2513:242a-29: dad pa'i nga rgyal dang glu blang ste /
T02D2513:242a-30: stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthus //
T02D2513:242a-31: nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gshegs //
T02D2513:242a-32: bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol /
T02D2513:242a-33: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal bzad skal khyod bdag / ces bya bas blang bar bya'o //
T02D2513:242a-34: de nas de ltar blangs nas kyang //
T02D2513:242a-35: aom sa gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa //
T02D2513:242a-36: aom sa gsum gyi ni ston pa po //
T02D2513:242a-37: sa gsum la ni 'byor stsol pa //
T02D2513:242a-38: sa gsum bdag ni grub par mdzod //
T02D2513:242a-39: ces bya ba 'dis mchod cing bstod par bya'o //
T02D2513:242a-40: de nas rang gi dngos grub kyi phyir gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D2513:242a-41: rjes su chags pa'i rnam dag dga' ba'i padmo rnam dag pa'i//
T02D2513:242b-0: @242b mchod pas mchod pa gsal bar rjes su mchod byas na //
T02D2513:242b-1: mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas bde ba grub par mdzod //
T02D2513:242b-2: kye mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid //
T02D2513:242b-3: mchog tu bde ba shin tu rnal 'byor skal bzang mchog dgyes pa //
T02D2513:242b-4: rang gi dam tshig skyon med rtag par rol cig rol cig ho //
T02D2513:242b-5: kye mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag po rang gi dam tshig yin pa'i phyir //
T02D2513:242b-6: rab tu gsang ba'i lha mo mchog rnams so //
T02D2513:242b-8: de nas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D2513:242b-9: 'gro ba'i rgyu ni rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba gsal bar mkhyen //
T02D2513:242b-10: dam tshig thams cad dngos po brtan g-yo kun gyi ngo bor gyur //
T02D2513:242b-11: rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma ho //
T02D2513:242b-12: kye dam pa rtag pa'i dngos grub chen po rab tu sgrub la ston //
T02D2513:242b-13: dza: h'um bam ho: / ae ma ho bde mchog bde ba drongs //
T02D2513:242b-14: rnam par sprul h'um snang bar mdzod //
T02D2513:242b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02D2513:242b-17: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis //
T02D2513:242b-18: slob ma gzhug tu gsol zhes bya'o //
T02D2513:242b-19: de nas dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad de'i gsang
T02D2513:242b-20: sngags brjod nas rang gi snying ga'i dam tshig gi
T02D2513:242b-22: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2513:242b-23: de'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzla'o //
T02D2513:242b-24: lhag ma rnams kyi gsang sngags ni lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2513:242b-25: de nas grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gtsug tor la sogs pa las byung la /
T02D2513:242b-26: rang gi gnas su bzhag ste /
T02D2513:242b-27: dri dha badzra tishtha zhes bya bas brtan par bya'o//
T02D2513:242b-28: aom ba badzra mushti ba zhes bya bas dam tshig
T02D2513:242b-29: gi phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab par bya ba yang
T02D2513:242b-30: shes par bya'o // rdo rje theg pa zhes bya
T02D2513:242b-31: ba la sogs pa las ji skad du bshad pa'i
T02D2513:242b-32: yid kyi mchod pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu
T02D2513:242b-33: mthun pa las byung ba'i phyir don dam pa'i mchod
T02D2513:242b-34: pa yod pas de nyid kyis na 'di ni rdo
T02D2513:242b-35: rje theg pa mnyes par byed pa ste rdo rje
T02D2513:242b-36: theg pa bsdus pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D2513:242b-37: pa mnyes par byed pa yin te /
T02D2513:242b-38: de rnams kyis dgyes pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas so //
T02D2513:242b-39: gang gis rnam rtog rnam spangs te //
T02D2513:243a-0: zhes bya ba ni mi bden pa'i phyi'i don gyi rnam par rtog ba @243a * //
T02D2513:243a-2: byang chub sems ni rnam bsgom pas //
T02D2513:243a-3: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi le'u'i
T02D2513:243a-4: rim pas chos bdag med pa sgom par byed pa'o
T02D2513:243a-5: // lus dang sems ni rnam dag bas //
T02D2513:243a-7: de nyid tshol la thog mar ni //
T02D2513:243a-8: thams cad yod ces brjod par bya //
T02D2513:243a-9: don rnams rtogs shing chags med pas //
T02D2513:243a-11: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T02D2513:243a-12: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa kun rdzob kyi
T02D2513:243a-13: bden pa las mi 'da' ba'i tshul gyis mngon par
T02D2513:243a-14: yid ches pa'i rgyus dad pa gang yin pa'i zhes
T02D2513:243a-15: byed pa'i tshig mi mngon par mtshams sbyar te /
T02D2513:243a-16: de rnams kyi mchod pa ni bla na med pa'o //
T02D2513:243a-17: sems can gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:243a-18: la gang dngos po la mngon par zhen pa dang
T02D2513:243a-19: / mngon par ma zhen pa'i mtshan nyid ni mtha'
T02D2513:243a-20: gnyis te de las dben pa chos bdag med pa'i
T02D2513:243a-21: ye shes ni dbu ma'i theg pa ste de bsgoms
T02D2513:243a-22: la dbyer mi phyed pa dang ldan pa'i rgyun la
T02D2513:243a-23: gnas pa dag gi yin gyi theg pa dman pa
T02D2513:243a-24: la lhag par mos shing mngon par zhen pa'i mthar
T02D2513:243a-25: ltung ba de rnams kyi mchod pa ni kun rdzob
T02D2513:243a-26: / pa'o // de'i zhes bya ba'i sgra ni tha
T02D2513:243a-27: dad pa'i rim pa dang nges pa gzung ba yin
T02D2513:243a-28: par blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so
T02D2513:243a-29: / pa'o // // mngon par zhen pa dang mthar
T02D2513:243a-30: ltung ba rnams kyis ni mchod pa nyid med par
T02D2513:243a-31: / pa'o // // shes par bya'o // mtha' gnyis
T02D2513:243a-32: su rtog pa spangs pa ni yid kyi mchod pa
T02D2513:243a-33: 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi me tog la sogs
T02D2513:243a-34: pa'i dngos su 'byor pa'i mchod pa rnams kyang mig
T02D2513:243a-35: yor lta bur mngon bar 'dus byas pas de la
T02D2513:243a-36: yang mngon par zhen pa med de /
T02D2513:243a-37: sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin du spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshul du shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:243a-39: bum pa gang ba ji snyed pa /
T02D2513:243a-40: me tog la sogs rnams kyis mchod //
T02D2513:243a-41: ces bya ba'i rim pa 'dis gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2513:243a-42: de la re zhig rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa
T02D2513:243a-43: ji skad bshad pa la aom ma h'a su kha
T02D2513:243a-44: badzra aa mo gha sa ma yo da ka siddhya
T02D2513:243a-45: aa bhi shinytsa sarba su ka so ma na sya
T02D2513:243a-46: aa dhya ku ru ku ru dza: h'um bam ho:
T02D2513:243a-47: aa zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i dam
T02D2513:243a-48: tshig gi phyag rgyas gzung ba'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D2513:243b-0: me tog gi lcug ma la nyi shu rtsa gcig @243b bzlas te /
T02D2513:243b-1: de'i gsang sngags kyis de'i mdun du gzhag go //
T02D2513:243b-2: bum pa gzhan rnams ni 'bru lnga la sogs pa
T02D2513:243b-3: dang ldan zhing mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan
T02D2513:243b-5: aom badzrod ka h'um zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
T02D2513:243b-6: brjod bya ste mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gsang
T02D2513:243b-7: sngags lan bdun bzlas la de rnams kyi de nyid
T02D2513:243b-9: de bzhin du bum pa gang ba la aa mr'i
T02D2513:243b-10: lo ma la sogs pas kha dag bcing rdo rje'i
T02D2513:243b-11: chu'i sngags kyis lan bdun bzlas pa byas la lha
T02D2513:243b-12: thams cad la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2513:243b-13: de nas yi ge aom la mngon par bskyod la
T02D2513:243b-14: rdo rje'i rtse mos bzlas pa'i chus bsang gtor bya
T02D2513:243b-15: zhing / rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis btab pa dang /
T02D2513:243b-16: rdo rje me tog la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D2513:243b-17: sngags yongs su bzlas pa'i me tog dang spos dang
T02D2513:243b-18: mar me dang byug pa so so'i gsang sngags brjod
T02D2513:243b-19: cing dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la mchod par
T02D2513:243b-20: bya'o // de nas rdo rje bcing ba byas nas
T02D2513:243b-21: ral gri 'phyar ba'i tshul gyis phyag rgya dang aa
T02D2513:243b-22: k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'a
T02D2513:243b-23: ta ces bya ba 'dis yongs su bzla zhing las
T02D2513:243b-24: thams cad pa'i chus bsang ba'i bza' ba dang bca'
T02D2513:243b-25: ba dang myang ba dang bldag pa rnam pa sna
T02D2513:243b-26: tshogs pa rnams so so'i gsang sngags brjod nas dbul
T02D2513:243b-27: bya'o // bar bya'o // de nas lha mo so
T02D2513:243b-28: so la re re'am spyir ras zung cig / aom
T02D2513:243b-29: sarba bad p'u ra p'u ra a'a barta a'a brta
T02D2513:243b-30: ho zhes mngon par bsngags la rang gi gsang sngags
T02D2513:243b-31: kyis kyang 'byor ba ci yod pas dbul bar bya'o
T02D2513:243b-32: bya'o // bar bya'o // // de nas thal mo sbyar ba spyi bor bzhag la /
T02D2513:243b-33: aom las byung ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs
T02D2513:243b-34: pas nam mkha'i khams thams cad gang bar byas la
T02D2513:243b-36: aom aa nutta ra sarba p'a dza zhes bya ba
T02D2513:243b-37: la sogs pa 'og nas bshad pa'i gsang sngags lan
T02D2513:243b-38: gsum brjod pas byin gyis brlabs /
T02D2513:243b-39: de nas dril bu dkrol te yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas pas dkyil 'khor brtan par bya'o //
T02D2513:243b-40: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang
T02D2513:243b-41: ldan pas phyi rol du byung la bcom ldan 'das
T02D2513:243b-42: dang lhan cig phyogs bcu nas 'ongs pa'i sems can
T02D2513:244a-0: ni snang ba thams cad la phyogs kyi gtor @244a
T02D2513:244a-1: * // ma ji lta ba bzhin byin te nye
T02D2513:244a-2: reg byas nas slar zhugs la sbyin sreg byas te
T02D2513:244a-3: phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan dag gis mchod pa
T02D2513:244a-4: yang bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:244a-5: mchod pa de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:244a-6: la gong du bshad ma thag pa'i mchod pa thabs
T02D2513:244a-7: kyi bdag nyid can de dag gsan pa dang sems
T02D2513:244a-8: can gyi don du 'gyur bar gzigs pas ngo mtshar
T02D2513:244a-9: du gyur pa'i spyan phye nas legs so zhes bya
T02D2513:244a-10: ba rab tu gsung pa ste /
T02D2513:244a-11: mchog tu dgyes par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2513:244a-12: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ae
T02D2513:244a-13: ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o
T02D2513:244a-14: // su zhig ce na sangs rgyas thams cad kye'o //
T02D2513:244a-15: ci zhig ngo mtshar du gyur zhe na thabs zhes bya ste /
T02D2513:244a-16: thabs zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i mchod pa'i tshigs gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2513:244a-17: ci'i phyir zhe na sangs rgyas byang chub thob pa'i zhes gsungs pa ste de thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:244a-18: gang gis she na rdo rje bsgoms pas zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2513:244a-19: rdo rje bsgom pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bsgom pa ste /
T02D2513:244a-20: sgrub pa pos zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02D2513:244a-21: de'i khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2513:244a-22: dka' ba med pas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2513:244a-23: dka' ba med pa ste nyon mongs pa thams cad
T02D2513:244a-24: dang bral ba'i thabs gang yin pa des byang chub
T02D2513:244a-25: ste chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par khong
T02D2513:244a-26: du chud pa thob cing mngon sum du byed pa'o
T02D2513:244a-27: // rdo rje theg chen zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2513:244a-28: pa la gang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2513:244a-29: kyis rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med pa ste
T02D2513:244a-30: // / theg pa chen po mngon sum du mdzad
T02D2513:244a-31: pa de ni rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma thams
T02D2513:244a-32: cad dang bral ba'i phyir legs so zhes bya ba'o
T02D2513:244a-33: // / // ji ltar thugs su chud pa'i ngo
T02D2513:244a-34: bo nyid de ston pa de yang chos dang gang
T02D2513:244a-35: zag la bdag med pa rab tu ston pa lags
T02D2513:244a-36: // / // so // de yang rtog ge thams
T02D2513:244a-37: cad kyis rtog par mi nus pas zab pa nyid
T02D2513:244a-38: dang brtan pa nyid shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ma lus
T02D2513:244a-39: par khyab par byed pa yin pas na rgya che
T02D2513:244a-40: ba ste de yang smra ba po'i gdul bya ma
T02D2513:244a-41: lus par zil gyis mnan te gnas pas legs so
T02D2513:244a-43: med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rin
T02D2513:244a-44: po che'i bsdus pa gang yin pa 'dus pa de'ang
T02D2513:244b-0: skyes bu dam pa'i don sgrub pa @244b dang nye
T02D2513:244b-1: bar 'cham pa'i mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir legs
T02D2513:244b-2: // / // so // // so zhes pa'o // ye shes sku gsum las byung ba'i //
T02D2513:244b-3: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye shes las byung ba'o //
T02D2513:244b-4: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni byams pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2513:244b-5: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rdo rje theg pa'i bsngags
T02D2513:244b-6: pa zhes bya ba ni de byas pa'i phan yon
T02D2513:244b-8: dga' ba zhes bya ba ni sngon byung ba'i chos
T02D2513:244b-9: thos pas yid bde ba thob par gyur pa yin
T02D2513:244b-10: la dus phyis sngon chos 'dis bdag cag bsdus sa
T02D2513:244b-11: zhes sems shing yid bde ba thob pas mchi ma
T02D2513:244b-12: 'byin cing rab tu ngu bar gyur pa yin gyi
T02D2513:244b-13: / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni yid mi
T02D2513:244b-14: bde ba nyid mi 'byung ngo zhes la la 'dod
T02D2513:244b-15: / do // gzhan dag na re de dag kyang
T02D2513:244b-16: nam zhig bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
T02D2513:244b-17: 'gro ba ma lus pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i don
T02D2513:244b-18: rdzogs par byed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
T02D2513:244b-19: bya zhes 'di ltar rtag tu dga' zhing 'dod pa
T02D2513:244b-20: / do // nyid yin gyi / de rnams kyi
T02D2513:244b-21: nang du 'di yongs su mi shes pa'i byang chub
T02D2513:244b-22: sems dpa' mi srid do zhes zer ro //
T02D2513:244b-23: de la 'di ni gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi
T02D2513:244b-24: ma lta bu yin pas 'di nyid bskal pa gzhan
T02D2513:244b-26: de'i tshe byung ba'i byams pa la sogs pa rnams ni mdo sde'i spyod par byed pa byung ste /
T02D2513:244b-27: de yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud las de nas
T02D2513:244b-28: phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2513:244b-29: kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
T02D2513:244b-30: byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bos te gsungs
T02D2513:244b-31: pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sngon
T02D2513:244b-32: byung ba na brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas
T02D2513:244b-33: kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i bskal
T02D2513:244b-34: pa yang 'das / gang bcom ldan 'das mar me
T02D2513:244b-35: mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
T02D2513:244b-36: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'das /
T02D2513:244b-37: 'od srungs thub pa chen bo mngon par sangs rgyas pas kyang ma gsungs te /
T02D2513:244b-39: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i don bshad pa
T02D2513:244b-40: de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can rnams skal ba
T02D2513:244b-41: med pa'i phyir ro zhes che ba'i bdag nyid bstan
T02D2513:245a-0: de ni sgra ji bzhin yin par shes @245a * //
T02D2513:245a-2: gtso bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngon
T02D2513:245a-3: chad ma rnyed pa la sogs pa'i chos thos pas
T02D2513:245a-4: mgu ba ste yid dga' bar gyur pa'o //
T02D2513:245a-5: mtha' rnams med pa ni mngon par zhen pa'i mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'o //
T02D2513:245a-6: skye ba med pa ni ji ltar yongs su brtags pa'i skye ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
T02D2513:245a-7: yi ge med pa ni dag gi spyod yul thams
T02D2513:245a-8: cad las 'das pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas so
T02D2513:245a-9: // gnas pa med pa ni so sor nges pa'i gnas med pas so //
T02D2513:245a-10: rnam pa de dag gis nam mkha' 'dra'o //
T02D2513:245a-11: de nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma thams
T02D2513:245a-12: cad dang bral bas rnam rtog las grol ba zhes
T02D2513:245a-13: bya'o // rtog pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba la
T02D2513:245a-14: sogs pa la gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyis bcom
T02D2513:245a-15: ldan 'das de rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' yang
T02D2513:245a-16: yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bur rang nyid so
T02D2513:245a-17: sor snang ba'i tshul gyis sngags la sogs pa ston
T02D2513:245a-18: bya'o // par / rnam par brtags pas rtag pas brtags //
T02D2513:245a-19: zhes bya ba la rtogs pa'i thabs su brtags pa
T02D2513:245a-20: gang gis ye shes kyi sres po kun zhes bya
T02D2513:245a-21: ba la ye shes rtog pa la sogs pa byang
T02D2513:245a-22: chub sems dpa' thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sa thob
T02D2513:245a-24: bde ba las 'khrungs zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:245a-25: la bde ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi bdag
T02D2513:245a-26: nyid can no // de las 'khrungs pa ni don
T02D2513:245a-27: gyi dngos po'i rnam pa gnyis su med par bsgoms
T02D2513:245a-28: pa ste de las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:245a-29: rdo rje 'chang ba ni gnyis su med pa'i sems kyi ngo bo nyid du rtag tu byung ba'o //
T02D2513:245a-30: dngos po ni yod pa ngo bo ste /
T02D2513:245a-31: de gnyis su med pa'i rnam pa ni dngos po med pa ste /
T02D2513:245a-33: gang du zhes pa ni rgyud gang du rdo rje
T02D2513:245a-34: 'chang ba de nyid dang por rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2513:245a-35: du yi ge aom gyis ston pa ste /
T02D2513:245a-36: dag pa'i gdul bya rnams rnam par dag par bya
T02D2513:245a-37: ba'i phyir gang gis sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2513:245a-38: du sprul pa gang yin pa de la de skad
T02D2513:245a-39: ces bya ba'o // gzugs med tshul gyis zhes bya
T02D2513:245a-40: ba ni sangs rgyas kyi rnam par bkod pas gdul
T02D2513:245a-41: bya rnams dka' bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
T02D2513:245a-42: pa la sogs pa'i sprul pa'i phreng ba gang gis
T02D2513:245a-43: bskor ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:245b-0: sgyu 'phrul dra ba @245b khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2513:245b-1: zhes bya ba ni rgyud la phyag byas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas pa yin no //
T02D2513:245b-2: gsung snyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la spros
T02D2513:245b-3: pa med pa'i gsung du bzhugs pa ni 'jig rten
T02D2513:245b-4: dbang phyug ste / yi ge thams cad kyis khyab
T02D2513:245b-5: par byas pa'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i rgyud gang yin
T02D2513:245b-6: pa de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya bar sbyor
T02D2513:245b-7: dbang phyug ste / ro // mig gsum pa ni lha chen po'o //
T02D2513:245b-8: 'dul bar mdzad pa ni chung ma dang bcas pa rnam par dul bar byas pa ste /
T02D2513:245b-9: des na gang gi sgyu 'phrul gyi tshul du ma
T02D2513:245b-10: dang ldan pa'i mkhas pas ni de las gzhan pa
T02D2513:245b-11: med pa'o // yang rgyud gang du rjes su chags
T02D2513:245b-12: ba'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa rdo rje 'chang
T02D2513:245b-13: de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes snga ma dang sbyar
T02D2513:245b-14: med pa'o // ro // khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2513:245b-15: lha mo dag ces bya ba sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:245b-16: lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas pa dang /
T02D2513:245b-17: sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i dgongs pas phyag g-yas kyis
T02D2513:245b-18: rdo rje bstod nas gsor zhing phyag g-yon gyis dril
T02D2513:245b-19: bu legs par bsnams te dkrol ba rigs lnga ma
T02D2513:245b-20: lus pa yang dag par bsdus pa'i lha mo dang
T02D2513:245b-21: btsun mo'i tshul gyis 'dus par mdzad pa gang yin
