T02D2513:245b-22: pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:245b-23: dam tshig thob cing bya ba byas pas btsun mo'i
T02D2513:245b-24: don 'di nyid gsal bar gsang ba lnga'i sems dpa'
T02D2513:245b-25: chen po'i rim pa las gsungs pa ni gcig gi
T02D2513:245b-26: ste / k'i li k'i las rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2513:245b-27: phyag gis kun nas 'khyud pa la brtson pa dang
T02D2513:245b-28: ste / / gnyis pa ste rdo rje chags mas
T02D2513:245b-29: rjes su chags shing rab tu dga' bar nus pa
T02D2513:245b-30: ste / / dang / gsum pa ste rdo rje
T02D2513:245b-31: snyems ma khro bo'i tshul gyis me tog gi phreng
T02D2513:245b-32: ba cung zad 'phen par shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:245b-33: de la bzhi pa ni rdo rje mtshan cha mo ste /
T02D2513:245b-34: rab tu dga' ma'i mda' 'phen cing 'bigs bar byed do //
T02D2513:245b-35: de ltar lha mo thams cad 'dus pas btsun mo'i gzugs byed par khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2513:245b-37: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang 'dir gsang ba lnga'i
T02D2513:245b-38: de kho na nyid kyi rim pas kyang bsgom par
T02D2513:245b-39: bya'o zhes pa'o // glu de dag gis bsdus pa'i
T02D2513:245b-40: don rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na rab tu dga' ba'i
T02D2513:245b-41: rdo rje mnyam pa nyid des thob par 'gyur ro
T02D2513:245b-42: bya'o zhes pa'o // // phyag rgya dang mchod pa'i
T02D2513:245b-43: cho ga rab tu ston pa'i gzhung gi le'u la
T02D2513:246a-1: rgya dang mchod pa rim par phye ba'i sgrar brjod do //
T02D2513:246a-4: // / phyag rgya dang mchod pa yang kun rdzob dang
T02D2513:246a-5: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang
T02D2513:246a-6: bral bas sems can rnams la khyad par gyi mthu
T02D2513:246a-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa bdun pa
T02D2513:246a-9: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'i
T02D2513:246a-11: de la 'khor na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2513:246a-12: rnams kyi don la gzigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2513:246a-13: rnams gsol ba 'debs par mdzad kyi mi mkhyen pa
T02D2513:246a-14: ni ma yin par shes par bya ste /
T02D2513:246a-15: tshogs dang chos kyi sku dang ni //
T02D2513:246a-16: 'gro ba'i don ni spyod pa yis //
T02D2513:246a-17: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa ste //
T02D2513:246a-18: sku tshe rigs dang tshad kyis min //
T02D2513:246a-19: zhes bya ba'i grub pa'i mtha'i rjes su 'brangs na de mi srid pas /
T02D2513:246a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs su chud nas
T02D2513:246a-21: byang chub kyi sems rnams yongs su mkhyen pa'i phyir
T02D2513:246a-23: tshig mthun par dbyangs kyi sgra skad gcig gis zhes
T02D2513:246a-24: bya ba la dbyangs ni lte ba nas byung nas
T02D2513:246a-25: dung gi sgrar gyur cing snying gi padma'i thig le
T02D2513:246a-26: las byung ba'i tshig gis cha shas lkog ma'i gnas
T02D2513:246a-28: de nas lce'i rtsa ba las byung ba ni sgra zhes bya'o //
T02D2513:246a-29: de nas yi ge'i ming can gyis sgra dbyangs lce
T02D2513:246a-30: la gnas pa'i tshig ni 'di skad de ji skad
T02D2513:246a-31: du / dung gi sgra ni gsal ba dbyangs //
T02D2513:246a-32: padma'i khams la yang dag gnas //
T02D2513:246a-33: padma'i ge sar thig le las //
T02D2513:246a-34: tshigs rnams kyi ni cha shas te //
T02D2513:246a-35: lkog mar phyin nas dbyangs su 'gyur //
T02D2513:246a-36: dbyangs las lhag pa'i sgra yin la //
T02D2513:246a-37: slar yang lce ru phyin pa ni //
T02D2513:246a-38: dam pa'i yi ge bzang po'o //
T02D2513:246a-40: dgongs pa gcig pas ni 'di nyid gcig pa nyid
T02D2513:246a-41: de de lta bu'i tshig mthun pa'i sgra dbyangs des
T02D2513:246a-43: la la ni rnam grangs yin par 'dod do //
T02D2513:246a-44: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2513:246a-45: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs su chud
T02D2513:246a-46: par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na de
T02D2513:246a-48: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na ye shes so //
T02D2513:246b-0: gsung rab thams cad kyi @246b snying po yin pas na snying po'o //
T02D2513:246b-1: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar gyur pas na mchog tu dri ma med pa'o //
T02D2513:246b-2: byang chub kyi bdag nyid can gyi sems ni byang chub kyi sems te don dam pa'o //
T02D2513:246b-3: de las lhag par gyur pa med pas na bla
T02D2513:246b-4: na med pa ste 'dis ni chos kyi sku'i ngo
T02D2513:246b-5: bo nyid du bstan pa yin no //
T02D2513:246b-6: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2513:246b-7: po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa
T02D2513:246b-8: ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'o //
T02D2513:246b-9: ji skad du gsungs pa'i ye shes yongs su gyur pa yin pas na ye shes so //
T02D2513:246b-10: gzod ma nas ma skyes par lhag par mos pas rnam par bsgoms par gyur pas na snying po'o //
T02D2513:246b-11: rnal 'byor chen po'i rnam par dgod pa la bzhugs
T02D2513:246b-12: pa'i lha 'khor lor ston pas na mchog tu dri
T02D2513:246b-13: ma med pa'o // byang chub thob pa'i thabs kyi
T02D2513:246b-14: mchog gi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas byang chub
T02D2513:246b-15: kyi sems te kun rdzob bo //
T02D2513:246b-16: thabs thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas bla na med pa ste /
T02D2513:246b-17: 'dis ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2513:246b-18: du bstan pa yin te 'brel bas bstan pa las
T02D2513:246b-20: byang chub kyi sems gnyis po nyid bshad pa'i phyir gsol ba btab pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2513:246b-21: ji lta ba nyid skabs la bab par gzigs pa'i
T02D2513:246b-22: phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'di skad
T02D2513:246b-23: ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2513:246b-24: byang chub kyi sems brtan pas de dag nyid kyis
T02D2513:246b-25: don du 'gyur ba'i phyir de rnams la 'di skad
T02D2513:246b-26: gsungs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang
T02D2513:246b-27: ji skad gsungs pa'i bshad pa rigs pa ma yin
T02D2513:246b-28: te byang chub kyi sems skyed cig ces bya ba
T02D2513:246b-29: ni lhag ma'o // de la don dam pa'i byang
T02D2513:246b-30: chub kyi sems kyi dbang du mdzad nas gnas pa
T02D2513:246b-31: ni sems lus lta bu dang zhes bya ba ste
T02D2513:246b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i sku ni don
T02D2513:246b-33: dam par dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin
T02D2513:246b-34: pas mig yor tsam yin pas na de lta bu
T02D2513:246b-35: ste de dang 'dra bar sems gnyis su med pa'i
T02D2513:246b-36: rnam par 'jug pas bskyed par bya'o zhes nye bar
T02D2513:246b-37: bstan pa'i tshig gis snga ma dang sbyar ro //
T02D2513:246b-38: lus sems lta bu dang zhes bya ba ni ji
T02D2513:246b-39: ltar sems don dam par gzung ba dang 'dzin pa
T02D2513:246b-40: po med pas gnyis kyis rnam par dben pa yin
T02D2513:247a-0: la lus kyang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba @247a
T02D2513:247a-2: sems kyang tshig tu rab tu brjod pa lta bu
T02D2513:247a-3: yin no zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba tshig
T02D2513:247a-4: tu brjod pa ni skyed par byed pa'i rgyu med
T02D2513:247a-5: pas sgra brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin
T02D2513:247a-6: la sems kyang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni
T02D2513:247a-7: snga ma bzhin te lus kyang tshig tu rab tu
T02D2513:247a-8: brjod pa lta bu'o zhes shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:247a-9: lus dang sems dag ni dngos po med pa ngo
T02D2513:247a-10: bo nyid yin pas nus pa med par bstan zhing
T02D2513:247a-11: skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin dag gi don gyis
T02D2513:247a-12: rgya cher dngos po med par gyur pas de so
T02D2513:247a-13: sor spros nas bstan pa ni ma yin no //
T02D2513:247a-15: ji skad du bshad pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems
T02D2513:247a-16: ni chos bdag med pa mnyam pas ngo bo nyid
T02D2513:247a-17: gcig pa ste / 'di ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2513:247a-19: 'di ltar yang shes par bya ste /
T02D2513:247a-20: lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje lta bur ji
T02D2513:247a-21: lta ba bzhin bsgoms pa'i sems skyed cig ces bya'o
T02D2513:247a-22: // phyogs 'di la ni lus la brten pa'i phyir sems la lus zhes bya ste /
T02D2513:247a-23: 'di ni thabs kyi ngo bo ste kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2513:247a-24: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de
T02D2513:247a-25: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
T02D2513:247a-26: thugs lta bur ji skad du bshad pa'i don dam
T02D2513:247a-27: pa kun rdzob kyi thabs kyi ngo bos byang chub
T02D2513:247a-28: kyi sems gnyis su med pas gcig tu sbyor ba
T02D2513:247a-29: byas pas bdag nyid kyi lus dang ngag dang sems
T02D2513:247a-30: dngos po med par byas nas ji skad du bshad
T02D2513:247a-31: pa rtogs pa ste dga' bas rang dga'i tshig tu
T02D2513:247a-32: smra ba'i ched du brjod pa ni /
T02D2513:247a-33: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o//
T02D2513:247a-34: ae ma'o ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o //
T02D2513:247a-35: kun du bzang po ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o //
T02D2513:247a-36: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2513:247a-37: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02D2513:247a-38: zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi thabs kyi ngo bo'o //
T02D2513:247a-39: ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhen /
T02D2513:247a-40: chos rnams skye ba med pa ste //
T02D2513:247a-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2513:247a-42: skye ba med pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can no //
T02D2513:247a-43: 'gyur ba med pa ni chos rnams yi ge med
T02D2513:247a-44: pas ngo bo nyid las mi 'phro ba'i chos nyid
T02D2513:247b-0: can no // gnas pa med pa ni so sor nges pa'i gnas la mi @247b brten pa'o //
T02D2513:247b-1: rtog dang smra ba rnams spangs pa //
T02D2513:247b-2: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs par rtog cing smra ba dang bral ba'o //
T02D2513:247b-3: bskyed par bya zhes rab tu gsungs //
T02D2513:247b-4: zhes pa ni don dam par skye ba med kyang
T02D2513:247b-5: gdul bya rnams la rjes su brtse bas skye ba
T02D2513:247b-6: med pa la sogs pa las bzlog pa nas /
T02D2513:247b-7: gang 'di rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bskyed
T02D2513:247b-8: par rab tu gsungs shing sgra sgrogs pa 'di ni
T02D2513:247b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu nyid gdul bya rnams
T02D2513:247b-11: kyi mos pa'i dbang gis rnam pa lngar gyur te
T02D2513:247b-12: ji skad du / 'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu //
T02D2513:247b-13: ngas ni mdo sde gang bshad pa /
T02D2513:247b-14: tshig 'bru tha dad don gcig ste //
T02D2513:247b-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de thabs
T02D2513:247b-16: kyi ngo bos gcig las kyang gdul bya'i skye ba'i
T02D2513:247b-17: dbang gis rnam pa lngar so sor snang ngo //
T02D2513:247b-18: de yang 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2513:247b-19: gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha //
T02D2513:247b-20: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs //
T02D2513:247b-21: gdul bya rnams la bcos mar bshad //
T02D2513:247b-23: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sems byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis pa bstan nas /
T02D2513:247b-24: da ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de
T02D2513:247b-25: nyid mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sku'i tshul de
T02D2513:247b-26: la mos pa'i skye bo rnams la rjes su brtse
T02D2513:247b-27: ba'i phyir de'i rigs kyi byang chub kyi sems gsungs
T02D2513:247b-28: pas 'dir de nyid la gsol ba btab pa la
T02D2513:247b-30: de bzhin du thams cad la yang bka' stsal ba /
T02D2513:247b-31: kun la dang po nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:247b-32: la la ni sgra ji bzhin pa nyid la zhugs te /
T02D2513:247b-33: des ni yang dag par gsungs pas rtogs shing khong du chud pa ma yin no zhes shes so //
T02D2513:247b-34: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2513:247b-35: ci zhig mdzad nas she na gsung zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:247b-36: gsung gis spros pa ni gsung gi rnam par rtog
T02D2513:247b-37: pas byang chub kyi sems rab tu ston pa'i mtshan
T02D2513:247b-38: nyid can no // 'di nyid ni mi slu ba'i don skyed pas rdo rje'o //
T02D2513:247b-39: de la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:248a-0: rang gi byang chub sems kyi sems ston pa'i rnam pa la @248a * //
T02D2513:248a-1: thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:248a-2: ting nge 'dzin 'og nas 'byung ba rnams kyi don yang 'di bzhin du bshad par bya'o //
T02D2513:248a-3: dngos po 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:248a-4: la byang chub sems la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can
T02D2513:248a-5: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D2513:248a-6: phung po la sogs pa ni dngos po ste /
T02D2513:248a-7: de rnams la ni gnyis su rnam par rtog pas
T02D2513:248a-8: dngos por brtags pas na dngos po ste de ni
T02D2513:248a-11: chos rnams med cing chos can med //
T02D2513:248a-12: ces bya ba gsungs te don dam pa gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:248a-13: 'di ni don dam pa byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2513:248a-14: rdo rje rigs ji ltar 'byung ba yin zhe na /
T02D2513:248a-15: nam mkha' bzhin du dmigs pa med pa'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2513:248a-16: ji ltar nam mkha' ni rdzas thams cad du med
T02D2513:248a-17: cing dmigs pa las 'das pa yin yang rtog pa
T02D2513:248a-18: grag pa'i blos dmigs par byed de /
T02D2513:248a-19: rdo rje'i rigs kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o //
T02D2513:248a-20: 'di ni kun rdzob pa byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2513:248a-21: byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin zhe na bya
T02D2513:248a-22: ba la brtan pa yin zhe na bya ba ni
T02D2513:248a-23: gang don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems su bshad
T02D2513:248a-24: pa de ni rnam par rtog bas mi phyed cing
T02D2513:248a-25: de 'jig par byed pa ma yin la /
T02D2513:248a-26: kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de
T02D2513:248a-27: la'ang 'khor bar sems can gyi don byed pa de
T02D2513:248a-28: ni skyo bar mi 'gyur bas brtan pa yin no
T02D2513:248a-29: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2513:248a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni thams cad gzugs kyi sku'i ngo bo'o //
T02D2513:248a-31: de rnams dmigs su med pa ni don dam par
T02D2513:248a-32: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid
T02D2513:248a-33: yin pas so // dngos po 'di dag ces bya
T02D2513:248a-34: ba la sogs pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
T02D2513:248a-35: pa'i bdag nyid can rin po che'i rigs kyi bsdus
T02D2513:248a-36: pa rdo rje rin po chen la sogs pa dang
T02D2513:248a-37: phung po la sogs pa ni dngos po ste ji
T02D2513:248a-38: ltar yongs su snang ba 'di dag ni dngos po
T02D2513:248a-41: chos kyi mtshan nyid spangs pa yin //
T02D2513:248a-42: zhes gsungs pa ste chos ni ji skad du bshad pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2513:248a-43: de rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni gzugs la sogs pa
T02D2513:248a-44: de dag nyid skye ba dang mi rtag pa la
T02D2513:248b-0: @248b sogs pa'o // de rnams spangs pa ni bral
T02D2513:248b-1: ba ste skye ba med pa la sogs pa gzugs
T02D2513:248b-2: la sogs pa'i ngo bor brtag pa med pa'i phyir
T02D2513:248b-4: de ltar na rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
T02D2513:248b-5: bdag med chos las yang dag 'byung //
T02D2513:248b-7: bdag med pa'i chos ni ji skad du bshad pa ste /
T02D2513:248b-8: de bas na gal te bdag sangs rgyas su gyur
T02D2513:248b-9: na 'gro ba ma lus pa'i 'dod pa'i don ma
T02D2513:248b-10: lus pa rdzogs par bya'o zhes de lta bu'i mtshan
T02D2513:248b-11: nyid can gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyi stobs kyis
T02D2513:248b-12: gdul bya rnams la mig yor tsam du so sor
T02D2513:248b-13: 'byung ba ni yang dag par 'byung ba ste 'di
T02D2513:248b-16: rtag tu dri med thugs rje'i shugs las byung //
T02D2513:248b-17: smon lam grub pa mi 'gag chos nyid can //
T02D2513:248b-18: 'gro ba'i don grub lhur mdzad mtha' yas pa //
T02D2513:248b-19: thugs rje'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang //
T02D2513:248b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2513:248b-21: byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin //
T02D2513:248b-22: zhes bya ba'i don ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2513:248b-23: me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:248b-24: la 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i me lta bu'i rdo
T02D2513:248b-25: rje 'bar ba nyon mongs pa'i mun nag thams cad
T02D2513:248b-26: dang bral ba so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te
T02D2513:248b-27: / de la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2513:248b-28: dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la shes
T02D2513:248b-29: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid can
T02D2513:248b-30: chos kyi rigs kyis bsdus pa rdo rje chos la
T02D2513:248b-31: sogs pa dang phung po la sogs pa ni dngos
T02D2513:248b-32: po ste de skye ba med pa ni snga ma
T02D2513:248b-34: skye ba med pa'i dngos po de rnams la //
T02D2513:248b-35: dngos po med cing bsgom pa med //
T02D2513:248b-36: ces bya ste de rnams la dngos po med pas
T02D2513:248b-37: tshul gang gis spyi'i mtshan nyid bsgom pa'i tshul de
T02D2513:248b-38: med pas na sgom pa yang med de 'di ni
T02D2513:248b-39: don dam pa'o // 'o na rdo rje chos ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
T02D2513:248b-40: nam mkha' yi ni gnas thob par //
T02D2513:248b-41: de ltar dngos rnams rab tu brjod //
T02D2513:248b-43: nam mkha' nyid gnas su gyur pa ji skad du
T02D2513:248b-44: bshad pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa la gnas
T02D2513:248b-45: pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D2513:249a-0: // de thob pa ni chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par gnas pa'i sems @249a * //
T02D2513:249a-1: brtan pa thob nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye
T02D2513:249a-2: shes kyi rjes la yang dag par 'jig rten pa'i
T02D2513:249a-3: ye shes bsgoms pas rdo rje chos la sogs pa'i
T02D2513:249a-4: mtshan nyid mjal zhing yul du byas pa ste 'di
T02D2513:249a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la
T02D2513:249a-7: sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni
T02D2513:249a-8: gzugs kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2513:249a-9: de nyid ni bla ma yin la de rnams kyi
T02D2513:249a-10: yang bla ma ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku ste
T02D2513:249a-12: chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
T02D2513:249a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la brtson 'grus kyi
T02D2513:249a-14: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid
T02D2513:249a-15: can las kyi rigs kyis bsdus pa'i rdo rje la
T02D2513:249a-16: sogs pa dang phung po la sogs pa ni chos
T02D2513:249a-17: rnams te de rnams ni rang bzhin te ngo bo
T02D2513:249a-19: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:249a-20: de dag kyang ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2513:249a-21: gzod nas dag cing zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2513:249a-22: skye ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa rnams ma skyes pas gzod nas dag pa'o //
T02D2513:249a-23: de dag kyang ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2513:249a-24: rnyog pa med ces bya ba gsungs te don dam
T02D2513:249a-25: par rnam par rtog pa'i rnyog pa thams cad dang
T02D2513:249a-26: bral bas na rnyog pa med pa'o //
T02D2513:249a-28: sems can med cing srog kyang med //
T02D2513:249a-30: thog pa med cing mnyam med la //
T02D2513:249a-31: bsam gyis mi khyab byang chub 'di //
T02D2513:249a-32: skye dang 'gag pa stong pas na //
T02D2513:249a-33: ri bong rva bzhin bdag med do //
T02D2513:249a-34: zhes bshad pas sems can la sogs pa'i rnam par
T02D2513:249a-35: rtog pa thag ring du spangs pa yin pas na
T02D2513:249a-37: sangs rgyas nyid med byang chub med //
T02D2513:249a-38: ces bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
T02D2513:249a-39: rtogs pa'i gnas skabs na sangs rgyas nyid dang byang
T02D2513:249a-40: chub ces bya ba mngon par rtogs pa'i ngo bo
T02D2513:249a-41: 'di ni rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa ste
T02D2513:249a-42: sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub pa med do //
T02D2513:249a-44: dngos dang dngos med yongs tshel [*'tshel] ba //
T02D2513:249a-45: zag med mya ngan 'das zhes brjod //
T02D2513:249a-46: ces bshad pa yin gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad med pa nyid ni ma yin no //
T02D2513:249a-47: gzhan yang chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid
T02D2513:249a-48: gnyis su med par rig pa'i sems dang sems las
T02D2513:249a-49: byung ba'i ngo bo nyid gnyis su med pa'i rnam
T02D2513:249a-50: par snang mdzad ni ngo bo nyid med pas med
T02D2513:249b-0: @249b ces bshad pa yin te 'di ni don dam
T02D2513:249b-1: pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2513:249b-2: 'o na rdo rje la sogs par ji ltar so sor snang zhe na /
T02D2513:249b-3: rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i //
T02D2513:249b-4: zhes bya ba gsungs te ji ltar rmi lam la
T02D2513:249b-5: sogs par rab tu snang bas gnyis su rnam par
T02D2513:249b-6: rtog pa rtsad nas 'byin par brtags pa de bzhin
T02D2513:249b-7: du rdo rje la sogs pa yang snang ste 'di
T02D2513:249b-9: byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin //
T02D2513:249b-10: zhes bya ba'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:249b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D2513:249b-12: dang thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa zhes
T02D2513:249b-13: bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02D2513:249b-14: byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa thob nas
T02D2513:249b-15: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i byang chub
T02D2513:249b-17: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2513:249b-18: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o //
T02D2513:249b-19: chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na sangs rgyas so //
T02D2513:249b-20: rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral bas na dag pa'o //
T02D2513:249b-21: de nyid 'di lta bu'i mngon par 'dod pa'i don
T02D2513:249b-22: rdzogs par byed pa'i chos ston pa la nye bar
T02D2513:249b-23: dmigs par mdzad pa de yang legs so zhes pa'o
T02D2513:249b-24: // bdag med chos las legs byung ba //
T02D2513:249b-25: zhes bya ba ni chos bdag med pa rnam pa
T02D2513:249b-26: las yang dag par byung zhing skyes pa'i don dam
T02D2513:249b-27: pa'i byang chub sems de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes
T02D2513:249b-28: don dam pa la ston pa'o //
T02D2513:249b-29: byang chub tshogs kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2513:249b-30: byang chub tshogs kyis bsgom pa yis //
T02D2513:249b-31: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems skyed par
T02D2513:249b-32: byed pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs smon
T02D2513:249b-33: lam gyis bgos par gyur pas so //
T02D2513:249b-34: mi g-yo yi ge las byung ba //
T02D2513:249b-35: zhes bya ba ni mi 'gyur bas na mi g-yo ba ste /
T02D2513:249b-37: de'i ngo bo nyid ni aom la sogs pa'i yi
T02D2513:249b-38: ge la yang nye bar 'dogs pas de skad ces
T02D2513:249b-39: bya ste / yi ge'i rnam pa mngon par 'du
T02D2513:249b-40: byas pa'i gnas skabs de las skyes pa na byung
T02D2513:249b-41: bya ste / ba'o // rmi lam sogs ltar de las skyes //
T02D2513:249b-42: zhes bya ba ni rmi lam sogs pa ltar so
T02D2513:249b-43: sor snang ba tsam du skye bar zad de de
T02D2513:249b-44: ltar na de nyid ni gdod ma nas ma skyes
T02D2513:249b-45: pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i thugs rdo rje
T02D2513:249b-46: rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya
T02D2513:250a-2: thabs kyi ngo bo nyid kun rdzob kyi byang chub
T02D2513:250a-3: kyi sems su bstan pa de ji ltar bsgom par
T02D2513:250a-4: bya zhe na / gnas dang stan ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:250a-5: gnas dang stan ni rnam bsams te //
T02D2513:250a-6: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas //
T02D2513:250a-7: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i gnas
T02D2513:250a-8: rnam par bsam zhing bskyed nas der yang padma la
T02D2513:250a-9: sogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag
T02D2513:250a-10: ma'o // ji zhig byas nas she na /
T02D2513:250a-11: dang por rang bzhin dag pa'o //
T02D2513:250a-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te zhes pa'i
T02D2513:250a-13: sgra ni don lhag ma rnams nye bar mtshon te
T02D2513:250a-14: / aom sarba th'a ga ta aa nu sham si ta /
T02D2513:250a-15: sarba satva nam tsa sarba siddha ya sam paryantam sarba
T02D2513:250a-16: ta th'a ga ta shtsa aa dhishth'a na tam sva
T02D2513:250a-17: bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham
T02D2513:250a-18: zhes brjod la / rang bzhin gyis dag par lhag
T02D2513:250a-19: par mos pas dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas
T02D2513:250a-20: zhes brjod la / par 'gyur ro // rdo rje sems ma ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
T02D2513:250a-21: des na rang gi rigs te yum lnga'i dam tshig
T02D2513:250a-22: gi phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang bya bar shes par
T02D2513:250a-23: bya'o // byin gyis brlab ces bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
T02D2513:250a-24: des na dbang bskur ba dang ting nge 'dzin dang mchod pa yang bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2513:250a-25: yid kyis h'um las rdo rje can //
T02D2513:250a-26: zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um las byung ba'i
T02D2513:250a-27: rdo rje can te rdo rje 'chang bar rang gi
T02D2513:250a-28: lus yid kyis rnam par bsams la byin gyis brlab
T02D2513:250a-29: pa dang dbang bskur bar bsgoms nas yang dag par
T02D2513:250a-30: mchod de rang gi nga rgyal bskyed la gnas dang
T02D2513:250a-31: stan bskyed par bya'o zhes pa ni rim pa'o //
T02D2513:250a-32: lcags kyu ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2513:250a-33: mdun du gzhal yas khang dang dkyil 'khor rnam par
T02D2513:250a-34: bsams pa'i steng du dkyil 'khor gnyis pa yang spyan
T02D2513:250a-35: drang zhing legs par bstod la lag pa steng du
T02D2513:250a-36: bstod nas bskor ba'i rdo rje lcags kyus dgug par
T02D2513:250a-37: bya'o // 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
T02D2513:250a-38: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du'ang bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:250a-39: byed nas dang por phyogs bcings te //
T02D2513:250a-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la phyogs bcings pa'i
T02D2513:250a-41: rjes la dam tshig ces bya ba'i nye bar mtshon
T02D2513:250a-42: pas na chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po
T02D2513:250a-43: rnams kyis rgyas gdab par bya'o zhes bya bar yang
T02D2513:250b-1: la la ni sgra ji bzhin pa nyid du smra'o //
T02D2513:250b-2: sbyor ba bya zhes bya ba ni sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis so //
T02D2513:250b-3: 'di ni bya ba'i rgyud kyi dbang du byas pa'o //
T02D2513:250b-4: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te mchod yon dang
T02D2513:250b-5: zhabs bkru ba dang zhal bsil rnams phul la gdan
T02D2513:250b-6: ji lta ba bzhin du bstabs te thal mo sbyar
T02D2513:250b-7: nas / bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2513:250b-8: tshur gshegs 'dir ni bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2513:250b-9: bdag las mchod pa bzhes nas ni //
T02D2513:250b-10: bdag kyang blo dang ldan par mdzod //
T02D2513:250b-11: ces bya ba brjod la bcom ldan 'das ji srid
T02D2513:250b-12: 'dir mchod pa bgyid pa de srid du bden pa
T02D2513:250b-13: dam pas bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol ba btab ste
T02D2513:250b-14: / phur bu dang phyogs dang dkyil 'khor bcing ba
T02D2513:250b-15: dang ra ba dang dra ba byas la yang mchod
T02D2513:250b-16: / pa phul te / dam tshig la sogs pa phyag rgya ba zhis rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02D2513:250b-17: dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba ni rjes su mthun
T02D2513:250b-18: pa'i dbang bskur ba brtan par bya'o zhes snga ma
T02D2513:250b-19: dang sbyar ro // mtshon cha go cha la sogs
T02D2513:250b-20: zhes bya ba ni sogs pa'i sgras dbu dang spyi
T02D2513:250b-21: gtsug tu mtshon cha dang go cha bya ba ma
T02D2513:250b-22: lus pa yongs su gzung ngo //
T02D2513:250b-23: sil snyan mchod sogs bsgom par bya //
T02D2513:250b-24: zhes bya bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i
T02D2513:250b-25: phyag rgya dang mchod pa'i cho ga bya ba'i rim
T02D2513:250b-26: gyis so // rnam pa kun gyis mnyes bya ba
T02D2513:250b-27: ni sngar bshad ma thag pa'i phyi dang gsang ba'i
T02D2513:250b-28: mchod pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis so //
T02D2513:250b-29: rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyis brtag //
T02D2513:250b-30: ces bya ba ni yang de bzhin du bcom ldan
T02D2513:250b-31: 'das kyi spyan sngar mgo dang gtsug la sogs pas
T02D2513:250b-32: bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2513:250b-33: rdo rje la sogs pa blangs nas bzlas pa dang bsgom pa dag bya'o //
T02D2513:250b-34: 'di skad ston pa yin te ji skad du bshad
T02D2513:250b-35: pa'i phyi'i khrus bya ba'i cho gas khrus bya ba'am
T02D2513:250b-36: / nang gi khrus byas nas lha'i khang pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs la 'dug ste /
T02D2513:250b-37: de nas aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes brjod la /
T02D2513:250b-38: thal mo gsum gyis bgegs bsal nas /
T02D2513:250b-39: rang gi lus lha'i skur skad cig gis bsams te /
T02D2513:250b-40: lkog ma'i phyogs su yi ge hr'i: las padma 'dab
T02D2513:250b-41: ma brgyad pa las padma'i 'dab ma gcig lcer gyur
T02D2513:251a-0: pa la aa las zla bar gyur pa'i @251a *
T02D2513:251a-1: // steng du h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bsams la /
T02D2513:251a-2: aom badzra dzi hva zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2513:251a-3: de nas lag pa gnyis la aa gnyis las zla ba bsams la /
T02D2513:251a-4: der yi ge h'um las rdo rje gnyis bsam pa
T02D2513:251a-5: dang yi ge h'um nyid las sor mo rnams rdo
T02D2513:251a-6: rje rtse gcig pa'i rnam bar bsams la gung mo
T02D2513:251a-7: dang mdzub mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung dang
T02D2513:251a-8: mthe bo rnams su grangs ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2513:251a-9: / aom h'um tram aa kham zhes bya ba'i yi ge lnga bkod la /
T02D2513:251a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa rang
T02D2513:251a-11: gi lha'i gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan du snang bas bdag
T02D2513:251a-12: nyid ni rgyal po'i bka' mngon sum pa ltar 'da'
T02D2513:251a-13: bar dka' bar bsgoms nas phyag rgya phan tshun bcings
T02D2513:251a-14: te / thal mo mdun du phyogs pas mnyam par
T02D2513:251a-15: byas la aa n+yo n+y'a nu ga ta sarba dharm'a
T02D2513:251a-16: te / zhes brjod do // de nas sor mo
T02D2513:251a-17: rnams phan chun rtse mo bsnol ba byas la aa
T02D2513:251a-18: tyant'a nu pra bishtha sarba dharm'a h'um badzra aanydza li
T02D2513:251a-19: te / zhes brjod do // zhes brjod do //
T02D2513:251a-20: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa legs par bcings la
T02D2513:251a-21: te / zhes brjod do // zhes brjod do //
T02D2513:251a-22: / aa tyant'a nu pra bishtha sarba dharm'a zhes brjod
T02D2513:251a-23: de rdo rje bsdams pa bcings pa des mthar thug
T02D2513:251a-24: pa med pa'i nam mkha'i khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs
T02D2513:251a-25: rgyas kyi yon tan bsdus la h'um badzra bandha zhes
T02D2513:251a-26: te / zhes brjod do // zhes brjod do //
T02D2513:251a-27: / brjod do // de nas rang gi snying ga'i
T02D2513:251a-28: zla ba la rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las
T02D2513:251a-29: rdo rje'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa de'i dbus su
T02D2513:251a-30: 'ang yi ge aom bsams la badzra bandha trat ces
T02D2513:251a-31: te / zhes brjod do // zhes brjod do //
T02D2513:251a-32: / brjod do // brjod la / rdo rje bsdams
T02D2513:251a-33: pa rang gi snying gar dkrol bar de na bzhugs
T02D2513:251a-34: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rdo rje 'khor lo
T02D2513:251a-35: la rab tu bzhugs par bsam mo //
T02D2513:251a-36: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2513:251a-37: aom dzi na dzi ka aa zhes bya ba 'dis
T02D2513:251a-38: phyag rgya bcing ba byas la dkyil 'khor chen po'i
T02D2513:251a-39: phyag rgya bcing pa yang de bzhin bya'o //
T02D2513:251a-40: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la
T02D2513:251a-41: badzra a'a be sha aa zhes lan gsum brjod la
T02D2513:251a-42: mnyes par bya'o // rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la
T02D2513:251a-43: mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi rtsa ba'i nang du
T02D2513:251a-44: mthe bo bcug la snying gar cung zad bskyod pa
T02D2513:251a-45: ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o
T02D2513:251a-46: mnyes par bya'o // // de nas tishtha badzra dri dho me bha ba /
T02D2513:251a-47: hri da yam me aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhimma me
T02D2513:251a-48: bra yatstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho: zhes bya
T02D2513:251b-0: ba 'dis dbab pa nye bar @251b bsdu bar byas
T02D2513:251b-1: la badzra sandhi zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dam tshig
T02D2513:251b-3: aom badzra mushti bam zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis brtan par bya'o //
T02D2513:251b-4: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings
T02D2513:251b-5: la mdzub mo bkug cing tshigs gsum ba'i rgyab tu
T02D2513:251b-6: bcings ba 'di ni dam tshig gi rdo rje'i khu
T02D2513:251b-7: tshur ro // de nas sngar bshad pa'i rim pas
T02D2513:251b-8: bgegs la sogs pa gzhom pa nas me tog la
T02D2513:251b-9: sogs pa mchod pa lnga bskyed pa'i mthar thug pa'i
T02D2513:251b-11: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings te khar bzhag
T02D2513:251b-12: nas aom badzra rtsakra h'um zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod
T02D2513:251b-13: la mdun du dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o //
T02D2513:251b-14: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo dang
T02D2513:251b-15: mthe'u chung lcags kyu ltar mdud pa byas pa ni
T02D2513:251b-17: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya
T02D2513:251b-18: b'a ka tsitta badzra pra n'a me badzra bandha nam
T02D2513:251b-19: ka ro mi zhes brjod la yan lag lngas phyag
T02D2513:251b-20: rgya'o // gal te 'byor na bdug spos la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa lnga dang /
T02D2513:251b-21: yang mchod pa rnam pa brgyad kyis yang dag par
T02D2513:251b-22: mchod nas mchod pa nyi shu'i bar du ji lta
T02D2513:251b-24: rang gi snying ga dang dpral ba dang lce dang
T02D2513:251b-25: spyi gtsug tu aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam
T02D2513:251b-26: zhing der yang rdo rje dang rin po che dang
T02D2513:251b-27: / padma dang ral gri h'um tram aa kham zhes
T02D2513:251b-28: bya ba las bskyed la snying ga dang dpral ba
T02D2513:251b-29: dang kha dang spyi bor gnas pa'i rdo rje thal
T02D2513:251b-30: mo brkyang nas lus thams cad sa la phab ste
T02D2513:251b-31: / / shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi
T02D2513:251b-32: phyogs su grangs ci lta ba bzhin snying po 'dis
T02D2513:251b-33: / / phyag bya'o // aom sarba ta th'a ga
T02D2513:251b-34: ta b'u dza au pastha n'a ya a'atma nam ni
T02D2513:251b-36: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra satva aa dhi ti shtha sva m'am /
T02D2513:251b-37: sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhi she k'a ya a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02D2513:251b-38: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa bhi shi nytsa m'am /
T02D2513:251b-39: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza pra brta n'a y'a a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02D2513:251b-40: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dharm'a pra bart'a ya m'am /
T02D2513:251b-41: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza karma ne a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02D2513:251b-42: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru m'am /
T02D2513:251b-43: de nas mdun du 'dug la ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2513:251b-44: du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis
T02D2513:251b-45: sdom pa blangs la smon lam bya ste /
T02D2513:252a-0: chos bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis rang gi snying gar @252a * //
T02D2513:252a-1: dkyil 'khor bcug la rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo
T02D2513:252a-2: rje h'um mdzad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis
T02D2513:252a-3: ji lta ba bzhin du sdig pa bsal bar bya'o
T02D2513:252a-4: // de nas chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2513:252a-5: h'um takki spho ta ya ma h'a bi d'a ga
T02D2513:252a-6: badzra dha ra santye na tha zhes bya ba'i sngags
T02D2513:252a-7: kyi mthar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs
T02D2513:252a-8: pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bas dral bar bya'o //
T02D2513:252a-9: rdo rje bsdams pa dam bcings te //
T02D2513:252a-10: mthe bo mthe'u chung sbyar nas ni //
T02D2513:252a-11: lhag ma rnams ni 'khor lor bya //
T02D2513:252a-12: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes byar grags //
T02D2513:252a-13: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2513:252a-14: de nas rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2513:252a-15: aom mah'a su kha badzra satva ya sarba satve bhyo /
T02D2513:252a-16: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba 'am ma hyam zhes bya ba'i sngags lan bdun brjod par bya'o //
T02D2513:252a-17: rdo rje bsdams pa dam bcings la //
T02D2513:252a-18: g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung mngal du ni //
T02D2513:252a-19: g-yas pa yis ni mthe bo mtshan //
T02D2513:252a-20: bcug la bskyod cing cung zad btsir //
T02D2513:252a-21: zhes bya ba 'di ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2513:252a-22: de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2513:252a-23: la 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas pa'i yi ge aom
T02D2513:252a-24: bsams la / de'i 'od zer gyis reg pa las
T02D2513:252a-25: bdag nyid sdig pa thams cad dang bral zhing bsod
T02D2513:252a-26: nams thams cad dang ldan par bsams la /
T02D2513:252a-27: reg pa de nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2513:252a-28: skur nges par bsams la sku dang gsud dang thugs
T02D2513:252a-29: byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyis mgo dang
T02D2513:252a-30: snying ga dang lkog mar byin gyis brlab ste snying
T02D2513:252a-32: mgo dang lkog ma dang spyi bo rnams su zla
T02D2513:252a-33: ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje la sogs
T02D2513:252a-34: pa'i yi ge h'um la sogs pas mtshan par bsam
T02D2513:252a-35: mo // de nas snying gar rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyas aom satva badzri ni h'um /
T02D2513:252a-36: aa dhi ti shtha m'am zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2513:252a-37: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig
T02D2513:252a-38: gi phyag rgya bcings la g-yas su bskor ba'i bar
T02D2513:252a-39: gyi sbyor bas lus thams cad yongs su bskor la
T02D2513:252a-41: aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri h'um badzra ni aa
T02D2513:252a-42: dhi tishtha m'am zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab po
T02D2513:252a-43: // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon
T02D2513:252b-0: gyi yi ge byin gyis brlabs @252b ba'i gtso bo
T02D2513:252b-1: lnga dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i cod pan mgo
T02D2513:252b-2: // la bsams la / rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya dpral bar bzhag ste /
T02D2513:252b-3: aom badzra datna aa bhi nytsa m'am zhes pas dbang bskur ro //
T02D2513:252b-4: de nas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan
T02D2513:252b-5: pa'i rang gi lha'i gzugs su rnam par bsam mo
T02D2513:252b-6: // de nas ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa
T02D2513:252b-7: byas la rdo rje dbyings ni bdag go zhes nga
T02D2513:252b-8: // rgyal bya'o // de nas thal mo sbyar ba byas la /
T02D2513:252b-9: aom bi ma la lo da dhi h'um zhes bya
T02D2513:252b-10: bas rgya mtsho chen po de'i sting du aom aa
T02D2513:252b-11: tsal bhi ra h'um sv'a h'a zhes bya bas sa
T02D2513:252b-12: gzhi gser gyi rang bzhin can /
T02D2513:252b-13: de'i steng du aom aa tsa la h'um zhes bya
T02D2513:252b-14: bas rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi ri'i
T02D2513:252b-15: rgyal po ri rab byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2513:252b-16: de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi dbang sgyur gyi
T02D2513:252b-17: rgyal po'i gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bskyed la
T02D2513:252b-18: / de'i steng du yi ge bh'um las zur bzhi
T02D2513:252b-19: la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsags ma
T02D2513:252b-20: rnam par bsams la de'i phyogs gcig tu padma bsam
T02D2513:252b-21: / ste / der 'dug nas mdun du rnam par
T02D2513:252b-22: snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ji lta
T02D2513:252b-23: ba bzhin du rnam par bsams la rdo rje dang
T02D2513:252b-24: dril bu 'dzin pas rang gi gnas la bzhugs pa'i
T02D2513:252b-25: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bsgoms te /
T02D2513:252b-26: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyis byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2513:252b-27: rdo rje srung bas go pa gos la mchod yon
T02D2513:252b-28: phul te ji lta ba bzhin du spyan drangs la
T02D2513:252b-29: khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du gnas pa la rang
T02D2513:252b-30: gi lha'i nga rgyal du byas nas rdo rje thal
T02D2513:252b-31: mo bskor ba snying gar bzhag nas mgo cung zad
T02D2513:252b-33: de nas dgug pa la sogs pa bya ba ste /
T02D2513:252b-34: de bzhin du sgo bcing ba dang srung ba thams cad kyis legs par bsrungs la /
T02D2513:252b-35: dam tshig la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab po //
T02D2513:252b-36: de nas rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i dbang bskur
T02D2513:252b-37: bas dbang bskur la snying gar snying po bkod de
T02D2513:252b-38: / de nyid la nye ba'i snying po la sogs
T02D2513:252b-39: pa lhag par mos pas snying ga'i phyogs su dbu
T02D2513:252b-40: dang gtsug phung dang nu ma gnyis dang lag pa
T02D2513:252b-41: g-yas pa'i rtsa ba dang g-yon pa'i rtsa ba dang
T02D2513:252b-42: lus thams cad la dgod do //
T02D2513:252b-43: de nas bdug spos la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad byas la /
T02D2513:253a-1: bsam gyi shing la sogs pa yang phul nas dril
T02D2513:253a-2: bu blangs te bstod pas mnyes par byas la phyag
T02D2513:253a-3: bzhi bya'o // da nas rang gi dam tshig gi
T02D2513:253a-4: phyag rgyas bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la spos chus
T02D2513:253a-5: dbang bskur te de bzhin du snying po dgod pa
T02D2513:253a-6: byas na spos chus rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang
T02D2513:253a-8: mdun du dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas bdag nyid kyang rang
T02D2513:253a-9: gi lha'i ngo bo la rdo rje dang dril bu
T02D2513:253a-10: thogs par gyur pas lha'i thugs ka'i zla ba las
T02D2513:253a-11: bzla bar bya ba'i snying po rnam par bkod nas
T02D2513:253a-12: ji tsam 'dod kyi bar du bzlas pa dang bsgom
T02D2513:253a-13: pa bya'o // phyag rgya dang byin gyis brlab pa lhod par gyur pa'am /
T02D2513:253a-14: bdag nyid gtong bar 'dod na yi ge brgya pa bzla sa par bya'o //
T02D2513:253a-15: de nas bzlas brjod ji lta ba bzhin du phul la /
T02D2513:253a-16: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir gsol ba
T02D2513:253a-17: byas nas sbyin sreg byas te bdug spos la sogs
T02D2513:253a-18: pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la mtshan brgya
T02D2513:253a-20: dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol ba'i rim pas lha rnams gshegs su gsol la /
T02D2513:253a-21: bdag nyid dbang bskur ba dang go bgo ba byas nas langs la /
T02D2513:253a-22: mchod rten gyi las la sogs pa nyin re bzhin
T02D2513:253a-23: thun pa zhing bya ste 'di ni byin gyis brlab
T02D2513:253a-24: pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D2513:253a-25: gzugs nyid ces bya ba ni rang gi lus rang gi lha'i mtshan nyid du sbyor ro //
T02D2513:253a-26: byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:253a-27: ni rnal 'byor gsum gyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba
T02D2513:253a-28: ste / byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba ni sngags dang phyag rgyas so //
T02D2513:253a-29: byang chub sems ni dag pa dang //
T02D2513:253a-30: zhes bya ba ni don dam par byang chub kyi
T02D2513:253a-31: sems bsgoms pas blo shin tu rnam par dag pa'o
T02D2513:253a-32: // gsang sngags sa bon skye ba che //
T02D2513:253a-33: zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes las thob pa'i dag pa'i 'jig rten pa'i sems so //
T02D2513:253a-34: phyag rgya'i tshogs su brtag pa yis //
T02D2513:253a-35: rim gyis gzugs ni rdzogs byas pa //
T02D2513:253a-37: de bzhin nyid snang sgyu las byung //
T02D2513:253a-38: gsal dang grib ma las kyang 'das //
T02D2513:253a-39: 'phags pa'i rigs kyi sngags las skyes //
T02D2513:253a-40: gnyis gyur 'jig pa la rab brtson //
T02D2513:253a-41: zhes bya ba'i rim gyis so //
T02D2513:253b-0: yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor @253b ni go sla bas 'dir ma smos so //
T02D2513:253b-1: dang po dam tshig byin brlab pa //
T02D2513:253b-2: zhes bya ba ni dang po byin gyis brlab pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D2513:253b-3: dam tshig ni dam tshig la mngon par zhen pa'i
T02D2513:253b-4: phyi rol gyi don yod par smra ba rnams kyi
T02D2513:253b-5: phyir yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:253b-6: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i zhes bya ba la rnal 'byor
T02D2513:253b-7: spyod pa'i rnam par shes pa tsam du smras so
T02D2513:253b-8: // dbu ma'i zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad skye ba med par smra ba'o //
T02D2513:253b-10: ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi cho ga'i dbye ba'i rnam pa gsum mo //
T02D2513:253b-11: rtag pa'i rnal 'byor gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir nyon
T02D2513:253b-12: mongs dri mar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D2513:253b-13: te / byang chub sems kyi dag pa ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2513:253b-14: de ni rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2513:253b-15: thal mo gsum gyis sbyar zhes bya ba ni lha'i
T02D2513:253b-16: khang par zhugs pa'i 'og tu der sva bh'a wa
T02D2513:253b-17: shuddha: sarba dharm'a ; sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham zhes brjod la /
T02D2513:253b-18: bgegs rnam par bsal te byang chub kyi sems ji
T02D2513:253b-19: lta bas sems sbyang bar bya'o zhes la la 'dod
T02D2513:253b-20: do // gzhan dag na re thal mo gsum gdab
T02D2513:253b-21: pa tsam gyis sems kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs par
T02D2513:253b-23: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa
T02D2513:253b-24: a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba ngo bo nyid ngag
T02D2513:253b-25: pa yongs su ston par byed pa'i tshig 'dis rab
T02D2513:253b-26: tu sad pa dang byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes
T02D2513:253b-27: zer ro // sems la so sor brtag par bya //
T02D2513:253b-28: zhes bya ba ni ji skad bshad pa bzhin du
T02D2513:253b-29: bsams pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rnam par snang
T02D2513:253b-30: mdzad kyi rang gi dam tshig gis sku la 'khyud
T02D2513:253b-32: aa li tsam gyi gzugs can /
T02D2513:253b-33: aom tsitta bartsi be dham ka ro mi zhes brjod
T02D2513:253b-34: pas de'i zhal du zhugs nas dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2513:253b-35: rgya'i padma'i gnas su song ba ste /
T02D2513:253b-36: 'dis ni sems kyi so sor rtog pa zhugs shing 'phangs par byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2513:253b-37: phyi rol rang bzhin stong par bya //
T02D2513:253b-38: zhes bya ba ni phyi rol ngo bo nyid kyi
T02D2513:253b-39: rang bzhin stong pa yin par bsam mo zhes bya
T02D2513:253b-41: sems tsam la ni gnas nas su //
T02D2513:253b-42: byang chub tshogs kyi bag chags des //
T02D2513:253b-43: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam
T02D2513:254a-0: par snang mdzad byang chub kyi sems kyi gzugs @254a
T02D2513:254a-1: * // su yongs su gyur pa la der yang
T02D2513:254a-2: dkyil 'khor lha rnams rab tu zhugs par bsams la
T02D2513:254a-3: * // / de'i 'og tu bdag nyid mnyam par bzhag ste /
T02D2513:254a-4: sems dpa'i gzugs gsal ba la chos kyi ri mos
T02D2513:254a-5: dbugs su phug la snying ga dang 'od dang stan
T02D2513:254a-6: zla ba'i rnam pa dang bcas pa mchog tu mya
T02D2513:254a-7: ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba chen po'i ngo bo
T02D2513:254a-8: rnam par snang mdzad ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
T02D2513:254a-9: zhugs pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs
T02D2513:254a-10: su rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid can la /
T02D2513:254a-11: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyang de nyid du drangs la brgyal bar gyur pa la /
T02D2513:254a-12: aa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi
T02D2513:254a-13: ngo bo zhugs par bsam zhing aom dharma dh'a tu
T02D2513:254a-14: sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes bya bas byin
T02D2513:254a-15: gyis brlab po // des sgo byas pa'i zhes bya
T02D2513:254a-16: ba la sogs pa la snying ga la sogs par
T02D2513:254a-17: aa bkod la aom bo dhi tsitta au p'a da
T02D2513:254a-18: gyis brlab po // y'a mi / zhes brjod la
T02D2513:254a-19: thabs dang shes rab kyi ye shes sgom par byed
T02D2513:254a-20: pas bdag nyid bsgoms shing gcig tu gyur par bsgoms
T02D2513:254a-21: la spyan la sogs pas ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2513:254a-22: bslangs nas kun du bzang po'i gzugs su rnam par
T02D2513:254a-23: bsams la yi ge ka la sogs pa zhugs par
T02D2513:254a-24: byas nas snying ga la sogs pa'i zla ba'i gzugs
T02D2513:254a-25: kyi steng du brtag par bya'o //
T02D2513:254a-26: de nas rgyud gzhan gyi nang nas gsungs pa'i rim
T02D2513:254a-27: pas dam tshig dang chos dang chos dang las kyi
T02D2513:254a-29: thugs ka'i zla ba la yi ge aom bkod nas
T02D2513:254a-30: rnam par snang mdzad ji lta ba bzhin du bsam
T02D2513:254a-31: par bya'o // padma la gnas pa zhes bya ba
T02D2513:254a-32: ni 'og tu pam las byung ba'i padma bsams pa'i
T02D2513:254a-33: steng du bdag nyid dam mtshan thams cad dang ldan
T02D2513:254a-34: par bya'o // par bsgom mo // de bzhin du /
T02D2513:254a-35: aom gyi myu gus bkrun [?] pa yi //
T02D2513:254a-36: yan lag kun gyi mtshan nyid gzugs //
T02D2513:254a-37: rdo rje sku ni bsgom par bya //
T02D2513:254a-38: zhes bya ba 'dis ting nge 'dzin rim par phye ba gsum pa'i don dang sbyar ro //
T02D2513:254a-39: de nas sku ma lus pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i yi ge aom ni spyi gtsug tu bsam /
T02D2513:254a-40: gsung ma lus pa'i ngo bo yi ge a'a: lkog mar bsam /
T02D2513:254a-41: thugs ma lus pa'i ngo bo yi ge h'um snying
T02D2513:254a-42: gar bsam mo zhes bya ba ni lhag ma ste
T02D2513:254a-43: / de dag gis ni rgyud kyi bdag po'i rnal 'byor gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2513:254b-0: yi ge @254b gsum gyis zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2513:254b-1: pas ni thugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2513:254b-2: gsungs pa yin te ting nge 'dzin rim par phye
T02D2513:254b-3: ba las gsungs pa'i rang gi sa bon gyi yi
T02D2513:254b-4: ge de rnam par bkod pa'i 'og tu rdo rje
T02D2513:254b-5: sems dpa' rang gi lha'i sku mdog dang bzhugs tshul
T02D2513:254b-6: dang gdan dang 'od dang phyag mtshan rnams lhag par
T02D2513:254b-7: bsgoms te / mdog gzugs 'od dang 'dra bar bsam //
T02D2513:254b-8: zhes bya ba'i nye bar mtshon pas so //
T02D2513:254b-9: nga rgyal bskyed ces bya ba la sogs pas ni
T02D2513:254b-10: tha mal pa ma yin pa nyid du gsungs pa'o
T02D2513:254b-12: rdo rje'i bdag nyid bdag yin brjod //
T02D2513:254b-13: ces bya ba'i nye bar mtshon pas rnam par snang mdzad kyi lus la /
T02D2513:254b-15: aom sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D2513:254b-16: aom sa ras mo& ham zhes nga rgyal yin no //
T02D2513:254b-17: ji lta bya ba yin te /
T02D2513:254b-18: de dag ni rnal 'byor chen po bskyed par bya ba'i 'og tu shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:254b-19: cha shas kyi dra ba can zhes bya ba ni
T02D2513:254b-20: spyan la sogs pa'i dra ba rang gi lus la
T02D2513:254b-22: ye shes sems dpa' rdzogs par brtag / ces bya
T02D2513:254b-23: ba mdun du ye shes sems dpa' ji lta ba
T02D2513:254b-24: bzhin du bsgoms la dgug pa la sogs pas rang
T02D2513:254b-25: gi lus la bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2513:254b-26: der bskyed nas de'i 'og tu lag pa'i phyag rgyas
T02D2513:254b-27: go cha dang mtshon cha la sogs ba brtag go
T02D2513:254b-29: ye shes sems dpa' bsgrub pa'i sngon du 'di bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02D2513:254b-30: la la ni ji skad bu bshad pa bzhin rigs pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T02D2513:254b-31: de 'og lag pa'i phyag rgya yis //
T02D2513:254b-32: zhes bya ba ni gsol ba 'debs pa sngon du 'gro bas byin gyis brlab pa byas nas /
T02D2513:254b-33: de'i 'og tu lag pa'i phyag rgya byin gyis brlab pa mngon du bya'o //
T02D2513:254b-34: go cha mtshon cha la sogs bya //
T02D2513:254b-35: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur
T02D2513:254b-36: ba'i 'og tu bya ba khong du chud par bya'o
T02D2513:254b-37: // rdzogs sangs rgyas lngas dbang bskur te //
T02D2513:254b-38: zhes bya ba ni cho ga'i tshul nyid ni ma
T02D2513:254b-39: yin gyi srid pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa
T02D2513:254b-40: yin te / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2513:254b-41: thams cad la ni sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan du byas par mi 'dod do //
T02D2513:254b-42: byang chub sems ni zhes bya 'dis //
T02D2513:254b-43: cod pan phreng ba rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D2513:255a-0: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gis ni dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge @255a * //
T02D2513:255a-2: de nas de 'og ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2513:255a-3: ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs
T02D2513:255a-4: rgyas nas thugs rdo rje la sogs pa bzhi sprul
T02D2513:255a-5: pa'i phyir de dang lhan cig tu ji skad du
T02D2513:255a-6: bshad pa'i gnas su babs nas /
T02D2513:255a-7: spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo sangs rgyas kyi sprul ba mdzad pa'i sgyu ma spro bar bya'o //
T02D2513:255a-8: phyogs bcur khro bo bcu dang zhes bya ba ni
T02D2513:255a-9: shar la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i mthar thug par gshin
T02D2513:255a-10: rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu spro zhes
T02D2513:255a-13: 'di ltar dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus su gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba chen po dang /
T02D2513:255a-14: gnod mdzes dag steng dang 'og dang bla ga ba
T02D2513:255a-15: dang phur bu'i tshul du bsam par bya'o zhes shes
T02D2513:255a-16: par bya'o // dkyil 'khor gyi rim par phye ba
T02D2513:255a-17: las khro bo brgyad bstan pa ni nye bar mtshon
T02D2513:255a-19: ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T02D2513:255a-20: yan lag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:255a-21: yan lag bzhi yi dpung dang ldan //
T02D2513:255a-22: zhes bya ba ni lha mo bzhi'i tshogs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2513:255a-23: yan lag bzhi yi dpung dang ldan //
T02D2513:255a-24: zhes gsungs pa'i don de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2513:255a-25: bsnyems ma dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:255a-26: 'dir bsnyems ma zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ki li ki la yongs su gzung ngo //
T02D2513:255a-27: me tog ldan ma ni rdo rje chags ma'o //
T02D2513:255a-28: mtshon cha ma ni rdo rje mtshon cha ma'o //
T02D2513:255a-29: rtse mo can ni dus thams cad pa'i me tog gi phreng bas brdegs pas na /
T02D2513:255a-30: phyag rgya'i nye bar mtshon pa ni rdo rje bsnyems ma yin no //
T02D2513:255a-31: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa bzhi ni /
T02D2513:255a-32: spyan la sogs bzhi'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
T02D2513:255a-33: sgyu ma'i cha byad rnam mang po'i //
T02D2513:255a-34: zhes bya ba ni gdul bya'i yid mgu bar byed
T02D2513:255a-35: pa'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i cha byad sna tshogs pa
T02D2513:255a-36: gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:255a-37: rnam par rol pas byin gyis brlab //
T02D2513:255a-38: ces bya ba ni rnam par rol pa ste rdo
T02D2513:255a-39: rje dang padma'i rtse 'dzin byin gyis brlab cing rdzogs
T02D2513:255a-40: par mdzad pa'o // de nyid chen po'i bdag nyid ldas //
T02D2513:255a-41: zhes bya ba ni de nyid chen po ni lha mo lnga'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2513:255a-42: bdag nyid lngas zhes pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o//
T02D2513:255b-0: @255b phyogs bzhir 'khor lo gnas byas te //
T02D2513:255b-1: zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i lha mo de
T02D2513:255b-2: rnams phyogs bzhir 'khor lo ste dkyil 'khor gyi tshul
T02D2513:255b-3: gyis gnas par byas shing 'jog pa gang yin pa
T02D2513:255b-4: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:255b-5: des na rang gi dam tshig gis skul 'khyud pa'o //
T02D2513:255b-6: 'phags ma bzhi yi dga' ba ni //
T02D2513:255b-7: zhes bya ba ni spyan la sogs pa'am /
T02D2513:255b-8: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa 'phags ma
T02D2513:255b-9: bzhi po dga' bde yang dag par skyed par gang
T02D2513:255b-10: yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:255b-11: dga' bas zhes bya ba ni rang gi dam tshig
T02D2513:255b-12: gi phyag rgya'i dga' ba las byung ba'i so so
T02D2513:255b-13: rang gis rig pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo ste /
T02D2513:255b-14: de'i rjes la ji skad du bshad pa'i khro bo rnams spro bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2513:255b-15: de ltar spro ba bstan nas /
T02D2513:255b-16: da ni thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pas bsdu ba gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2513:255b-17: ji skad du gsungs pa'i spro ba sna tshogs pas
T02D2513:255b-18: khyab par byas nas bkug ste dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor
T02D2513:255b-20: de'i dbus su sna tshogs pa gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma ste /
T02D2513:255b-21: 'di dag gis ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces
T02D2513:255b-22: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin
T02D2513:255b-23: no // las kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge
T02D2513:255b-24: 'dzin gsum pa ste gsang ba'i tshogs mthon po la
T02D2513:255b-25: sogs pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:255b-26: ting nge 'dzin gsum bskyed nas da ni bzlas pa dang bsgom par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2513:255b-27: rab dga'i longs spyod longs spyod pa //
T02D2513:255b-28: zhes bya ba gsungs te shes rab dang thabs las byung ba'i khyad par ni rab tu dga' ba'o //
T02D2513:255b-29: de la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to /
T02D2513:255b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni slar yang ye
T02D2513:255b-33: shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs shing bstod pa la
T02D2513:255b-34: sogs pa byas nas ci rigs pa dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2513:255b-35: 'khor gyi 'khor lo dam tshig gi phyag rgyas ting
T02D2513:255b-36: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par blta zhing bsam
T02D2513:255b-37: pa nyid dang bdag nyid kyang rjes su mnyes pa
T02D2513:255b-39: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga na
T02D2513:255b-40: badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes bya bas
T02D2513:255b-42: rdo rje'i gzugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i padma des
T02D2513:255b-43: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rol pa nyid
T02D2513:256a-1: gzhug par bya zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2513:256a-2: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02D2513:256a-3: padma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:256a-4: dam tshig gi lha mo'i padma'i gzugs kyis gzugs rnams
T02D2513:256a-5: rab tu dga' ba gang yin pa da las sangs
T02D2513:256a-6: rgyas dang rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa spro zhes
T02D2513:256a-8: yang na blta zhes bya ba snga ma dang sbyar ro //
T02D2513:256a-10: zhes ji skad du gsungs pa de nyid kyi khyad
T02D2513:256a-11: par ni ma lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:256a-12: yin te / 'ang zhes bya ba'i sga'i don lhag
T02D2513:256a-13: ma ma lus pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor lo rnams
T02D2513:256a-14: kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:256a-15: mdog ldan zhes bya ba ni rigs dang rjes su
T02D2513:256a-16: mthun pa dang las dang rjes su mthun pa dang
T02D2513:256a-17: ldan pa'i bdag nyid can gyi gzugs ni mdog ldan
T02D2513:256a-19: mdog dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid can gyi gzugs kyang
T02D2513:256a-20: yin la spro ba yang yin pas de skad ces
T02D2513:256a-21: bya'o // de yang ji skad du bshad pa'i yi
T02D2513:256a-22: ge ae dang aa las byung pa'i sna tshogs rdo
T02D2513:256a-23: rje ska rags kyis nye par mdzes pa /
T02D2513:256a-24: yi ge tram las byung pa'i rin po che zur gsum gyi nang du chud pa /
T02D2513:256a-25: yi ge hri las byung pa'i padma'i dbus na gnas pa las /
T02D2513:256a-26: mdog dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid can gyi gzugs su
T02D2513:256a-27: spro pa'i lha mo'i 'khor lo gang yin pa de
T02D2513:256a-28: la de skad ces bya ste de ltar yang blta'o
T02D2513:256a-29: zhes bya ba snga ma dang sbyar ro //
T02D2513:256a-30: rdo rje gzhug par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ji ltar bsam zhe na /
T02D2513:256a-31: rgyud rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:256a-32: rgyud gzhan dag las byung pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dngos su'am /
T02D2513:256a-33: bsam gtan las bdag nyid can byung ba rang gi bsam gtan la gnas par bsam mo //
T02D2513:256a-34: sgeg mo glu dang gar rnams dang //
T02D2513:256a-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sku rdo rje
T02D2513:256a-36: la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i tshul gyis padmar rdo rje
T02D2513:256a-37: bcug ste / aom sarba tva th'a ga ta p'u
T02D2513:256a-38: dza badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod
T02D2513:256a-40: sgeg mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos mod
T02D2513:256a-41: kyi phreng ba mas kyang mchod par bya zhes bya'o
T02D2513:256a-42: // phyi'i mchod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2513:256a-43: gang 'di ltar gsungs mod kyi 'o na kyang phyi'i
T02D2513:256a-44: mchod pa dang sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa
T02D2513:256b-0: la snyoms par 'jug pa'i @256b mchod pa'i rim gyis
T02D2513:256b-1: phyi dang gsang pa'i mchod pa bya'o zhes ston pa
T02D2513:256b-2: yin no // bsgom pas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor bsgom pas so //
T02D2513:256b-3: myur ches pa dang bul ches dang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni shas cher 'di ltar mi bya'o //
T02D2513:256b-4: gug skyed nyams min par zhes bya ba ni 'di dag mchad par mi bya'o //
T02D2513:256b-5: rtog pa ngan pa spangs te zhes bya ba ni
T02D2513:256b-6: rtag pa dang chad pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa
T02D2513:256b-8: ba dan tshul du bya bas zhes bya ba ni
T02D2513:256b-9: sngar bshad pa'i mchod pa nyi shu nye par mtshon
T02D2513:256b-10: pa yin no // mchod ces bya ba la bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02D2513:256b-11: gshegs su gsol zhes bya ba ni slar gshegs su gsol pa ste /
T02D2513:256b-12: sprul pa rnams ni rang gi lus nyid la nye par bsdu par bya'o //
T02D2513:256b-13: sku dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2513:256b-14: bar chad byed pa rnams la ni //
T02D2513:256b-15: zhes bya ba ni bgegs kyis gtses par gyur pa'o //
T02D2513:256b-16: rdo rje theg pa rab rdzogs pa //
T02D2513:256b-17: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02D2513:256b-18: sna tshogs las rnams ston pa po //
T02D2513:256b-19: zhes bya ba ni don yod par grub pa'o //
T02D2513:256b-20: rin chen zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D2513:256b-21: 'dod chags chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D2513:256b-22: dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D2513:256b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i phul du byed pa'o //
T02D2513:256b-25: de'i ye shes byung pa'i yon tan thob nas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa'o //
T02D2513:256b-26: 'dir rnal 'byor rnams kyis rim pa dang /
T02D2513:256b-27: lha bsgom pa'i tshul rgya cher ni de kho na nyid bsdus pa dang /
T02D2513:256b-28: gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa las byung pa de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:256b-29: sgrub pa'i thabs logs na yod pas 'dir ma bris so //
T02D2513:256b-30: yongs su rtog pa'i rnal 'byor mang du yod mod kyi 'dir ma bstan no //
T02D2513:256b-31: byang chub kyi sems ni ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D2513:256b-32: bsgom pa ni yang dang yang du mngon du byed pa'o //
T02D2513:256b-33: de'i ye shes sgrub pa ni byang chub kyi sems
T02D2513:256b-34: rnam pa gnyis mngon par rtogs pa'i tshul dus nges
T02D2513:256b-35: par so sor bsgrub pa ste /
T02D2513:257a-0: de ston pa'i gzhung gi le'u la rim par phye @257a * //
T02D2513:257a-3: / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa rdzogs su zin
T02D2513:257a-4: kyang sbyor pa'i thabs med par phun sum tshogs par
T02D2513:257a-5: mi 'gyur pas / de nas zhes bya ba la
T02D2513:257a-6: sogs pas brgyad pa sbyor pa'i thabs kyi sgrub pa'i
T02D2513:257a-7: rim par phye ba gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2513:257a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2513:257a-9: ci zhig mdzad nas she na /
T02D2513:257a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02D2513:257a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de bzhin
T02D2513:257a-12: gshegs pa thams cad de rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D2513:257a-13: sogs pa'i bka' ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las
T02D2513:257a-14: skyed pa'o // de la bskyed pa'i don gyi 'khor
T02D2513:257a-15: lo ni dkyil 'khor te de rab tu bsgrub cing
T02D2513:257a-16: bskyed pas de'i don du ye shes kyi rdo rje
T02D2513:257a-17: la dmigs pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba la
T02D2513:257a-18: sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin te //
T02D2513:257a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhi ba la sogs
T02D2513:257a-20: pa'i las byed pa'i dkyil 'khor ston pa'i rnam pa
T02D2513:257a-21: la thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i don
T02D2513:257a-22: to // 'khor lo thams cad ces bya ba la
T02D2513:257a-23: sogs pa la 'khor lo thams cad la rang gi
T02D2513:257a-24: ming las byung pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu
T02D2513:257a-25: to // bsgrub te / zhi bal sogs pa la
T02D2513:257a-26: rab tu sbyor pa'i las gang yin pa de'i tshogs
T02D2513:257a-27: to // bsgrub te / ni mang po'o // de'i
T02D2513:257a-28: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi cho ga
T02D2513:257a-29: bka' stsal to zhes pa ste gsungs pa'o //
T02D2513:257a-30: lha ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnam
T02D2513:257a-31: par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha gang yang rung
T02D2513:257a-32: ba zhig dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bkod na dkyil
T02D2513:257a-34: rnam par snang mdzad 'byung ba rdo rje zhes mkhas pa rnams kyis brjod do //
T02D2513:257a-36: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ni sngar bshad pa nyid do //
T02D2513:257a-37: gang gi tshe mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi'i
T02D2513:257a-38: dkyil 'khor byed pa de'i tshe dbus su gang bris
T02D2513:257a-39: pa'i gnas su rnam par snang mdzad bri'o zhes kha
T02D2513:257a-40: cig zer ro // gzhan dag ni mi bskyod pa'i
T02D2513:257a-41: dkyil 'khor la rnams par snang mdzad ni mi bskyod
T02D2513:257a-42: cig zer ro // pa'i gnas su'o // de'i gnas su ni mi bskyod pa bri'o //
T02D2513:257b-0: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil @257b 'khor la ni
T02D2513:257b-1: rnam par snang mdzad ni mi bskyod pa'i gnas su
T02D2513:257b-2: mi bskyod pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas
T02D2513:257b-3: su rin chen 'byung ldan ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2513:257b-4: kyi gnas su bri'o zhes zer ro //
T02D2513:257b-5: 'od dpag tu med pa dang don yod grub pa'i
T02D2513:257b-6: dkyil 'khor la yang 'di nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs
T02D2513:257b-8: spyan la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang rnam par
T02D2513:257b-9: snang mdzad nyid spyan la sogs pa'i gzugs ji lta
T02D2513:257b-10: bar bsams la / spyan la sogs pa yang rang nyid kyi gnas su bzhugs par bsgom mo //
T02D2513:257b-11: 'od zer can la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha
T02D2513:257b-12: lam gtogs pa'i lha rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la ni
T02D2513:257b-13: byang chub kyi sems rim par phye pa'i rim pa
T02D2513:257b-14: nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sku
T02D2513:257b-15: yongs su gyur pa nyid 'od zer can la sogs
T02D2513:257b-16: pa'i lha rnams kyi gzugs su gyur nas rang gi
T02D2513:257b-18: lha lhag ma rnams kyi tshul ni de bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02D2513:257b-19: 'phrog ma'i drag po sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du ni /
T02D2513:257b-20: ji skad du bshad pa las de'i rim pa gzhan yin te /
T02D2513:257b-22: khro bo'i 'khor lor gnod spyin mo //
T02D2513:257b-23: brgyad kyi dbus na 'phrog mas brgyan //
T02D2513:257b-24: gnod sbyin brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D2513:257b-25: gnod spyin mo kun bsgrub par bya //
T02D2513:257b-27: de la ma gtogs par bshad pa'i gnod spyin dang /
T02D2513:257b-28: gnod spyin mo gzhan dag sgrub pa la ni tshul 'di nyid yin te /
T02D2513:257b-29: gnod spyin me gang sgrub pa de dbus su bkod pa de la dbus su ni 'phrog ma'o //
T02D2513:257b-30: gnod spyin dang gnod sbyin mor bshad pa la ma
T02D2513:257b-31: gtogs pa rigs gzhan dag sgrub pa la thams cad
T02D2513:257b-32: du 'phrog ma med par de'i gnas su bsgrub par
T02D2513:257b-33: bya ba'i gnod spyin nam gnod spyin mo bsam par
T02D2513:257b-34: bya'o // la la ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2513:257b-35: dkyil 'khor bton nas de'i gnas su bshad pa dang
T02D2513:257b-36: bya'o // / ma bshad pa'i gnod spyin dang gnod
T02D2513:257b-37: spyin mo bkod la sngon du 'gro bas bsgrub par
T02D2513:257b-39: des ni drag po'i sgrub pa'i gzhung gi don yang
T02D2513:257b-40: dag par rtogs par shes mod kyi sngar bshad pa'i
T02D2513:258a-0: don de nyid gzhung dang rjes su mthun @258a *
T02D2513:258a-2: lha chen po la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni
T02D2513:258a-3: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gnas su khro
T02D2513:258a-5: sgyu ma'i rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu dang
T02D2513:258a-6: mi smra ba'i rdo rje dang rdo rje mtshon cha
T02D2513:258a-7: grangs ji lta ba bzhin du dgod par shes par
T02D2513:258a-8: bya ste / de la rdo rje dril bu ni
T02D2513:258a-9: mdog dmar ba gdong drug pa lag pa bzhi pa
T02D2513:258a-10: g-yas na mdung thung dang dril bu thogs pa /
T02D2513:258a-11: g-yon na khyim bya dang dril bu 'dzin pa rma bya la zhon pa'o //
T02D2513:258a-12: rdo rje mtshon cha ni mdog ser skya lag pa bzhi pa /
T02D2513:258a-13: g-yas na rdo rje dang lcags kyu thogs pa /
T02D2513:258a-14: g-yon gyi gcig gis ni stan la bsnyems thabs su 'dug la /
T02D2513:258a-15: gnyis pas ni rang gi rdo rje 'dzin pa glang po che dkar po la zhon pa'o //
T02D2513:258a-16: spyan ma la sogs pa'i gnas su ni 'jigs byed ma la sogs pa lha mo zhi ste /
T02D2513:258a-17: de la 'jigs byed ma ni mdog ljang gu g-yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa /
T02D2513:258a-18: g-yon gyis ral phub thogs pa'o //
T02D2513:258a-19: dpal mo ni mdog ser ba g-yas na rdo rje g-yon na padma thogs pa'o //
T02D2513:258a-20: dbyangs can ma ni mdog ljang gu g-yas g-yon gnyis na rdo rje dang pi wang thogs pa'o //
T02D2513:258a-21: dka' thub zlog ma ni mdog ljang gu g-yas kyi
T02D2513:258a-22: lag pa gnyis na rdo rje dang 'khor lo thogs
T02D2513:258a-23: pa / g-yon gnyis na dung dang po ti thogs pa seng ge zhon pa'o //
T02D2513:258a-24: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i gnas su ni
T02D2513:258a-25: drag mo dang tshangs ma dang khyab 'jug ma dang
T02D2513:258a-30: srin mo rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02D2513:258a-31: de la 'di rnams kyi lag pa la lag cha ni mdung rtse gsum pa dang /
T02D2513:258a-32: phreng ba dang 'khor lo dang dril bu dang /
T02D2513:258a-33: gri dang chu gri dang mche ba dang kha tv'am
T02D2513:258a-34: ga rim bzhin thogs pa g-yon gyi sdigs mdzub bsgreng
T02D2513:258a-35: pa'o // phyi'i dkyil 'khor du gshin rje gshed la sogs pa dgod pa yang de bzhin te /
T02D2513:258a-36: 'di ni khro bo rdo rje drag po sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2513:258a-37: khro bo rdo rje ma gtogs pa'i lha gzhan sgrub
T02D2513:258a-38: pa la ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
T02D2513:258a-40: 'dir ma bshad pa'i sgrub thabs la /
T02D2513:258a-41: rdo rje'i rigs pa mchog bton la /
T02D2513:258a-42: de'i gnas su rang gi bsgrub par bya ba'i ting
T02D2513:258a-43: nge 'dzin 'jig rten pa'i lha gang yang rung ba
T02D2513:258b-0: dgod par @258b bya'o zhes khong du chud par bya'o
T02D2513:258b-1: // 'di yang la la dag ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor du de bton la /
T02D2513:258b-2: lha chen po la sogs pa gang yang rung ba
T02D2513:258b-3: dgod pa sngon du 'gro pas bsgrub pa ni shin
T02D2513:258b-4: tu 'brel pa med par smra pa yin pas de'i
T02D2513:258b-6: ji skad bshad pa 'di nyid shin tu rigs pa kho nar mthong ngo //
T02D2513:258b-8: rdo rje'i ting 'dzin bsgoms nas ni //
T02D2513:258b-9: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis bskul na //
T02D2513:258b-10: mod la dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2513:258b-11: zhes sngar bshad pa yin no //
T02D2513:258b-12: zhi dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2513:258b-13: rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sbyor pas dkyil
T02D2513:258b-14: 'khor gyi lha rnams bsgoms te las dang rjes su
T02D2513:258b-15: mthun par lha rnams sprul la /
T02D2513:258b-16: che ge mo'i zhi bar mdzod cig ces bya ba
T02D2513:258b-17: la sogs pa bskul pa'i tshig dang ldan pas gsang
T02D2513:258b-18: sngags bzlas nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams
T02D2513:258b-19: la lha'i 'khor lo nges par sbyar pas las de
T02D2513:258b-20: rnams bya'o // de ltar bstan nas da ni zhi
T02D2513:258b-21: ba spyan dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa lha
T02D2513:258b-22: rnams kyi so sor nges pa las de nyid du
T02D2513:258b-23: gsungs pa yin te thams cad du yang /
T02D2513:258b-24: gsum pa'i mtha' can dag gis bya //
T02D2513:258b-25: zhes 'og nas bshad pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2513:258b-26: 'od zer can dang ri khrod ma //
T02D2513:258b-27: zhes bya ba 'dir sbyar par bya zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02D2513:258b-28: chags pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni snying rje chen po'i chags pa'o //
T02D2513:258b-29: gsang sngags de nyid kyis bskul na //
T02D2513:258b-30: zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags la las dang rjes
T02D2513:258b-31: su mthun par bskul pa'i tshig bcug pas yang dag
T02D2513:258b-32: par bskul pa'o // lha rnams kyi so so'i nges
T02D2513:258b-33: pa bstan nas da ni spyan dang zhes bya ba
T02D2513:258b-34: la sogs pas las kyi sbyor pa nges par gsungs
T02D2513:258b-35: par bskul pa'o // te / ril ba spyi blugs kyis brgyan pa //
T02D2513:258b-36: zhes bya ba ni phreng ba dang ril ba spyi blugs kyis mdzes par byas pa'o //
T02D2513:258b-37: dang po ting 'dzin gyis sprul nas //
T02D2513:258b-38: zhes bya ba ni dang po ste thog mar ting
T02D2513:258b-39: nge 'dzin de bsam gtan gyis sprul cing bskyed nas
T02D2513:258b-40: / bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bsam pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:258b-42: rnam par snang mdzad gnas 'dug ste //
T02D2513:258b-43: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2513:258b-44: bum pa zla ba'i mdangs ldan pa //
T02D2513:259a-0: zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i @259a * //
