T02D2513:259a-2: bdud rtsi 'o mas rab bkang ste //
T02D2513:259a-3: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi chus
T02D2513:259a-4: bkang pa lag pa gnyis kyis 'dzin par bsam mo
T02D2513:259a-6: lag gnyis pad rtsa dkar mchog gi //
T02D2513:259a-7: zhes bya ba ni lag pa padma'i rtsa ba'i mdog
T02D2513:259a-8: ltar dkar pa'i mchog gang yin pa de la de
T02D2513:259a-9: skad ces bya'o // 'di skad ston te /
T02D2513:259a-10: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2513:259a-11: steng du rnam par snang mdzad dbang po zhi zhing
T02D2513:259a-12: sku mdog dkar bar bdag nyid bsgoms la rang gi
T02D2513:259a-13: snying gar nad pa bsam ste /
T02D2513:259a-14: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang yang dag
T02D2513:259a-15: par sbyor pa'i byang chub kyi sems las spyan dang
T02D2513:259a-16: skul byed ma'i ngo bor rnam par bsams la /
T02D2513:259a-17: phyag gnyis kyis ji skad du bshad pa'i bum pa bsnams shing /
T02D2513:259a-18: phyag gzhan phreng ba dang ril pa spyi blugs kyis brgyan pa sprul la /
T02D2513:259a-19: de rnams kyis nam mkha' bkang ste sngags brjod pa
T02D2513:259a-20: las byung pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams kyis bskul
T02D2513:259a-21: la bsgrub par bya ba la dbang bskur te der
T02D2513:259a-22: rab tu zhugs nas yang de rnams kyi ba spu'i
T02D2513:259a-23: bu ga rnams las rnam par snang mdzad kha sbyar
T02D2513:259a-24: gyi sbyor pas phyung ba las yang dag par byung
T02D2513:259a-25: pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi chu'i rgyun rnams kyis
T02D2513:259a-26: de la dbang bskur par bya'o //
T02D2513:259a-27: de nas de rnams kyang de nyid du rab tu zhugs par yang shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:259a-28: sbyor ba 'di dag dang 'brel pa gzhan dag las kyang /
T02D2513:259a-29: ba spu'i bu ga rnams las ni //
T02D2513:259a-30: sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par spro //
T02D2513:259a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston pa yin no //
T02D2513:259a-32: de nas des bla na med pa'i zhi ba thob par rnam par bsam mo //
T02D2513:259a-33: rin chen ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2513:259a-34: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ting nge 'dzin du dang
T02D2513:259a-35: por sprul cing bsam mo zhes bya ba ni lhag
T02D2513:259a-36: ma'o // rin chen ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rin chen sgrol ma'o //
T02D2513:259a-37: phyag na rin chen padma can //
T02D2513:259a-38: zhes bya ba ni phyag gnyis kyis padma dang rin po che bsnams la /
T02D2513:259a-39: cig shos gnyis kyis ni ji skad du bshad pa'i bum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2513:259a-40: bdud rtsis rab tu gang ba dang //
T02D2513:259a-41: zhes bya ba ni bsam mo zhes snga ma dang sbyar ro //
T02D2513:259b-0: dkyil 'khor gyi @259b dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2513:259b-1: ser po'i steng du bdag nyid rin chen 'byung ldan
T02D2513:259b-2: sku mdog ser por bsams la /
T02D2513:259b-3: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bsgrub
T02D2513:259b-4: bya bsams nas snga ma bzhin du rin chen sgrol
T02D2513:259b-5: ma dang gos dkar mo'i gzugs la phyag gnyis na
T02D2513:259b-7: de las gzhan pa'i phyag gis padma dang rin po che bsnams pa sprul la /
T02D2513:259b-8: de rnams kyis nam mkha' ma lus par bkang ste /
T02D2513:259b-9: de bzhin du bkug nas bsgrub par bya ba la
T02D2513:259b-10: dbang bskur la de rnams der rab tu gzhug go
T02D2513:259b-11: // de nas yang de'i pa spu'i bu ga rnams
T02D2513:259b-12: las rin chen 'byung ldan ma bzhin du phyung la
T02D2513:259b-13: // / de las byung pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi chu'i rgyun gyis mngon par dbang bskur la /
T02D2513:259b-14: de yang der gzhug par bya bar shes par bya ste /
T02D2513:259b-15: ba spu'i bu ga rnams las ni //
T02D2513:259b-16: rin chen sprin ni spro par bya //
T02D2513:259b-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston pa yin no //
T02D2513:259b-18: de rnams kyis bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas thob par gyur par bsam mo //
T02D2513:259b-19: lha mo sku chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2513:259b-20: 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog dmar por bsam zhes bya ba la ni lhag ma'o //
T02D2513:259b-21: sgrol ma de bzhin lu gu rgyud //
T02D2513:259b-22: ces bya ba ni sgrol ma dang lu gu rgyud dang bcas par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2513:259b-23: phyag gnyis na ni zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa /
T02D2513:259b-24: phyag cig shos gnyis na ni me tog can gyi mda' dang zhu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2513:259b-25: de nas de dag bsam pa ni /
T02D2513:259b-26: bkug ste mda' yis bsnun na ni //
T02D2513:259b-28: lcags kyus bkug la mda' bsnun pa'o //
T02D2513:259b-29: nye par mtshon pa 'dis ni zhags pas bcings pas kyang dbang du mdzad pa'o //
T02D2513:259b-30: 'di skad ston te rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
T02D2513:259b-31: su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor padma dmar po'i mdog can
T02D2513:259b-32: / de'i steng du bdag nyid 'od dpag tu med
T02D2513:259b-33: pa mdog dmar ba rang gi snying gar zla ba'i
T02D2513:259b-34: dkyil 'khor padma dmar po'i mdog can la bsgrub par
T02D2513:259b-35: bya ba bsams nas snga ma bzhin du sgrol ma
T02D2513:259b-36: dang lu gu rgyud kyi gzugs can ma ji skad
T02D2513:259b-37: du bshad pa'i mtshon cha thogs pa sprul nas /
T02D2513:259b-38: des nam mkha' ma lus par bkang bas bsgrub par bya ba bcings nas bkug ste /
T02D2513:259b-39: rang gi snying gar bcug nas /
T02D2513:260a-0: snga ma bzhin du mda'i sbyor @260a * //
T02D2513:260a-1: bas bsnun pas de rnams der gzhug go //
T02D2513:260a-2: de nas yang de'i ba spu'i bu ga rnams las
T02D2513:260a-3: 'od dpag tu med pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2513:260a-4: phyung la / de las byung pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D2513:260a-5: sems kyi chu'i rgyun gyis de dbang bskur nas de'ang
T02D2513:260a-6: der gzhug go zhes snga ma bzhin du shes par
T02D2513:260a-7: phyung la / bya'o // de nas de bla na
T02D2513:260a-8: med pa'i dbang du 'gyur pa thob par bsam par
T02D2513:260a-9: phyung la / bya'o // bya'o // yams dang zhes
T02D2513:260a-10: bya ba la sogs pa la yams ni nad 'go
T02D2513:260a-12: khyim la sogs par srin po la sogs pa mthong
T02D2513:260a-13: ba ste des byas pa'i nye par 'tshe ba ni
T02D2513:260a-14: gnod pa ste / nye bar 'tshe ba de rnams
T02D2513:260a-15: gzhig cing bskyab pa'i phyir 'od zer can dang ri
T02D2513:260a-16: khrod can gyi shing lo ma rab tu sbyar par
T02D2513:260a-18: ji ltar zhe na sku chen gyis kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:260a-19: sngar bshad pa'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni ting
T02D2513:260a-20: nge 'dzin rim par phye ba las gsungs pa'i tshul
T02D2513:260a-21: du mtshon cha la sogs pa bsnams par bsam par
T02D2513:260a-22: bya'o // ci zhig byas nas she na /
T02D2513:260a-23: bdud rtsi yis kyang rnam par bzlog / ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2513:260a-24: bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa'i rgyur gyur pas yams dang
T02D2513:260a-25: gnod pa'i rnam pa bzlog par bya'o zhes shes par
T02D2513:260a-27: rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2513:260a-28: 'khor ljang gu de'i steng du bdag nyid don yod
T02D2513:260a-29: par grub pa sku mdog margad lta bu'i mdog can
T02D2513:260a-30: gyi rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdog
T02D2513:260a-31: ljang gu la bsgrub par bya ba bsams te /
T02D2513:260a-32: 'od zer can dang ri khrod kyi lo ma can
T02D2513:260a-33: gyi gzugs la khro po ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2513:260a-34: skur sprul pa de rnams kyis nam mkha' ma lus
T02D2513:260a-35: par bkang ste / de'i lus las byung pa'i khro
T02D2513:260a-36: bo 'bar ba rnams kyis gdug pa rnams kyi mig
T02D2513:260a-37: dang kha tshems shing thal bar byas par rnam par
T02D2513:260a-38: par bkang ste / bsams la / 'od zer can
T02D2513:260a-39: la sogs pa'i lha mo'i tshul gyis zhi pa'i gzugs
T02D2513:260a-40: su yongs su gyur nas bum pa thogs pa bkug
T02D2513:260a-41: nas dbang bskur te de rnams der gzhug go //
T02D2513:260a-42: de nas yang de'i ba spu'i bu ga rnams nas
T02D2513:260a-43: don yod par grub pa ji lta ba sprul la
T02D2513:260a-44: / de las byung pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi chu'i rgyun gyis dbang bskur te /
T02D2513:260b-0: de yang der rab tu @260b zhugs pa ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:260b-1: de nas de nye bar 'tshe ba dang bral pa rnam par bsam mo //
T02D2513:260b-2: margad lta bu'i mdog can la //
T02D2513:260b-3: zhes bya ba ni don yod par grub pa sku
T02D2513:260b-4: mdog ljang gu'i rnam par bsams la bshad ma thag
T02D2513:260b-5: pa'i sbyor ba bya'o zhes ston pa yin no //
T02D2513:260b-6: la la dag ni mi bskyod pa margad kyi mdog lta bu'i zhes zer te /
T02D2513:260b-7: de ni mdog dang rjes su mi mthun pas mi rigs so //
T02D2513:260b-8: h'um zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D2513:260b-9: zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um 'don pa ste /
T02D2513:260b-10: mi bskyod pa sku mdog aindra n'i la lta bur bsam mo zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02D2513:260b-11: rdo rjes bsdigs par brtson pa yis //
T02D2513:260b-12: zhes bya ba ni nye par mtshon pa 'dis ni
T02D2513:260b-13: ting nge 'dzin rim par phye ba las gsungs pa'i
T02D2513:260b-14: mtshon cha bsnams pa yin par rigs so //
T02D2513:260b-15: 'di skad ston te rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
T02D2513:260b-16: su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bdag nyid
T02D2513:260b-17: mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon por bsams la /
T02D2513:260b-18: rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bsgrub
T02D2513:260b-19: par bya ba srung ba dang bral zhing lhas spangs
T02D2513:260b-20: par bsams la snga ma bzhin du khro gnyer can
T02D2513:260b-21: dang m'a ma k'i'i gzugs kyi sprul pas nam mkha'
T02D2513:260b-22: ma lus pa kun bkang ste /
T02D2513:260b-23: de bzhin du bkug nas rdo rje me'i 'char gyis bsregs la de rnams der gzhug go //
T02D2513:260b-24: yang de'i ba spu'i bu ga rnams las mi bskyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du sprul la /
T02D2513:260b-25: de bzhin du rdo rje me'i 'char 'bebs par bya ste /
T02D2513:260b-26: de'i lus la de zhugs pas bskams shing shi bar bsam mo //
T02D2513:260b-27: yan lag gzhig pa la yang cho ga 'di nyis bya'o //
T02D2513:260b-28: 'di ni nang gi zhi ba la sogs pa'i cho ga ste /
T02D2513:260b-29: bsgrub par bya ba mdun du bsams la las lnga po bya ba ni phyi'i cho ga'o //
T02D2513:260b-30: byin brlabs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la byin
T02D2513:260b-31: gyis brlabs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni rdo rje sems
T02D2513:260b-32: ma'o // dam tshig dang dbang bskur pa'i ngo bo nyid ni rin chen sems ma'o //
T02D2513:260b-33: de nyid 'og nas gsungs pa ni /
T02D2513:260b-34: rdo rje sems ma rin chen 'chang //
T02D2513:260b-36: chos dang rdo rje las chos ma //
T02D2513:260b-37: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sems ma dang las kyi sems ma ste /
T02D2513:260b-38: de ltar na lha mo bzhi po'i 'di nyid sbyar ro //
T02D2513:260b-40: sbyor ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2513:260b-41: bshad ma thag pa'i zhi ba la sogs pa'i las bzhi'i tshig sbyar ro //
T02D2513:261a-1: bcu drug ces bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa 'dis ni tshad gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2513:261a-2: chos dang byams pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
T02D2513:261a-3: rang gi phyogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2513:261a-4: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs na gnas pa'i byams pa
T02D2513:261a-5: la sogs pas zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang
T02D2513:261a-6: dang yams dang gnod pa nye bar zhi ba'i las
T02D2513:261a-8: 'bras bu don yod spyin byed pa'i //
T02D2513:261a-9: khro bo'i lus la legs gnas te //
T02D2513:261a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni don chen po
T02D2513:261a-11: nyid yin pa'i phyir bstan pa'i don du slar yang
T02D2513:261a-12: mngon spyod kyi las bya ba gsungs pa yin te
T02D2513:261a-13: / khro bo'i lus la zhes bya ba ni gshin
T02D2513:261a-14: rje gshed la sogs pa'i skur legs par gnas par
T02D2513:261a-15: / byas la / khro bo'i rgyal po las la nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2513:261a-16: ji ltar zhe na dam tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:261a-17: dam tshig la sogs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2513:261a-18: la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la gnas
T02D2513:261a-19: shing sku gsung thugs sgom pas rnam par bsgom pa'o
T02D2513:261a-20: // bskul ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dkon
T02D2513:261a-21: mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa'o zhes bya ba
T02D2513:261a-22: la sogs pa'i bskul ba rnams kyis phyung ste zhes
T02D2513:261a-24: de'i ras zhes bya ba ni dur khrod kyi ras so //
T02D2513:261a-25: de'i gzugs brnyan bcing bar bya //
T02D2513:261a-26: zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lus kyi rnam pa dang 'dra bar byas la bya'o //
T02D2513:261a-27: phur bu zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du mngon par 'dus byas pas so //
T02D2513:261a-28: me 'bar ba la zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba'i
T02D2513:261a-29: me la ste bskams pa dang bcad pa ni snga
T02D2513:261a-30: ma bzhin te / gong nas gong du phul du byung ba'i sbyor bas so //
T02D2513:261a-31: rus sbal gyi ni rkang stabs sbyar //
T02D2513:261a-32: zhes bya ba ni tsog tsog por 'dug ste rkang
T02D2513:261a-33: ba g-yon pa'i steng du rkang ba g-yas pa gzhag
T02D2513:261a-34: par bya ba ni rus sbal gyi rkang stabs kyi
T02D2513:261a-35: mtshan nyid do // las 'di zhes bya ba ni las rnams so //
T02D2513:261a-37: rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gshin rje gshed
T02D2513:261a-38: la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i sbyor bas 'dug
T02D2513:261a-39: la / dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa'i bsgrub bya mdun du bsams te /
T02D2513:261a-40: de'i snying gar de rang gi lha 'dod pa'i rgyal
T02D2513:261b-0: pos bkug la de'i mgo @261b 'khor lo'am padma'am rdo
T02D2513:261b-1: rje 'bar ba kun du 'khrugs pa rnam par bsams
T02D2513:261b-2: la / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la
T02D2513:261b-3: sogs pas ji lta ba bzhin du bzlog la bsgrub
T02D2513:261b-4: par bya ba'i snying ga'i zla ba la de'i ming
T02D2513:261b-5: la / bris la / aom ma ni ri ti
T02D2513:261b-6: na ra ba ti ra dz'a yo gi ni dza
T02D2513:261b-7: la / bris la / sv'a h'a / zhes bya
T02D2513:261b-8: ba kha dog lnga pa'i 'od zar gyi tshogs kyis
T02D2513:261b-9: ming drangs nas bkug pa'i tshul du rig sngags dang
T02D2513:261b-10: spel bas rang gi rkang ba'i 'og tu gzhag go
T02D2513:261b-11: la / bris la / sv'a h'a / // de
T02D2513:261b-12: nas byang chub sems kyi ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2513:261b-14: mgo dang spyi gtsug la sogs pa'i srung ba bsal la /
T02D2513:261b-15: ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis de'i gzugs brnyan
T02D2513:261b-16: bskyed de rnam par shes pa rlung dang 'dra zhing
T02D2513:261b-17: srin bu me khyer lta bur lcags kyus bkug nas
T02D2513:261b-18: / zhags pas gzhug cing lcags sgrog gis bcings te
T02D2513:261b-19: gzir ba 'di lta bu zhag bdun gyi bar du'o
T02D2513:261b-20: / // de nas rkang bas mnan la dus de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2513:261b-21: de nas po son cha'i tsher mas phug la dus de srid kyi bar du bzla'o //
T02D2513:261b-22: de nas phur bus btab la de bzhin du bzla'o //
T02D2513:261b-23: de nas mes gdung bar bya'o //
T02D2513:261b-25: de nas sbyin sreg byed cing zhag bdun bzla'o //
T02D2513:261b-26: de ltar nyin zhag bdun khro bo'i nga rgyal byas
T02D2513:261b-27: la 'bar ba'i lus kyis las byas na nges par
T02D2513:261b-29: cho ga bzhin du dgug par bya //
T02D2513:261b-30: zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i chogs so //
T02D2513:261b-31: rdo rje gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo'o //
T02D2513:261b-32: bsnun par byed pa zhes bya ba ni brdeg bzhin pa'o //
T02D2513:261b-33: gtub pa dang zhes bya ba ni rnam par gzhig pa'o //
T02D2513:261b-34: rgyu ma lang long nar bar bsam //
T02D2513:261b-35: zhes bya ba ni rgyu ma dang yan lag kun
T02D2513:261b-36: dbral zhing nar la bsgrub par bya ba 'jig pas
T02D2513:261b-37: rnam par myos par bsam par bya'o zhes snga ma
T02D2513:261b-38: dang sbyar ro // 'di skad ston te rang gi
T02D2513:261b-39: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gshen rje gshed la sogs
T02D2513:261b-40: pa gang yang rung pa'i sbyor bas 'dug la bsgrub
T02D2513:261b-41: par bya ba mdun du bsams te /
T02D2513:261b-42: srung ba la sogs pa dang phral la /
T02D2513:261b-43: ji skad du bshad pa'i khro bo sprul nas /
T02D2513:262a-0: la las ni zhags pas bcings nas lho phyogs su khrid @262a * //
T02D2513:262a-2: la las ni rdo rjes brdeg bzhin pa dang la
T02D2513:262a-3: las ni gtun shing gis brdung bzhin pa dang la
T02D2513:262a-4: las ni 'khor los gcod bzhin pa dang /
T02D2513:262a-5: la las ni lcags kyu la sogs pas 'dren bzhin pa dang /
T02D2513:262a-6: la las ni za bzhin par rnam par bsams la
T02D2513:262a-7: sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyas
T02D2513:262a-8: bcings te 'bar ba'i tshul gyis ji skad du bshad
T02D2513:262a-10: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams de gsod bar brtson par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2513:262a-11: ming nas bskul bar bya ba ni che ga mo
T02D2513:262a-12: zo shig ces bya ba la sogs pas bskul pa
T02D2513:262a-13: ste / sngar bshad pa'i bskul pa'i sbyor ba 'di dang sbyar ro //
T02D2513:262a-14: rlung gi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sbyor ba gzhan gsungs pa'o //
T02D2513:262a-15: rdo rje khro bos zhes bya ba ni dbyug sngon la sogs pa'o //
T02D2513:262a-16: dkri bar bya zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya
T02D2513:262a-17: ba la bsam zhes bya ba ni lhag ma ste
T02D2513:262a-18: / 'di ni bsam gtan gyis skrod pa'o //
T02D2513:262a-19: 'di skad ston te khro bo gang yang rung pa'i
T02D2513:262a-20: sbyor bas rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug
T02D2513:262a-21: la / bsgrub par bya ba de bzhin du mgo dang gtsug la sogs pa'i srung ba bsal la /
T02D2513:262a-22: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa la bskyon te rdo rje rnga mo'i rgyab tu bskyon te /
T02D2513:262a-23: gcer bu spyi gtsug skra grol ba til mar gyis lus bskus la /
T02D2513:262a-24: bsgrub par bya ba'i kha dang gdong dang /
T02D2513:262a-27: lkog mar yi ge yam du ba'i mdog can bsams la /
T02D2513:262a-28: dbyug sngon gyi rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pas rdo
T02D2513:262a-29: rje rnga mo brdab pas lho phyogs su khyer zhing
T02D2513:262a-30: rnga mo'i gcin gyis de'i lus yongs su g-yengs par
T02D2513:262a-32: de nyid dang lhan cig tu yul gzhan du phyin
T02D2513:262a-33: par bsam par bya zhing kha gdong ma bkrus shing
T02D2513:262a-34: ji srid du bya rog ma langs pa de srid
T02D2513:262a-35: du / aom bhe ri bhe ri gandha ri tsanda
T02D2513:262a-36: l'i ma tam gi sv'a h'a zhes brjod la kha'i
T02D2513:262a-37: dbugs kyis bsgrub par bya ba bteg na nges par
T02D2513:262a-39: de'i rkang rjes sa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:262a-40: de ltar na de'i sbyor ba'i las zhes bya ba
T02D2513:262a-41: ni ji skad du bshad pa'i chogs bstan pa'i gsang
T02D2513:262b-0: sngags bri ba la sogs pa'i las @262b kyis bskrad
T02D2513:262b-2: bsgom zhing cho ga bzhin byas na //
T02D2513:262b-3: zhes bya ba ni rang gi sbyor bas de bzhin
T02D2513:262b-4: du 'dug pa la bsam gtan gyis bskrad pa'i sbyor
T02D2513:262b-5: ba bsgoms pas skrod par 'gyur ro zhes 'og nas
T02D2513:262b-7: de'i ming gsang sngags dang spel zhing zhes bya ba
T02D2513:262b-8: ni bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang sngags su spel
T02D2513:262b-9: ba ste / 'dis kyang phyi dang nang gi rnam
T02D2513:262b-10: pa'i bye brag can gyi sbyor ba ma lus pa
T02D2513:262b-13: de bzhin du khro bo gang yang rung ba'i sbyor
T02D2513:262b-14: bas rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la
T02D2513:262b-15: srung ba la sogs pa bsal te /
T02D2513:262b-16: ta la'i lo ma la sogs pa phyag rgya gtor
T02D2513:262b-17: ba'i tshul lam yi ge go bzlog pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2513:262b-18: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba la sogs pa gang yang rung
T02D2513:262b-19: pa'i sngags che ge mo skrod cig ces bya ba'i
T02D2513:262b-20: tshig dang spel ba'i sbyor bas dug la sogs pas
T02D2513:262b-21: bris la ni ma pa'i lo ma sme par byas
T02D2513:262b-22: pa dang / khrag la sogs pa bskus la /
T02D2513:262b-23: ta la'i lo ma de 'ug pa'i sgros sam dge sbyong gi skras dkris shing spel ba byas la /
T02D2513:262b-24: nyi ma phyed dam mtshan phyed la khyim gyi dbus
T02D2513:262b-25: la sogs par brkos nas ji skad bshad pa'i bsam
T02D2513:262b-26: gtan gyis bkod pa'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2513:262b-27: 'thab mo 'gyed pa zhes bya ba ni lha'i gzugs
T02D2513:262b-28: su bsgoms pas gnas la 'thab bzhin par yongs su
T02D2513:262b-30: 'di skad ston te de bzhin du gshin rje gshed
T02D2513:262b-31: la sogs pa'i rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
T02D2513:262b-32: 'dug la bsgrub par bya ba'i srung la sogs pa
T02D2513:262b-33: bsal te / de'i gnas dang nye bar gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo gnyis bsams la /
T02D2513:262b-34: de'i snying gar yi ge h'um dmar po dang nag
T02D2513:262b-35: po bsams la bsgrub par bya ba'i dpral bar yang
T02D2513:262b-36: bkod nas / khro bo gnyis 'thab bzhin par bsgrub par bya ba dbye zhing 'gras par bsam mo //
T02D2513:262b-37: rang gi lag pa'i sen mo la de'i ming gi
T02D2513:262b-38: yi ge'i phreng ba phyin ci log tu bkod la
T02D2513:262b-39: / phan tshun bdar nas che ge mo 'gras bar
T02D2513:262b-40: gyur cig ces bskul la khros pas rang gis gsang
T02D2513:262b-42: h'um zhes bya bas gang ba'i zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um brjod pas so //
T02D2513:263a-2: zhes bya ba ni h'um las byung ba'i nas 'bru
T02D2513:263a-3: tsam gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa 'bar bar
T02D2513:263a-4: bsams la dgang bar bya'o zhes 'og ma dang sbyar
T02D2513:263a-6: sna yi rtse mo nas bton te //
T02D2513:263a-8: man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du sna'i rtse mor bsgom pas /
T02D2513:263a-9: rdo rje phra mo bskyed nas des dus phyis dgang bar bya'o //
T02D2513:263a-10: sna tshogs rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:263a-11: ni re re zhing rtse mo lnga ba la kha
T02D2513:263a-13: yang na re re zhing rtse gsum pa kha bzhi ba'i rdo rje ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D2513:263a-14: bcings nas su zhes bya ba ni lag pa'i dbus la sogs pa'o //
T02D2513:263a-15: rdo rje 'bar ba la zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2513:263a-16: pa ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje 'bar pas
T02D2513:263a-17: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus skems pa gang yin pa
T02D2513:263a-18: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:263a-20: man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje phra mo bsgom pas bskyed la /
T02D2513:263a-21: de bzhin du khro bo gang yang rung ba'i sbyor
T02D2513:263a-22: pas rang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste bsgrub
T02D2513:263a-23: par bya ba mdun du bsams la srung ba la
T02D2513:263a-25: h'um zhes brjod la sna'i dbugs kyis ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje drangs te /
T02D2513:263a-26: de bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2513:263a-27: gnas su sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par spros la
T02D2513:263a-28: bsgrub par bya ba 'di'i gsher pa'i rdzas rnams rdo
T02D2513:263a-29: rje mkha' 'gro mas gzhibs par bsams la ji skad
T02D2513:263a-30: bshad pa'i 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya bcings nas
T02D2513:263a-32: aom zhes bya ba la sogs par bstan pa'i gsang
T02D2513:263a-33: sngags des bsad pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas 'don
T02D2513:263a-34: par bya'o // mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni mkhas
T02D2513:263a-35: pas zhes bya'o zhes snga ma dang sbyar ba'am de
T02D2513:263a-36: nas mkhas pas dgab kyi 'og ma dang sbyar ro
T02D2513:263a-37: par bya'o // // rlung gi phyogs song ste zhes
T02D2513:263a-38: bya ba ni rlung gi phyogs kyi cha ste rlung
T02D2513:263a-40: de dag ces bya ba ni thig le'o //
T02D2513:263a-41: de ni zhes bya ba ni kham phor de bsam mo zhes sbyar te /
T02D2513:263a-42: de ni zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyis mnan par bsgom mo zhes shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:263a-43: yam zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yam las
T02D2513:263a-44: byung ba'i rlung bdun 'og gi char gnas pa rnams
T02D2513:263b-0: kyis yongs su g-yo ba dang ri rab de @263b
T02D2513:263b-1: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du rlung mnan
T02D2513:263b-2: par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:263b-3: nang du rlung rnams nges par chud bar bya zhes
T02D2513:263b-4: bya ba ni bya ba'i khyad par gyis ni gnyis
T02D2513:263b-5: pa yin te / nang ste dbus su rlung rnams
T02D2513:263b-6: chud cings pas pa ste rlung tshogs ri rab kyis
T02D2513:263b-7: g-yogs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces
T02D2513:263b-8: pa yin te / bya'o // gzhan yang de nyid khyad par ni /
T02D2513:263b-9: lam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2513:263b-10: yi ge lam las mtshan pa'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa der ro //
T02D2513:263b-11: 'di skad ston te rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal
T02D2513:263b-12: 'byor bas ji skad du bshad pa'i phyogs su song
T02D2513:263b-13: la / de'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ba byas te /
T02D2513:263b-14: der 'khor lo'i sbyor bas mtha' mar drug dbus su
T02D2513:263b-15: gcig bya ste de rnams la yang yam bkod la
T02D2513:263b-16: / de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D2513:263b-17: rlung lha rnams su bsams te 'dod pa'i rgyal pos
T02D2513:263b-18: gnyis ba yang bkug nas gzhug pa dang bcing ba
T02D2513:263b-20: bka' bsgo pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te /
T02D2513:263b-21: h'um h'um s'um h'um zhes bya ba las bskyed pa'i
T02D2513:263b-22: kham phor las ri'i rgyal po ri rab kha thur
T02D2513:263b-23: du bltas ba la yi ge ham bzlas la rab
T02D2513:263b-24: tu bkab ste / de'i steng du yi ge lam
T02D2513:263b-25: las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa kha
T02D2513:263b-27: dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor de yang khro bo'i rdo
T02D2513:263b-28: rje chen po rtse lnga bas mnan par rnam par
T02D2513:263b-29: bsams la de'i steng du rkang pa g-yon ba bzhag
T02D2513:263b-30: nas / 'phags pa mi g-yo mgon gyi gsang sngags
T02D2513:263b-31: la rjes su mthun pa'i bskul tshig dang bcas pa
T02D2513:263b-32: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o zhes bstan pa 'di
T02D2513:263b-33: ni de gtso bor bstan pa yin gyi sbyor ba
T02D2513:263b-34: gzhan gyi bya ba la yang nyes pa med do
T02D2513:263b-35: nas / // klu brgyad dgod dbus zhes bya ba
T02D2513:263b-36: ni shar gyi 'dab ma nas brtsams te sngar bshad
T02D2513:263b-38: rdo rje khro bo'i sku zhes bya ba ni gtso bor khro bo stobs po che'i skus so //
T02D2513:263b-39: gzir nas su zhes bya ba ni gzir bar bsam mo zhes bya ba tshig gi lhag ma'o /
T02D2513:263b-40: 'di skad ston te de bzhin du rang gi dkyil
T02D2513:263b-41: 'khor gyi dbus su stobs po che'i sbyor bas 'dug
T02D2513:263b-42: la mdun du spang leb la sogs pa'i gzhi la
T02D2513:263b-43: me'i dkyil 'khor de'i 'og tu rlung der yang chu'i
T02D2513:263b-44: dbus su ji skad du bshad pa'i padma bris la
T02D2513:264a-0: / de'i 'dab ma brgyad la ji skad du bshad pa'i klu brgyad @264a * //
T02D2513:264a-1: yi ge na h'um gnyis kyi bar du bcug pa'i rnam par dgod la /
T02D2513:264a-2: der yang stobs po ches klu dgug pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D2513:264a-3: rting bas bteg par bsams la /
T02D2513:264a-4: h'um gis rab tu gzir bar gyur bas klu'i bdag
T02D2513:264a-5: po skyugs par gyur pa rnams par bsams la char
T02D2513:264a-6: pho ba shig ces ba'i bskul tshig dang bcas par
T02D2513:264a-7: sngags bzla'o // dbus zhes bya ba ni lte ba la'o //
T02D2513:264a-8: klu rnams kyi snying po yongs su bcug ces bya
T02D2513:264a-9: ba ni klu'i sa bon gyi yi ge h'um gnyis
T02D2513:264a-10: dang spel ba nyid kyis yongs su bskor ro //
T02D2513:264a-11: h'um zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas na ni //
T02D2513:264a-12: zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um dang spel la
T02D2513:264a-13: yi ge na bzlas shing bsams na klu'i tshogs rnams
T02D2513:264a-15: bshad ma thag pa'i sbyor ba 'di ni btsun pa
T02D2513:264a-16: mar me mdzad seng ges kyang de skad du bshad
T02D2513:264a-18: gal te sngar bshad pa'i sbyor bas char mi 'bab
T02D2513:264a-19: na thams cad de bzhin du bskyed nas dbus kyi
T02D2513:264a-20: na'i nang du brgyad car bcug la h'um na h'um
T02D2513:264a-22: stobs po che bsgoms la rang nyid kyis bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2513:264a-23: bkug nas zhes bya ba ni bkug pa'o //
T02D2513:264a-24: 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'byin pa'o //
T02D2513:264a-25: 'di skad ston te de bzhin du rlung gi dkyil
T02D2513:264a-26: 'khor dbus su rta mgrin gyi gzugs khams gsum pa'i
T02D2513:264a-28: lce'i dbus su yi ge h'um 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab par bkod la /
T02D2513:264a-29: ji skad du bshad pa'i kha dog can gyi kha
T02D2513:264a-30: gdangs pa'i dbugs rngub pa'i rlung sgra dang bcas pas
T02D2513:264a-31: mnad ra la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa'i sprin
T02D2513:264a-32: rnams bkug la dbugs dbyung ba'i rlung gis shing bal
T02D2513:264a-33: bzhin gtor la rang gi phreng ba'i sngags bzlas te
T02D2513:264a-34: / sbyor ba 'di la gtsor ni rta mgrin sbyar ro //
T02D2513:264a-35: bcad gtub ste zhes bya ba ni sprin rnams btub bo //
T02D2513:264a-37: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bdud rtsi
T02D2513:264a-38: thab sbyor gyi sbyor bas 'dug la nyi ma 'di
T02D2513:264a-39: dkyil 'khor la de'i mdog can gyi yi ge h'um
T02D2513:264a-40: bkod la sdigs mdzub bya ba'i tshul gyis rang gi
T02D2513:264a-42: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje la sogs pas sprin rnams btub par bsams te /
T02D2513:264a-43: sbyor ba 'di la gtsor ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor sbyar ro //
T02D2513:264b-0: rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhes bya ba ni @264b
T02D2513:264b-1: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor bas gnas par bsam
T02D2513:264b-2: pa'o // mda' gzhu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2513:264b-3: mda' gzhu la sogs pa thogs nas de dang des 'phen cing drag po'i char rab tu 'bebs pa'o //
T02D2513:264b-4: de nyid kyis ni bdud las rnam par rgyal ba
T02D2513:264b-5: ste phyag drug ces gsungs pas ni g-yon gyi gcig
T02D2513:264b-6: gi sa ni sdigs mdzub mdzad par yang shes par
T02D2513:264b-7: bya'o // skrag par mdzad ces bya ba ni 'jigs par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2513:264b-8: de lta bur bsams nas ci zhig byed ce na
T02D2513:264b-9: 'jigs shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D2513:264b-10: sngar bshad pa'i gdug pa rnams yin par shes par
T02D2513:264b-11: bya'o // 'di skad ston te de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyor bas 'dug la /
T02D2513:264b-12: yi ge ham las dpral ba las mi g-yo ba
T02D2513:264b-13: byung ste yi ge h'um las sgra sgrogs pa las
T02D2513:264b-14: byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gyis bskor te bzhugs pa
T02D2513:264b-15: de'i phyag tu yi ge kha las ral grir yongs
T02D2513:264b-18: h'um dang spel ba'i dha'i las gzhu /
T02D2513:264b-19: ho snga ma bzhin spel ba las mda'/
T02D2513:264b-20: h'um las rdo rje byung bar bsams pa la dkyil
T02D2513:264b-21: 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis kyang yongs su bskor bar
T02D2513:264b-22: bsgoms nas / zhags pas bkug nas bgegs rnams kun
T02D2513:264b-23: nas ral gri la sogs pas gtub par bsams te
T02D2513:264b-25: phur bu zhes bya ba ni phur bus gdab pa byas pa'o //
T02D2513:264b-26: 'od zer can gyi gsang sngags bzlas pa yis //
T02D2513:264b-27: zhes bya ba ni 'od zer can gyi gsang sngags
T02D2513:264b-28: 'don pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig pas mngon par
T02D2513:264b-29: bsngags pa'i phur bu ste des mig tu gdab pa
T02D2513:264b-30: zhes sbyar ro // phyi bzhin rdo rje gtun shing dag gis brdungs //
T02D2513:264b-31: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gtun shing thogs pa'i khro bos rgyab nas brdung bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D2513:264b-32: 'di skad ston te de bzhin du gshin rje gshed
T02D2513:264b-33: la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i sbyor bas 'dug
T02D2513:264b-34: la / rkang rjes kyi sa dang mi'i khrag dang
T02D2513:264b-35: dur khrod kyi sol ba rnams las mi'i gzugs byas
T02D2513:264b-36: la / la / mi rus las byas pa'i phur bu ji skad du bshad pa'i gzugs can la /
T02D2513:264b-37: 'od zer can gyi gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa
T02D2513:264b-38: gcig bzlas te des mig gnyis su phur bus gdab
T02D2513:264b-39: pa'i mi'i gzugs brnyan rdo rje khro bo rdo rje
T02D2513:265a-1: thogs pas brdung zhing de rengs par bya ba'o //
T02D2513:265a-2: tshogs kyi bdag po lho phyogs su mngon par phyogs
T02D2513:265a-3: nas gdug pa'i khar bcug par yang bsams la ji
T02D2513:265a-4: skad du bshad pa'i gsang sngags bka' lung bsgom pa'i
T02D2513:265a-5: tshul gyis bzla'o // zhugs pa'i 'og tu des zos bar bsam mo /
T02D2513:265a-6: las 'di bsams pas mod las ni //
T02D2513:265a-7: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i bsam
T02D2513:265a-8: gtan gyis gzugs brnyan bya ba la sogs pa'i las
T02D2513:265a-9: rnams kyis so // mkha' la zhes bya ba ni
T02D2513:265a-10: bdag nyid nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas la brgya byin
T02D2513:265a-11: du bsam mo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:265a-12: klu brgyad dag dang char sprin dag la bsgo //
T02D2513:265a-13: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i bka'
T02D2513:265a-14: bsgo par bsam mo zhes bshad pa'i tshig gis snga
T02D2513:265a-16: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02D2513:265a-17: brgya byin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2513:265a-18: sprin tshogs zhes bya ba ni klu la bya bar 'dod de /
T02D2513:265a-19: de ci'i phyir zhe na sngar de nyid las bsgo ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:265a-20: 'dab mas bkab nas ni zhes bya ba ni gshog pa'i rlung gis de bkab pa'o //
T02D2513:265a-21: mchus brkos zhes bya ba ni mchu btsugs pa'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2513:265a-23: de bzhin du khro bo gang yang rung ba'i sbyor
T02D2513:265a-24: bas rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la
T02D2513:265a-25: / nam mkha' la gnas pa'i brgya byin du bdag
T02D2513:265a-26: nyid rnam par bsams la bar snang la gnas nas
T02D2513:265a-27: 'og tu ji skad du bshad pa'i nam mkha' lding
T02D2513:265a-28: / dang / klu'i khyim la sogs pa tshig pa sel bar byed par bsams la /
T02D2513:265a-29: ji skad du bshad pa'i sngags bzlas shing bka' bsgo bas char gyi rgyun gyis me gsod cing /
T02D2513:265a-30: klu'i tshogs nam mkha' lding gi gshog pa'i rlung gis
T02D2513:265a-31: g-yab pa dang mchus btsugs pas de byed par bsam
T02D2513:265a-32: mo // lha mo bzhi pos yongs su bskor //
T02D2513:265a-33: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pas yongs su bskor pa'o //
T02D2513:265a-35: bsnyems ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste bsnyems ma dang rdo rje mtshon cha ma dang /
T02D2513:265a-36: rdo rje ki li ka'i li'o //
T02D2513:265a-37: chu srin rgyal mtshan ni rdo rje byams ma'o //
T02D2513:265a-38: me tog gi gzhu dang rol bas mtshan pa dang /
T02D2513:265a-39: rdo rje bsnyems ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D2513:265b-0: g-yas pa'i phyag gis zhes bya ba ni g-yas @265b ba rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02D2513:265b-1: g-yon pas rdo rje dril bu dkur 'jog pa'o zhes
T02D2513:265b-2: bya ba ni rked pa'i phyogs su rdo rje dril
T02D2513:265b-3: bu 'jog pa gang yin pa de la de skad
T02D2513:265b-4: ces bya'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag lhag ma
T02D2513:265b-5: dag la ni me tog can gyi mda' dang gzhu
T02D2513:265b-6: ces bya'o // bsnams pa'o // lde ma bag ces
T02D2513:265b-7: bya ba la sogs pa la lde ma bag gi
T02D2513:265b-8: lha mo rnams kyi 'jo tshul gyis yongs su bshad
T02D2513:265b-9: ces bya'o // bsnams pa'o // la / des sgeg cing rol pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2513:265b-10: sems dpa' byung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2513:265b-11: sems dpa' ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ste /
T02D2513:265b-12: de byung ba ni sprul pa'o //
T02D2513:265b-13: de'i sprin ni de'i tshogs so //
T02D2513:265b-14: de dang 'brel ba ni rab tu 'brel bar byas
T02D2513:265b-15: pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D2513:265b-16: // rin chen cod pan zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2513:265b-17: pa la dbang bskur ba'i phyir rin thang che ba'i
T02D2513:265b-18: rin po che'i cod pa na bcings shing dar dbyangs
T02D2513:265b-19: rna ba gnyis kyi mthar 'phyang ba gang yin pa
T02D2513:265b-20: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:265b-21: nam mkha' las bab pa'i zhes bya ba ni nam
T02D2513:265b-22: mkha'i ba'i phyogs las rdo rje'i thog 'bab pa zlog
T02D2513:265b-24: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa la che ge
T02D2513:265b-25: mo zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sems can gyi sgra
T02D2513:265b-26: rab tu ston par byed pa yin no //
T02D2513:265b-27: de nas ni yi ge dza: de nas yi ge h'um bkod pa byas la /
T02D2513:265b-28: su ra ta zhes bya ba'i sgra'i mthar stvam zhes rab tu sbyar ro //
T02D2513:265b-29: gal te rgyud gzhan dag las bshad pa su ra
T02D2513:265b-30: ta stvam zhes pa rnam par dgod dam zhe na
T02D2513:265b-31: / bandha zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2513:265b-32: yi ge pam rnam par bkod la rgyud gzhan dag
T02D2513:265b-33: dang rjes su mthun par yi ge ho: yang gzung
T02D2513:265b-34: bar bya ste / las dang rjes su mthun par bskul ba'i tshig gzhug ste /
T02D2513:265b-35: de nas mtha' mang phat ces bya ba ste /
T02D2513:265b-36: sngags 'di dag rigs par sbyar ba ni /
T02D2513:265b-37: aom ma h'a su kha badzra satva dza: h'um pam
T02D2513:265b-38: ho: su ra ta stvam che ge mo'i badzra pa
T02D2513:265b-39: tam ni ba ra ya phat ces bya'o //
T02D2513:265b-40: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la thog ma dang tha ma med cing /
T02D2513:265b-41: gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems ye shes
T02D2513:265b-42: bla na med pa de nyid ni sa bon gyi
T02D2513:265b-43: ngo bo nyid bas go 'phang ste gnas yin la
T02D2513:265b-44: / de rgyas par byed pa ni rnal 'byor ba'i
T02D2513:265b-45: rgyud la rgya cher gnas par byed cing gnyis su
T02D2513:265b-46: rtog pa'i 'ching ba sel bar byed pa /
T02D2513:266a-0: rnal 'byor ba rab tu sad par byed pas rgyas par byed pa ste ji skad @266a * //
T02D2513:266a-1: du bshad pa'i sbyor ba'i rim pa 'dis bsgom zhing bsams la /
T02D2513:266a-2: nam mkha' las ni bab pa yi //
T02D2513:266a-3: thog thog rnam par bzlog par bya //
T02D2513:266a-4: zhes snga ma dang sbyar ro //
T02D2513:266a-6: rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas 'dug la /
T02D2513:266a-7: bsgrub par bya ba'i steng gi nam mkha'i phyogs su
T02D2513:266a-8: ji skad du bshad pa'i lha mo bzhis yongs su
T02D2513:266a-9: bskor ba'i bde ba chen po rnam par bsams la
T02D2513:266a-10: / ser ba 'bab pa bzlog pa'i phyir aom zhes
T02D2513:266a-11: bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags gdon pas bcom ldan
T02D2513:266a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs so zhes mi mngon pa'i tshig gis sbyar ro //
T02D2513:266a-14: ci zhig mdzad ce na mi 'khrugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2513:266a-15: mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas dang /
T02D2513:266a-16: don yod grub pa'i rgyal po dang /
T02D2513:266a-17: sngags kyi sems dpa'i bskal pa bzang po pa bcu drug ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam mo //
T02D2513:266a-18: khro bo ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o //
T02D2513:266a-19: rig pa'i rgyal mo ni spyan la sogs pa'i rig pa'i lha mo'o //
T02D2513:266a-20: thams cad ldan pa ni thams cad dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2513:266a-21: rnam par gzigs pa ni lta ba'o //
T02D2513:266a-22: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02D2513:266a-23: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje can ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dgyes shing rol pa'o //
T02D2513:266a-24: smin ma mdzes par bskyod nas su //
T02D2513:266a-25: zhes bya ba ni smin ma mdzes par bskyod cing
T02D2513:266a-26: rnam par brtse ba'i khyad par rtsom pas rab tu
T02D2513:266a-27: 'dzin pa g-yon pa'i smin ma bskyod cing 'jigs par
T02D2513:266a-28: bskyod pa ste des zhes 'og ma dang sbyar ro
T02D2513:266a-30: zhes bya ba ni yan lag rnam par dgod pa
T02D2513:266a-31: rnams kyis te tshig snga ma rnams dang sbyar ro
T02D2513:266a-32: // thugs kyis sems ni dga' ba mdzad //
T02D2513:266a-33: ces bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje
T02D2513:266a-34: ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyis thugs kyi bdag
T02D2513:266a-35: nyid kyis sems rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'brel ba'i
T02D2513:266a-36: dga' bas mos par mdzad pa'o zhes shes par bya'o
T02D2513:266a-37: // bsgribs nas rdo rje gsor nas des //
T02D2513:266a-38: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'debs pas so //
T02D2513:266a-39: ldem bag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos la /
T02D2513:266b-0: ldem @266b bag dang sgeg pa dang bcas pas /
T02D2513:266b-1: rdo rje'i lta ba'i rol pas bltas pa'i ngo bo
T02D2513:266b-2: nyid gang yin pa de ni ldem bag 'jo tshul
T02D2513:266b-3: gyis bltas pa'o // lag pa gnyis zhes bya ba
T02D2513:266b-4: la sogs pa la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis
T02D2513:266b-5: padma bskor ba'i tshul du yongs su bskor nas spyi
T02D2513:266b-6: bor me tog gi thal mo sbyar ba byas te
T02D2513:266b-7: gsol ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2513:266b-8: ji skad rnam pa thams cad du //
T02D2513:266b-9: zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang gis so //
T02D2513:266b-10: zur gyis rnam par gzigs pa dang //
T02D2513:266b-11: zhes bya ba ni rnam par lta ba ni gzigs
T02D2513:266b-12: pa ste bzhad pa chen po dang zur gyis gzigs
T02D2513:266b-13: pa ci'i phyir mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:266b-14: smin ma bskyod pa 'dzum mdzad pa //
T02D2513:266b-15: zhes bya ba ni smin ma bskyod cing 'dzum pa
T02D2513:266b-16: dang bcas pa 'dzum pa dang 'byed pa la sogs
T02D2513:266b-17: pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis so //
T02D2513:266b-18: bstan zhing zab pa'i gsung gis ni //
T02D2513:266b-19: zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chad par ston pa'i gsung gi zab mo'i don ston pas so //
T02D2513:266b-20: bde bas byang chub thob 'gyur ldan //
T02D2513:266b-21: zhes bya ba ni dngos su bstan pas so //
T02D2513:266b-22: nyon cig ces bya ba ni tshig yongs su bsgyur nas sbyar ro //
T02D2513:266b-23: gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dngos
T02D2513:266b-24: po gang gi chos bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid can
T02D2513:266b-25: gyi ngo bo ni gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2513:266b-26: de brtags pa'i ngo bor med pa'o //
T02D2513:266b-27: mtha' gnyis kyi ni mtshan ma med //
T02D2513:266b-28: ces bya ba ni rtag pa dang chad pa dang
T02D2513:266b-29: bral te chos kyi dbyings thog ma dang tha ma
T02D2513:266b-30: med pa'o // de la yang 'ga' zhig 'khrul par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2513:266b-31: de phyir dbus la spyod pa med pa dag /
T02D2513:266b-32: ces te skad cig ma re re zhing 'jig pas
T02D2513:266b-33: na skad cig ma gsum gyi gnas skabs kyi dbus
T02D2513:266b-34: med do // de med pas na de la mngon
T02D2513:266b-35: par zhen pa ring du spangs pa nyid yin no
T02D2513:266b-36: med do // // yang na 'jug pa dang ldan
T02D2513:266b-37: pa'i sems dag gis dbus dag na ji skad du
T02D2513:266b-38: bshad pa'i ye shes rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can gyi
T02D2513:266b-39: gnas pa'i sems mtha' gnyis la ltos pa de'i dbus
T02D2513:266b-40: na zhen par byed pa rnam par rtog pa med
T02D2513:266b-41: med do // // de / dga' ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:266b-42: dus gsum nyid la yongs su gnas pa'i dus gsum
T02D2513:266b-43: po med pas dus gsum 'das pa'o zhes snga ma
T02D2513:266b-44: dang sbyar ro // thams cad du khyab pas na nam mkha' 'dra ba'o //
T02D2513:266b-45: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de
T02D2513:266b-46: ltar 'di lta bu'i ye shes la gnas par gyur
T02D2513:267a-1: mtshan nyid can gyi byang chub nyams su myang bar bya ba med pas /
T02D2513:267a-2: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bsgom pa'i thabs kyi ye shes dang bral ba yin te /
T02D2513:267a-3: de las ji skad du bshad pa de'i ye shes
T02D2513:267a-4: rtogs par 'dod pa'i thabs rnams ngas bshad par bya'o
T02D2513:267a-5: zhes pa'o // phung po la zhes bya ba la
T02D2513:267a-6: sogs pa la phung po lnga la bdag nyid kyi
T02D2513:267a-7: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pas so sor snang
T02D2513:267a-8: bar gyur ba'i dngos po ni dngos po med pa
T02D2513:267a-9: zhes pa'o // ste / don dam par sems can
T02D2513:267a-10: dmigs su med pas dngos po de nyid ni gnyis
T02D2513:267a-11: su med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2513:267a-12: sems can la phan 'dogs par byed pa sbyor ba
T02D2513:267a-13: la sogs pa byang chub kyi sems kyi grogs su
T02D2513:267a-14: gyur pa sprul pa dang bcas pas sems can la
T02D2513:267a-15: rjes su phan 'dogs par byed de /
T02D2513:267a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i sprul pa'i rgyu
T02D2513:267a-17: mdzad pa'i ngag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyis
T02D2513:267a-18: sku gsum gyi mchog dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mchod
T02D2513:267a-19: nas / bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bor bsdus pa las bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2513:267a-21: da ni sems rin po che'i bdag nyid che bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2513:267a-22: sems kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:267a-23: sku ni zhes bya ba sku rdo rje'o //
T02D2513:267a-24: sems kyi chos rnams bstan pa yis //
T02D2513:267a-25: zhes bya ba ni chos ston pa'i ngo bo gsung rdo rje thob pa'o //
T02D2513:267a-26: sems kyis byang chub thob gyur pas //
T02D2513:267a-27: zhes bya ba ni thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2513:267a-28: sku rdo rje la sogs pa de rnams la yang
T02D2513:267a-29: dngos por mngon par zhen par mi bya'o zhes bstan
T02D2513:267a-30: pa'i phyir / de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par bsgom //
T02D2513:267a-31: zhes bya ba gsungs te de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par bsgom pa'o //
T02D2513:267a-32: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la mngon par zhugs
T02D2513:267a-33: pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i skur ji
T02D2513:267a-35: sems ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:267a-36: ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis sems
T02D2513:267a-37: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i rnam par yongs su
T02D2513:267a-38: gyur pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam pa rang
T02D2513:267a-39: dbang du gyur par mos pas rab tu bsgom zhing
T02D2513:267a-40: bsam par bya'o // de bas sku rdo rje la
T02D2513:267a-41: sogs par mngon par byang chub pa yang sgyu ma
T02D2513:267a-42: bsam par bya'o // dang 'dra'o // dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dpe gsungs pa'o //
T02D2513:267a-43: gyo mo zhes bya ba la gyo mo la sogs pa'i sbyor bas so //
T02D2513:267b-0: zhen pa'i sems la @267b zhes bya ba ni sems chos nyid kyis nye bar bsgos pas so //
T02D2513:267b-1: de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dpes bstan pa'i don gsungs te /
T02D2513:267b-2: bsod nams ye shes kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni bsod nams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
T02D2513:267b-3: ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshogs kyis zhes bya ba blta bar bya'o //
T02D2513:267b-4: tshogs kyi bsgos pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i tshogs dang ldan pas so //
T02D2513:267b-5: sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid du bstan nas /
T02D2513:267b-6: da ni glo bur gyi dri ma can nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2513:267b-7: dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:267b-8: dngos po de rnams kyi don dam pa'i ngo bo
T02D2513:267b-9: nyid ni brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba
T02D2513:267b-10: nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan
T02D2513:267b-11: nyid can yin par mi shes pas gzugs la sogs
T02D2513:267b-12: pa mi bden zhing yod pa ma yin pa'i dngos
T02D2513:267b-13: po la rnam par rtog pas gzung ba dang 'dzin
T02D2513:267b-14: par zhen pa'i bag chags kyis bsgos pas rin po
T02D2513:267b-15: che'i sems dri ma can du byas pa yin no
T02D2513:267b-16: // de nas rnal 'byor de spyod pa'i gzhung gis
T02D2513:267b-17: kyang dngos po rnams ngo bo nyid med par bstan
T02D2513:267b-18: // nas / da ni mdo sde ba'i gzhung sun
T02D2513:267b-19: 'byin pas kyang dngos po thams cad mnyam pa nyid
T02D2513:267b-20: du gsungs pa ni 'byung ba chen po zhes bya
T02D2513:267b-22: 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni sa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2513:267b-23: dngos po thams cad ni gzugs la sogs pa thams cad do //
T02D2513:267b-25: gzugs zhes bya ba ni bsten pa'o //
T02D2513:267b-26: de lta na yang dngos po de rnams la gtsang
T02D2513:267b-27: ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs par yongs su
T02D2513:267b-28: brtags pa'i mi shes pa'i stobs kyis sgro btags pa
T02D2513:267b-29: yin no // sogs pa'i sgras ni gcig dang du
T02D2513:267b-30: ma la sogs pa'i dngos por yongs su brtags pa
T02D2513:267b-32: gcig dang du ma'i dngos po dag ni phan tshun 'gal ba yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:267b-33: so sor snang ba'i dbang gis yod pa yin no zhes kyang shes par mi bya ste /
T02D2513:267b-34: zla ba gnyis su mthong ba yod pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2513:267b-35: 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i phra rab cha shas dang
T02D2513:267b-36: cha shas can ma yin pa dang ji lta ba
T02D2513:267b-37: bzhin brtag par bya ba ma yin pa la sogs
T02D2513:267b-38: pa rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2513:267b-39: de bas na rigs pa rjes su zhugs pa rnams
T02D2513:267b-40: kyis rnam par brtags pa thams cad ni sems can
T02D2513:268a-0: de'i phyir gang 'di gzung ba la sogs par yongs su brtags pa de ni @268a * //
T02D2513:268a-1: bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa ste /
T02D2513:268a-2: nye bar mtshon pa 'dis ni phung po dang khams
T02D2513:268a-3: dang skye mched la sogs par mngon par zhen pas
T02D2513:268a-4: chos kyi de kho na nyid mi rtogs shing mu
T02D2513:268a-5: stegs la sogs pa'i tshul du byas pas byang chub
T02D2513:268a-6: ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhes pa'o //
T02D2513:268a-7: las dang rjes su 'brel pa gsungs pa ni byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2513:268a-8: byang chub ni rnam pa gnyis nyid du gsungs te /
T02D2513:268a-9: gang gi phyir 'di las gzhan pa byang chub ni
T02D2513:268a-10: de rnams kyis 'gyur bas de yang bya ba ma
T02D2513:268a-11: yin no zhes byang chub kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i
T02D2513:268a-13: ji srid du gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs
T02D2513:268a-14: pa'i rnam par rtog pa la kun du spyod pa
T02D2513:268a-15: de srid du phyin ci log gi rnam par rtog
T02D2513:268a-17: de mi ldog na grol bar ga la 'gyur zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D2513:268a-18: rgya cher ni 'di nyid gzhan las ston pas der brtag par bya ste /
T02D2513:268a-19: 'dir ni zhib tu ma bshad do //
T02D2513:268a-20: lhag bcas phung po'i ngo bo ste //
T02D2513:268a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yongs su gdung ba'i bdag nyid can gyi nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2513:268a-22: shes bya'i sgrib pa'i bag chags med pas na nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa ste /
T02D2513:268a-23: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i
T02D2513:268a-24: ngo bo nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa
T02D2513:268a-25: las byung ba ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'i byang
T02D2513:268a-26: chub yin par shes par bya ste /
T02D2513:268a-27: phung po ngo bo nyid ces gong ma dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2513:268a-28: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa las ldog cing
T02D2513:268a-29: phung po lnga med pa nyid du med pa'i ye
T02D2513:268a-30: shes nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa gang yin
T02D2513:268a-31: pa de la ni lhag ma med pa'i byang chub
T02D2513:268a-32: yin no zhes shes par bya ste /
T02D2513:268a-33: 'di ni phung po med pa yin la 'di nyid
T02D2513:268a-34: kyis na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo
T02D2513:268a-35: bor bzung ste / thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:268a-36: byang chub gnyis de dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa yang spangs shing /
T02D2513:268b-0: bsod nams dang ye shes @268b kyi tshogs yongs su
T02D2513:268b-1: rdzogs par byed la sems can rnams la rjes su
T02D2513:268b-2: phan 'dogs par byed pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa
T02D2513:268b-3: byang chub kyi sems kyi grogs su gyur pa dang
T02D2513:268b-4: chos bdag med pa bsgom pa la mngon par brtson
T02D2513:268b-6: 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni theg pa dman pa la med de /
T02D2513:268b-7: de rnams ni ji skad du bshad pa'i byang chub
T02D2513:268b-8: kyis 'dul ba'i snod du gyur pa ma yin no
T02D2513:268b-9: // bla med byang chub 'di lta bu //
T02D2513:268b-10: zhes bya ba ni byang chub rnam pa gnyis po 'di dag nyid do //
T02D2513:268b-11: rdo rje ye shes rnams kyi thabs //
T02D2513:268b-12: zhes bya ba nas mkha' ltar dri ma med pa
T02D2513:268b-13: yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyi don byang chub
T02D2513:268b-14: kyi sems rim par phye ba las gsungs mod kyi
T02D2513:268b-15: / de ltar gsungs pa'i drag po bsgrub pa'i bya
T02D2513:268b-16: ba la yang chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi
T02D2513:268b-17: rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa nyid kyis bya'o zhes
T02D2513:268b-19: de'i byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2513:268b-20: rnal 'byor pa gang zhig ji skad du bshad pa'i
T02D2513:268b-21: bsgom pa dang / bzlas pa la rab tu zhugs
T02D2513:268b-22: pas sgrub pa bdun gyi bar gyis kyang ma grub
T02D2513:268b-23: na ji skad du bshad pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i
T02D2513:268b-24: bsgom pa dang / phyir dang / las sna tshogs
T02D2513:268b-25: pa bya ba'i don du drag po bsgrub pa'i cho
T02D2513:268b-26: ga ma lus par gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2513:268b-27: bde ba'i thabs kyis zhes bya ba ni thabs de las so //
T02D2513:268b-28: 'di zhes bya ba ni lha 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya rnams dang /
T02D2513:268b-29: sngar bstan pa'i bsgom pa rnams kyi drag po bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i las la sbyar bar bya'o//
T02D2513:268b-30: dam tshig ces bya ba ni rang gi bden pa'i
T02D2513:268b-31: tshig yongs su skyo bas rgyal bas bstan pa'i las
T02D2513:268b-33: las gang la rab tu sbyar bar bya zhe na /
T02D2513:268b-34: de'i phyir rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i so
T02D2513:268b-35: so'i nges pa'i las gsungs pa ni gsang sngags rigs
T02D2513:268b-36: pas zhes bya pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2513:268b-37: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sbyor bas gnas te /
T02D2513:268b-38: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje lcags kyu btab pas dgug par bya'o zhes shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:268b-39: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02D2513:268b-40: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:268b-41: rdo rje bcing bas bcing bar bya //
T02D2513:269a-1: bya ba ni gzhug pa'i 'og tu rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcing bar bya'o zhes shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:269a-2: rdo rje lcags kyu'i 'og tu ni rdo rje zhags pas bcing ba yin pas /
T02D2513:269a-3: rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas zhes bya ba
T02D2513:269a-4: 'dir rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas btsir bar
T02D2513:269a-6: rdo rje nag mo la sogs pa ni 'dir sgrub po zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2513:269a-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de
T02D2513:269a-8: nas 'khor thams cad kyis drag po sgrub pa'i cho
T02D2513:269a-9: ga bsam pa gcig gis legs so zhes bya ba
T02D2513:269a-11: gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad //
T02D2513:269a-12: ces bya ba la sogs pa 'di dag las legs
T02D2513:269a-13: so zhes bya ba dang pos ni sku'i sgo nas
T02D2513:269a-14: so // gnyis pas ni gsung gi sgo nas so //
T02D2513:269a-15: gsum pas ni thugs kyi sgo nas so //
T02D2513:269a-16: bzhi pas ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sgo nas so //
T02D2513:269a-17: thugs rdo rje'i lcags kyus kun nas 'bar zhes bya
T02D2513:269a-18: ba ni thugs rdo rje nyid lcags kyu dang 'dra
T02D2513:269a-19: bas gdul bya'i skye po 'gugs pa'i phyir gang 'di
T02D2513:269a-20: ltar 'bar bar gyur pa de legs so //
T02D2513:269a-21: gsang chen zhes bya ba ni thams cad la mi ston pas so //
T02D2513:269a-22: theg pa'i tshul 'di la gnas na /
T02D2513:269a-23: zhes bya ba ni ye shes 'di theg pa'i sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid la gnas pa'o //
T02D2513:269a-24: bde bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bla na med pa'i byang chub bde bas thob pa'o //
T02D2513:269a-25: sngags 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya ni sngar smras pa dang mthun no //
T02D2513:269a-27: ji skad du bshad pa'i rnal 'byor pas rdo rje
T02D2513:269a-28: h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sbyor bas rang gi dkyil
T02D2513:269a-29: 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la bsgrub par bya ba'i
T02D2513:269a-31: gnyis pa rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags
T02D2513:269a-32: dang phyag rgyas dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing
T02D2513:269a-33: ba dang rdo rje khu tshur gyi gzung bas yang
T02D2513:269a-35: gnas lngar phur bus gdab cing brdung ba dang /
T02D2513:269a-36: sdigs mdzub la sogs pa byas nas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2513:269a-37: ye shes snying po'i snying po can //
T02D2513:269a-38: zhes bya ba ni drag po bsgrub pa'i ye shes
T02D2513:269a-39: kyi snying po'i snying po can gyi gsang sngags kyi
T02D2513:269a-40: mchog yin no zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2513:269a-41: 'di dag su la bstan mi bya//
T02D2513:269b-0: @269b zhes bya ba ni gang yang rung ba 'ga'
T02D2513:269b-1: zhig la mi bstan pa dang sgrub pa la'ang dang
T02D2513:269b-2: por zhugs ma thag pa rnams la bsgrub par mi
T02D2513:269b-3: bya'o // sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:269b-4: la zhi ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba'i thabs kyis
T02D2513:269b-5: ji skad du bshad pa'i ngo bo nyid sgrub pa
T02D2513:269b-6: bya'o // ste / de ston pa'i gzhung gi le'u la rim par phye ba'i sgrar bshad do //
T02D2513:269b-9: // / sbyor ba yang sbyin sreg gis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas //
T02D2513:269b-10: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa rim par phye ba dgu pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2513:269b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad bshad do zhes nye bar mtshon pa'i tshig gis sbyor ro //
T02D2513:269b-12: ci zhig mdzad nas she na /
T02D2513:269b-13: sbyor ba'i las thams cad ces bya ba la sogs
T02D2513:269b-14: pa gsungs te sbyor ba ni rnam par dgod pa'i
T02D2513:269b-15: khyad par ro // las thams cad ni dbab pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2513:269b-16: de'i tshogs ni las mang po'o //
T02D2513:269b-17: de'i rjes su 'brel pa ni 'di ltar bya'o zhes pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D2513:269b-18: de nyid ni rdo rje'i ngo bo ste //
T02D2513:269b-19: de las dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:269b-20: dbab pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2513:269b-21: pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ston pa'i rnam pa la
T02D2513:269b-22: thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i don to
T02D2513:269b-23: // dbab pa la sogs pa las bya ba 'di
T02D2513:269b-24: bshad do zhes bya ba la 'dir ye shes snying
T02D2513:269b-25: po can khyod nyon cig ces gsungs so zhes mtshams
T02D2513:269b-26: // sbyar ro // aom zhes bya ba mgor bzhag ste //
T02D2513:269b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi mgor yi ge aom gzhag pa dang /
T02D2513:269b-28: kha'i padma la yi ge aa gzhag pa dang snying
T02D2513:269b-29: gar yi ge h'um bskul bar bzhag pa gang yin
T02D2513:269b-30: pa'o zhes sbyar ba thams cad du bya'o //
T02D2513:269b-31: yam ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2513:269b-32: zhes bya ba yi ge yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2513:269b-33: bzhag nas zhes bya ba ni der 'jog pas na de skad ces bya ste /
T02D2513:269b-34: der bsgrub par bya ba bsam mo zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:269b-35: dbab snod skul byed gzung ba de'i //
T02D2513:269b-36: zhes bya ba ni dbab pa'i snod do //
T02D2513:269b-37: skul byed ma'i gzugs su bsam pa'o //
T02D2513:270a-0: gzugs kyi ngo bor zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs yongs su @270a * //
T02D2513:270a-1: gyur nas skul byed ma'i ngo bor bsam pa'o //
T02D2513:270a-2: rdo rje 'chang ba'i nga rgyal gyis //
T02D2513:270a-3: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang ba ni bdag
T02D2513:270a-4: go zhes nga rgyal du byas pa gang yin pa
T02D2513:270a-5: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2513:270a-7: dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug pa dang /
T02D2513:270a-8: dam tshig bstan pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas la /
T02D2513:270a-9: de'i mgo la rnam par snang mdzad lkog mar gsung
T02D2513:270a-10: rdo rje snying gar thugs rdo rje ji lta ba
T02D2513:270a-12: rkang pa'i 'og tu yi ge yam //
T02D2513:270a-13: mtha' ma gnyis su ha rnam par bzhag ste /
T02D2513:270a-14: ba dan dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor du bsams la
T02D2513:270a-15: bsgrub par bya ba skul byed ma'i sku ji lta
T02D2513:270a-17: dril bu dkrol ba la rdo rje sems dpa'i nga
T02D2513:270a-18: rgyal gyis ji skad du bshad pa'i phreng ba'i sngags
T02D2513:270a-19: bzlas par bya'o // dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas aom //
T02D2513:270a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yi ge lam
T02D2513:270a-21: las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gnas brgyad du aom
T02D2513:270a-22: dang 'brel ba'i rnam pa dgod pas lte ba'i nang
T02D2513:270a-23: na gnas pa'o // dbus su zhes bya ba ni dgug par bya ba'i ming ngo //
T02D2513:270a-24: h'um bzhi yis ni rnam par mdzes //
T02D2513:270a-25: zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhi nas h'um gis bskor ba'o//
T02D2513:270a-26: bsgom zhing gsang sngags bskul tshig gis //
T02D2513:270a-27: zhes bya ba ni che ge mo rengs par gyis
T02D2513:270a-28: shig ces bya ba'i bskul ba'i tshig dang bcas pa'i
T02D2513:270a-30: bzlas pa zhes bya ba ni bzlas brjod byas pa'i
T02D2513:270a-31: yi ge ba'i srad bus zhes bya bar sbyar ro
T02D2513:270a-32: // dkri bar bya zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba rengs par bsgom zhing dkri ba'o //
T02D2513:270a-33: de ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D2513:270a-34: 'dis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2513:270a-36: de bzhin du gshin rje gshed la sogs pa gang
T02D2513:270a-37: yang rung ba'i sbyor bas 'dug la kham phor gcig
T02D2513:270a-38: la yi ge yam yongs su bzlas pa'i yung ba'i
T02D2513:270a-39: khu bas dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02D2513:270a-40: de'i phyogs brgyad du aom brgyad de'i dbus su de nyid kyis padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri /
T02D2513:270a-41: 'dab ma de la yi ge bam brgyad //
T02D2513:270a-42: lte ba la phyogs bzhin yi ge h'um bzhi bzhi
T02D2513:270b-0: bkod pas bskor bar bsgrub par bya @270b ba'i ming
T02D2513:270b-1: bris la / ji skad du bshad pa'i mi'i ming
T02D2513:270b-2: gis de'i snying drangs la gzhug pa dang bcing ba
T02D2513:270b-3: byas nas de'i ming yongs su gyur ba'i bsgrub par
T02D2513:270b-4: bya ba de'i mgor yang yi ge h'um gzhag pa
T02D2513:270b-5: las rdo rje 'chang khros par gyur pa des kyang
T02D2513:270b-7: kham phor gnyis par yang de bzhin bris te /
T02D2513:270b-8: des snga ma bkab la yi ge ba las byung
T02D2513:270b-9: ba'i srad bu ser pos gshin rje gshed la sogs
T02D2513:270b-10: pa gang yang rung ba'i gsang sngags bskul ba'i tshig
T02D2513:270b-11: dang bcas par brgya rtsa brgyad pas dbugs mi gtong
T02D2513:270b-12: bar dkris la mdud pa byas te /
T02D2513:270b-13: rkang pa g-yon par mnan nas de bzhin du gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2513:270b-14: sku gsum ldan pa'i mda' thogs shing //
T02D2513:270b-15: zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i
T02D2513:270b-16: yi ge gsum bkod pa'i mda' de'i phyag g-yas kyis
T02D2513:270b-18: g-yon pa yis ni zhes bya ba ni g-yon gyis so //
T02D2513:270b-19: 'dod pas zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyis so //
T02D2513:270b-20: bzhag ste zhes bya ba ni mdun du 'jog pa'o //
T02D2513:270b-21: padma zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02D2513:270b-23: rnal 'byor can gyis zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas so //
T02D2513:270b-24: 'di skad ston te de bzhin du 'dod chags rdo
T02D2513:270b-25: rje can gyi gzugs kyis mda' la sogs pa ji
T02D2513:270b-26: lta ba bzhin du 'dzin cing mdun du bud med
T02D2513:270b-28: de'i spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la aom dzam zhes bya ba bkod la /
T02D2513:270b-29: de las byung ba'i 'od zer dmar po'i tshogs kyis
T02D2513:270b-30: gnas bcu bdun du gtogs pa'i dregs pa sad par
T02D2513:270b-31: byas pas des kyang de brgyal bar byas shing dregs
T02D2513:270b-32: pa 'dor bar bsams la snga ma bzhin du rdo
T02D2513:270b-33: rje mda'i sbyor bas gnas lngar dbug par bya'o //
T02D2513:270b-34: dos gnyis la ni padma bri //
T02D2513:270b-35: zhes bya ba ni ngos gnyis su padma bri ba'o //
T02D2513:270b-36: mdzes par bya zhes bya ba nye bar mdzes pa'o //
T02D2513:270b-37: bri ba ni padma'i lte ba la bri'o //
T02D2513:270b-38: mi yis btags nas ni zhes bya ba ni mi skras bcings nas zlum por bya bas so //
T02D2513:271a-0: thing ril gyi rkang rus kyis zhes bya ba ni thing ril @271a * //
T02D2513:271a-1: zhes bya ba ni bya'i rkang pa'i rus pas so //
T02D2513:271a-2: khre ma h'um ming nas brjod cing brdung //
T02D2513:271a-3: zhes bya ba ni zas sbyin ma khug cig khrem h'um zhes bya ba brjod cing brdung ngo //
T02D2513:271a-4: ci zhig byas nas she na /
T02D2513:271a-5: lam gyi sum mdor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:271a-6: g-yon pa zhes bya ba ni rkang pa g-yon pas so //
T02D2513:271a-7: 'gugs par brtson pa zhes bya ba ni zas sbyin ma 'gugs par brtson pa'o //
T02D2513:271a-8: lcags kyus bya zhes bya ba ni rkang pa g-yon
T02D2513:271a-9: pa'i mthe bong nyid kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i lcags
T02D2513:271a-10: kyu bri'o zhes snga ma dang sbyar ro //
T02D2513:271a-11: gzugs can gyis ni rting bar brdung //
T02D2513:271a-12: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas rkang pas 'gugs pa'i tshul du bya'o //
T02D2513:271a-13: 'di ni khams gnas pa'i zhes bya ba ni khams gsum na gnas pa'i zas sbyin ma rnams so //
T02D2513:271a-14: 'di skad ston te mi'i mgo thod gnyis las cang te'u byas la /
T02D2513:271a-15: spre'u'i pags pas g-yogs nas bud med na tshod dang
T02D2513:271a-16: po dang ldan pa'i khrag gis ngos gnyis su padma
T02D2513:271a-17: bris la / der yang yi ge khrem bkod nas
T02D2513:271a-18: he ru ka'i sbyor ba byas la de'i sngags dang
T02D2513:271a-19: phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te /
