T02D2513:271a-21: mdor rkang pa g-yon pa'i mthe bos dkyil 'khor phyed
T02D2513:271a-23: de'i grar yang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i lcags kyu byas la de'i dbus su 'dug ste /
T02D2513:271a-24: rkang pas 'gugs pa'i tshul du byas nas /
T02D2513:271a-25: khrag 'thung gi sngags kyi mthar zas sbyin ma bkug la /
T02D2513:271a-26: khrem h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2513:271a-27: mi'i skras 'khor lor byas la thing ril gyi rkang pa'i rus pas brdungs nas /
T02D2513:271a-28: khrag 'thung gis zas sbyin ma bsnams te byon par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2513:271a-29: rnal 'byor pa sems la dbang du gyur pa thob
T02D2513:271a-30: pas tshig tsam la sogs pas thams cad dbang du
T02D2513:271a-32: gang yang rung ba'i gzugs brnyan la //
T02D2513:271a-33: gnas pa yis ni nga rgyal gyis //
T02D2513:271a-35: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa gang yang rung
T02D2513:271a-36: ba'i gzugs brnyan du gnas pa'i nga rgyal gyis so
T02D2513:271a-37: // tshig gi rnam pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02D2513:271b-0: zhes bya ba @271b ni tshig gam lus kyi rnam
T02D2513:271b-1: pas kyang lha la sogs pa mngag gzhug tu 'gyur
T02D2513:271b-2: zhing thams cad byed par 'gyur ro zhes tshig rnam
T02D2513:271b-3: par bsgyur bar sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2513:271b-4: gang tshe dbang nyid la gnas pa //
T02D2513:271b-5: zhes bya ba ni dbang nyid la gnas pas gnas pa'o //
T02D2513:271b-6: ma tsam gyis kyang gcod pa'i mchog / ces bya
T02D2513:271b-7: ba ni gsod pas 'dul ba ma tsam gyis kyang
T02D2513:271b-9: glu dang gar zhes bya ba ni bsgom pas bsgrub
T02D2513:271b-10: par bya ba dang gcig tu gyur nas bdag nyid
T02D2513:271b-11: ji lta ba bzhin du gar rab tu byas pas
T02D2513:271b-12: 'gro ba'i gzugs lha'i ye shes su bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2513:271b-13: de la dang por sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2513:271b-14: me ni lha yi zhal yin pas //
T02D2513:271b-15: zhes bya ba ni de la sbyin sreg dang po byas nas /
T02D2513:271b-16: gzhan dag la sbyin sreg bya ba yin pas 'di skad ces bshad do //
T02D2513:271b-17: gtsub shing las ni byung ba'i me //
T02D2513:271b-18: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i bud shing gtsubs pa las byung ba'i me'o //
T02D2513:271b-19: dge ba yi ni las rnams byed //
T02D2513:271b-20: ces bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las
T02D2513:271b-21: su gang gsungs pa de nyid ni dge ba'i las
T02D2513:271b-23: gdol pa'am dur khrod las byung ba'i //
T02D2513:271b-24: zhes bya ba ni rigs ngan gyi khyim las byung ba dang /
T02D2513:271b-25: dur khrod kyi shing la sogs pa las byung ba'o //
T02D2513:271b-26: thab khung zlum po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2513:271b-27: zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po ste //
T02D2513:271b-28: rgyas pa la ni zur bzhi pa //
T02D2513:271b-29: dbang gi don du zla gam ste //
T02D2513:271b-30: mngon spyod la ni gru gsum mo //
T02D2513:271b-32: zhi ba'i thab khung ni 'di ltar bdud dang yams
T02D2513:271b-33: kyi 'tshe ba nye bar zhi bar shes par bya'o
T02D2513:271b-34: // dkyil 'khor zur bzhi kha khyer la //
T02D2513:271b-35: rdo rje'i mtshan ma dag gis brgyan //
T02D2513:271b-36: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje zhes bya ba ni
T02D2513:271b-37: nye bar mtshon pas kha khyer dang dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2513:271b-38: mtshams su / las kyi rjes su mthun par rnam
T02D2513:271b-39: par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i mtshan ma gzhag pa'o
T02D2513:271b-40: mtshams su / // la la dag ni thams cad
T02D2513:271b-41: du yang rdo rje rtse lnga pa nyid kyis brgyan
T02D2513:271b-43: sbyin sreg de nyid tshul rigs pas //
T02D2513:271b-44: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du gsungs pa'o //
T02D2513:271b-45: padma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhi ba'i ni gtsug tor ro //
T02D2513:272a-0: mngon spyod kyi ni rdo rje @272a * //
T02D2513:272a-1: rtse lnga par grags pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D2513:272a-2: rdo rje ni bdud dang yams kyi 'tshe ba nye bar zhi ba'i don du'o //
T02D2513:272a-3: rgyas pa ni rin po che ste de dag thams
T02D2513:272a-4: cad kyang zhi ba la sogs pa'i thab khung gi
T02D2513:272a-5: dbus su padma'i steng du bya'o //
T02D2513:272a-6: ji ltar rigs par 'dug nas su //
T02D2513:272a-7: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las
T02D2513:272a-8: la ku sha'i chun po'i bstan la sogs pa la
T02D2513:272a-9: 'dug pa'o // dgang gzar mar gyis bkang nas ni //
T02D2513:272a-10: blugs gzar bkang ste de bzhin bsreg /
T02D2513:272a-11: ces bya ba ni dgang gzar mar gyis yongs su
T02D2513:272a-12: bkang bas rigs kyi snying po'i gsang sngags brjod la
T02D2513:272a-13: rim gyis blugs gzar yongs su bkang bas sreg blugs
T02D2513:272a-15: des me'i gzi byin bskyed par bya ste /
T02D2513:272a-16: sbyin sreg la dgos g-yas su bzhag / ces bya
T02D2513:272a-17: ba ni las kyi cho ga ji lta bas sbyin
T02D2513:272a-18: sreg gi rdzas dri dang me tog la sogs pa
T02D2513:272a-19: gzhag go // g-yon du chu yi snod dag go //
T02D2513:272a-20: zhes bya ba ni bsang gtor gyi chu'i snod do //
T02D2513:272a-21: las kun byed pas bzlas nas su //
T02D2513:272a-22: zhes bya ba las thams cad pa ste rigs thams cad las thams cad byed pas so //
T02D2513:272a-24: zhes bya ba ni bsang gtor bya ba nyid kyis
T02D2513:272a-25: 'thor 'thung la sogs pa bya'i gzhan mi dgos so
T02D2513:272a-26: // la la ni gnyis pa la yang las thams
T02D2513:272a-27: cad byed pa dang rang gi gsang sngags dang rigs
T02D2513:272a-28: kyi snying po'i rig pa dag bzlas brjod bya bar
T02D2513:272a-30: ku sha'i rtse mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:272a-31: la thab khung 'khor ba yongs su bskor ba ste
T02D2513:272a-32: / dang por shar du rtse bstan dgra ma //
T02D2513:272a-33: gnyis pa lho ru kha bltas pa //
T02D2513:272a-34: gsum pa rtse mo nub tu blta //
T02D2513:272a-35: bzhi pa byang du rtse bltas pa'o //
T02D2513:272a-36: zhes bya ba'i tshul 'dis ku sha'i rtse mos mnan pa'i thab khung bya'o //
T02D2513:272a-37: g-yas pa mi 'jigs mtheb bskyod cing //
T02D2513:272a-38: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pas lag pa
T02D2513:272a-39: g-yas pa'i mkhrig ma gzung la lag pa g-yas pa
T02D2513:272a-40: brkyang ste mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du byas
T02D2513:272a-41: la / mthe bo lag pa'i mthil du gzhag ste spyan 'dren pa'i tshul gyis bskyod par bya'o //
T02D2513:272a-42: lag g-yon rdo rje bsang gtor te //
T02D2513:272a-43: zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyas so //
T02D2513:272a-44: de la lag pa g-yas pas ji bzhin du bsangs la /
T02D2513:272b-0: phyag rgya bzhis mngon @272b par rgyas gdab bo //
T02D2513:272b-1: mchod yon mchod pa rnam lnga dbul //
T02D2513:272b-2: zhes bya ba ni mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang /
T02D2513:272b-3: bsang gtor phul nas me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod do //
T02D2513:272b-4: thog ma dang tha mar de ji ltar bsam zhe na /
T02D2513:272b-5: me'i phyogs nas bod pa ni //
T02D2513:272b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:272b-7: me'i phyogs nas ji skad du gsungs pa'i gzugs so //
T02D2513:272b-8: las kyi 'od zer rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D2513:272b-9: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa la
T02D2513:272b-10: dkar po la sogs pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis brgyan
T02D2513:272b-11: cing spud pa'o // de'i phyag ji ltar bsam zhe
T02D2513:272b-12: na lag pa dang po zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2513:272b-13: cing spud pa'o // pa gsungs te / bzhugs su
T02D2513:272b-14: gsol zhes bya ba ni spyan drangs pa'i 'og tu'o
T02D2513:272b-15: cing spud pa'o // pa gsungs te / // de la sbyin sreg la dgongs pa //
T02D2513:272b-16: kun la lan gsum sreg blugs 'bul //
T02D2513:272b-17: zhes bya ba ni mchod yon la sogs pa phul ba'i 'og tu bgegs dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2513:272b-18: bgegs med par rtags la sbyin sreg gi yo byad
T02D2513:272b-19: mar la sogs pa thams cad las sreg blugs lan
T02D2513:272b-20: gsum dbul lo // rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni //
T02D2513:272b-21: mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par bya //
T02D2513:272b-22: zhes bya ba ni de nas padma dang zla ba
T02D2513:272b-23: la lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bsams te
T02D2513:272b-24: / rang gi gnas nas spyan drangs la mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas /
T02D2513:272b-25: dang po las dang rjes su mthun pa'i sngags kyis
T02D2513:272b-26: dgang blugs phul la phyi nang gi gsang sngags kyis
T02D2513:272b-27: kyang ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin sreg byas la
T02D2513:272b-28: mkhas bdag gis lha rnams tshim par bya'o //
T02D2513:272b-29: legs par tshim byas bzod gsol te //
T02D2513:272b-30: zhes bya ba ni yo byad ma tshang ba la
T02D2513:272b-31: sogs pa nyes par mi gzung ba'i phyir bzod pa
T02D2513:272b-33: 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba gdab //
T02D2513:272b-34: ces bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i mngon
T02D2513:272b-35: par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rdzogs pa'i phyir gsol ba
T02D2513:272b-36: btab nas ji lta ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol
T02D2513:272b-37: bar bya'o zhes shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:272b-38: 'khyil pa zhes bya ba ni 'khyil bar gyur pa'o //
T02D2513:272b-39: sgom dang bzlas la 'bad par bya //
T02D2513:272b-40: zhes bya ba ni de'i 'og tu'o //
T02D2513:272b-41: aom zhes bya ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2513:272b-42: pa yi ge aom gyi glu'i rnam pa sngags kyis
T02D2513:272b-43: mthar bya ba ni rgyas pa'i las la sbyar ro
T02D2513:272b-44: // sv'a h'a ni zhi ba la'o //
T02D2513:273a-2: mngon spyod la ni yi ge h'um gis so //
T02D2513:273a-3: bdud dang yams kyi 'tshe ba nye bar zhi ba
T02D2513:273a-4: la yi ge phat kyis rab tu zhi bar byas
T02D2513:273a-5: pa'o // de ltar byas nas de'i 'og tu //
T02D2513:273a-6: zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba la //
T02D2513:273a-7: zhes bya ba ni sngags pas zhi ba'i las la
T02D2513:273a-8: sems zhi ba ste bdud dang yams kyi 'tshe ba
T02D2513:273a-9: nye bar zhi ba la yang bskul ba'i tshig dang
T02D2513:273a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2513:273a-11: che ge mo zhi bar mdzod cig ces bya ba
T02D2513:273a-12: la sogs pa bskul ba'i tshig dang gsang sngags spel
T02D2513:273a-13: ba dang ldan pas las bya'o //
T02D2513:273a-14: sngags bsgrubs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhi
T02D2513:273a-15: ba la sogs pa'i las sna tshogs pa gang yin
T02D2513:273a-16: pa la / rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
T02D2513:273a-17: nges par sbyar ba las las gang yin pa de
T02D2513:273a-18: nyid yongs su rdzogs nas mchod par bya'o //
T02D2513:273a-19: bshad gci la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg byas pas ji
T02D2513:273a-20: ltar sdig par mi 'gyur zhes 'ga' zhig som nyi
T02D2513:273a-21: skye bar 'gyur ba ji ste zhes bya ba la
T02D2513:273a-23: ci ste ye shes sems dpa'i zhal //
T02D2513:273a-24: mi gtsang ba yis bkang na ko //
T02D2513:273a-25: zhes bya ba ni zhal yongs su bkang pa'i phyir /
T02D2513:273a-26: ci'i phyir bsngags par bya ba ma yin par yongs su gzung /
T02D2513:273a-27: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gtan
T02D2513:273a-28: tshigs gsungs pa ste sdig pa yin na mngon par
T02D2513:273a-29: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar 'byung ste de bas
T02D2513:273a-30: na med do zhes ston te /
T02D2513:273a-31: chos ni rang bzhin gyis dag ste //
T02D2513:273a-32: skye ba med cing gnas med kyang //
T02D2513:273a-33: zhes bya ba ni don dam par ro //
T02D2513:273a-34: sems can ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:273a-35: la sangs rgyas rnams kyis lhag par mos pa'i 'bras
T02D2513:273a-36: bu'i ye shes rab tu grub pa'i phyir bstan to
T02D2513:273a-37: // dam pa'i don du dge spangs na //
T02D2513:273a-38: zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir gnyis su med
T02D2513:273a-39: pa'i ye shes ni bag chags thams cad rtsa ba
T02D2513:273a-41: smos ci dgos zhes bya ba ni 'dzin par rtog pa'o //
T02D2513:273a-42: dpe bstan pa'i phyir dper na chu klung zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2513:273a-43: chu gang chu klung gis zhes bya ba ni 'dir mthong ngo zhes shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:273a-44: chu las rgal ba'i gzings byas nas //
T02D2513:273a-45: zhes bya ba ni chu de las brgal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2513:273a-46: dpe bstan pa'i don gsungs pa ni /
T02D2513:273a-47: de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
T02D2513:273b-0: chos kyi lam ni bskyed @273b byas kyang //
T02D2513:273b-1: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i chos
T02D2513:273b-2: kyi lam la gnas pas 'khor ba'i pha rol tu
T02D2513:273b-3: son pa'o // chos dang chos min rnam spangs nas //
T02D2513:273b-4: zhes bya ba ni de gnyis ka'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2513:273b-6: bag chags thams cad rtsad nas 'don pa'i phyir bsod
T02D2513:273b-7: nams kyang sdang bar bya na gzhan dag lha ci
T02D2513:273b-8: smos // da ni de ltar bstan pa 'di bcom
T02D2513:273b-9: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin no zhes som nyi
T02D2513:273b-10: dang bral ba'i bsam pas rab tu 'jug par bya'o
T02D2513:273b-12: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:273b-13: ji skad du bshad pa'i lung gi chos la goms
T02D2513:273b-14: pa'i rgyud kyis zab mo'i chos rnam par 'phel bar
T02D2513:273b-15: bya'o // las kyi rim pa rgyas pa bstan pa ni 'dir ma gsungs so //
T02D2513:273b-16: zhi ba'i thab khung ni khru gang tsam shin tu
T02D2513:273b-17: mdzes ba zlum por byas pa de'i 'og sor bcu
T02D2513:273b-18: gnyis brko zhing mtha' kun du sor bzhi yongs su
T02D2513:273b-19: dor ba / kha khyer sor bzhi pa ngos shin tu mnyam par bya'o //
T02D2513:273b-21: de'i dbus su ni padma'i steng du 'khor lo'i tshad
T02D2513:273b-22: sor brgyad pa dbangs su sor gcig pa gzhag go
T02D2513:273b-23: // thab khung las dkar gyis byugs shing mtha' kun
T02D2513:273b-24: du khru gang tsam gyis gzhi skyong nul bya zhing
T02D2513:273b-25: yang ba'i lci bas byug par bya'o //
T02D2513:273b-26: de nas tsandan dkar po dang me tog dkar po
T02D2513:273b-27: dri zhim pa'i sel ma gtor la thug gsum du
T02D2513:273b-28: bya ste / 'di ni thab khung gi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2513:273b-29: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar ni seng ldeng la sogs pa'i rgyu las bya ste /
T02D2513:273b-30: yu ba'i tshad ni skyes bu tshad dang ldan pa'i mtheb sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
T02D2513:273b-31: de'i phyi rol du steng gi chal zur bzhi sor
T02D2513:273b-32: bzhi'i tshad la 'og tu zabs su sor gnyis ba
T02D2513:273b-33: rko zhing khu ba 'dzag pa'i bu ga zlum po
T02D2513:273b-34: mthe'u chung gi tshad tsam la de'i dbus su de
T02D2513:273b-36: de'i rtse mo'i char sor brgyad pa'i tshad dam padma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba bya'o //
T02D2513:273b-37: yu pa'i 'og gi char ni rdo rje dang rin
T02D2513:273b-38: po cher byas la yu ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2513:273b-39: khu tshur gyis gzung bar bya ste /
T02D2513:273b-40: 'di ni blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2513:273b-41: dgang gzar ni khru gang gi tshad la de'i kha
T02D2513:273b-42: padma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba las sor gnyis pa'i tshad
T02D2513:273b-43: sor gcig brkos pa'i dbus su ni 'khor lo bya'o
T02D2513:274a-1: gi char rdo rje rin po che bya ba ni
T02D2513:274a-2: snga ma bzhin te 'di ni dgang gzar gyi mtshan
T02D2513:274a-3: nyid do // bud shing gi don du ni dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci ba bzang po dang /
T02D2513:274a-4: de bzhin du sha li dang shing dri zhim po
T02D2513:274a-5: dag kyang zhi ba'i las la bud shing yin no
T02D2513:274a-6: // rdzas ni ba'i 'o ma dang zho dang 'bras
T02D2513:274a-7: yos dang til dang d'ur ba dang ku sha sngon
T02D2513:274a-8: // po dang / pri yang ku'i me tog dang /
T02D2513:274a-12: thang chu dri zhi ma pa dang /
T02D2513:274a-15: zho la sogs pa ji snyed pa'am /
T02D2513:274a-16: yang na mchod sbyin gyi rdzas rnams kyis sreg blugs bya'o //
T02D2513:274a-17: yam shing ni lo ma dang bcas shing rlan dang bcas pa /
T02D2513:274a-18: rtse mo las skyes pa mtho gang tsam la sbrang
T02D2513:274a-19: rtsi dang 'o ma dang mar la btags shing tsandan
T02D2513:274a-20: dkar po'i chus yongs su bsgos pa'o //
T02D2513:274a-21: yang yam shing gi mtshan nyid ni /
T02D2513:274a-22: pa la sha dang au du mw'a ra //
T02D2513:274a-23: bla ga sha dang ni n+ya gro dha //
T02D2513:274a-24: aa rka dang ni seng ldeng dang //
T02D2513:274a-25: aa mra be kam ka dang ni //
T02D2513:274a-26: ka sma ri dang sha mi dang //
T02D2513:274a-27: aa ba margad las byung ba //
T02D2513:274a-28: aa shva ttha dad bcas pa ni //
T02D2513:274a-29: yam shing bcu gnyis dag tu bstan //
T02D2513:274a-30: sar pa las ni mdzub gang tsam //
T02D2513:274a-31: las rnams kun la dbul bar bya //
T02D2513:274a-32: bzang zhing sar la drang ba dang //
T02D2513:274a-33: dri zhim chu yis bkrus pa dang //
T02D2513:274a-34: zhi ba'i sreg rdzas gang cung zad //
T02D2513:274a-35: de bzhin rgyas pa'i sreg rdzas dang //
T02D2513:274a-36: gang yang bdag gi kha zas dag / las rnams kun la dbul bar bya //
T02D2513:274a-37: zhi ba la ni mngar ba dang //
T02D2513:274a-38: me tog dri bzang dkar po shis //
T02D2513:274a-39: de bas las de byed pa yi //
T02D2513:274a-40: mdor na de yi dbang du bya //
T02D2513:274a-41: ti la ka dang ku ta dza dang //
T02D2513:274a-42: kar ni pa la so ma dang //
T02D2513:274a-43: bil pa'i me tog ka rnydza //
T02D2513:274a-44: thams cad las ni thams cad pa //
T02D2513:274a-45: bu ram thang chu bsres pa dang //
T02D2513:274a-46: ri lu bzang po bya ba ni //
T02D2513:274a-48: zhi ba yi ni las la gsungs //
T02D2513:274a-49: tu ru ska dang aa ga ru //
T02D2513:274a-50: ga pu ra tsandan bu ra ma dang //
T02D2513:274a-51: thang chu dang ni zho dag ni //
T02D2513:274a-52: las rnams kun la 'jug pa yin //
T02D2513:274a-53: dri zhim shing skyes thang chu ni //
T02D2513:274a-54: zhi ba yi ni las la grags //
T02D2513:274a-55: mngar ba mchog tu bshad pa na //
T02D2513:274a-56: ser skya las rnams thams cad la'o //
T02D2513:274a-57: dri yi rdzas ni yid 'ong dang //
T02D2513:274b-0: dkar @274b po zhi ba'i las la gsungs //
T02D2513:274b-1: khyad par na ni aa ga ru //
T02D2513:274b-2: nag po las rnams kun la bsngags //
T02D2513:274b-3: sva sti'i thug pa 'bras yos dang //
T02D2513:274b-4: mar dang sbrang rtsi nas 'o thug / bi dza p'u ra de dag rnams //
T02D2513:274b-5: nges par zhi ba'i lha bshos so //
T02D2513:274b-6: sva ste ka dang au lo pi //
T02D2513:274b-7: bzang po ci 'byor bu ram can //
T02D2513:274b-8: lag pan rtsa ba 'bras bu can //
T02D2513:274b-10: de ni thams cad 'dod ces bya //
T02D2513:274b-11: lha bshos don grub byed pa'o //
T02D2513:274b-12: de lta bu 'am yon tan thams cad dang ldan
T02D2513:274b-13: pas zhi pa'i las byed par 'dod na phyi'i khrus
T02D2513:274b-14: bya'o // khrus bya ba'i cho gas khrus bya ba'am
T02D2513:274b-15: nang gi khrus byas la ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2513:274b-16: sbyin sreg gi khang par rab tu zhugs te bsang
T02D2513:274b-18: phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa gnas brtan par byas
T02D2513:274b-19: pa'i bar gyi cho ga byas te sbyin sreg gi
T02D2513:274b-20: yo byad thams cad rdo rje rtse mo bzlas pa'i
T02D2513:274b-22: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis kyang yongs su bzlas te g-yas phyogs su gzhag go //
T02D2513:274b-23: bsang gtor gyi chu snod la bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi yongs su bzlas nas gzhag go //
T02D2513:274b-24: mchod yon gyi snod kyang snga ma bzhin du mngon
T02D2513:274b-25: par 'dus byas la dud rtsi thab sbyor gyis mngon
T02D2513:274b-26: par bsngags shing rigs kyi snying po dang rigs kyi
T02D2513:274b-27: rig pa dag yongs su bzlas la g-yon phyogs su
T02D2513:274b-28: gzhag go // de nas gos dkar po bgos shing shin tu gtsang bas /
T02D2513:274b-29: ri rab ri yi brag 'dra bar //
T02D2513:274b-30: 'dzum pa med pa yi ni mig / byams pa'i lta ba yin par bshad //
T02D2513:274b-31: nad dang gnod pa dug sel lo //
T02D2513:274b-32: zhes bya ba byams pa'i lta bas shar ram byang
T02D2513:274b-33: du bltas te ku sha'i chun po dang padma'i gdan
T02D2513:274b-34: gyis 'dug nas / ji lta ba bzhin du lha'i
T02D2513:274b-35: rnal 'byor byas pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2513:274b-36: gyis 'dug nas / byas nas / de'i chos dang
T02D2513:274b-37: dam tshig bzung la de bzhin du khang pa brtsegs
T02D2513:274b-38: gyis 'dug nas / byas nas / ma bsams te
T02D2513:274b-39: / gcig pur zhugs la spos kyis byug pa dang
T02D2513:274b-40: gyis 'dug nas / byas nas / ma bsams te
T02D2513:274b-41: / / bo de tse gcig gis dbus su mtshan
T02D2513:274b-42: ma'i gdu bu la sangs rgyas spyan gyi rig pa
T02D2513:274b-43: brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te lag pa g-yas
T02D2513:274b-45: de'i lag pa'i srin lag gi sor mo la rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po /
T02D2513:274b-46: de bzhin du bzlas pa'i bsang byed kyang gdags par bya'o //
T02D2513:275a-1: ku sha'i gsang sngags bzlas nas dgod par bya ste
T02D2513:275a-2: sngags pa mnyam par bzhag nas zhi ba'i las rnams
T02D2513:275a-4: dang po shar du rtse bstan dgra ma //
T02D2513:275a-5: gnyis pa lho phyogs kha bltas la //
T02D2513:275a-6: gsum pa'i rtse mo nub byang du'o //
T02D2513:275a-7: de nas thab khud ku sha'i rtse mo gyen du
T02D2513:275a-8: blta ba mthug pas bkab la las dang rjes su
T02D2513:275a-9: mthun pa'i me tog gis kun du nye bar mdzes
T02D2513:275a-10: par bya'o // aom badzra satva aa zhes bya ba ni ku sha la gdab pa'i sngags so //
T02D2513:275a-11: de nas yi ge aom dang sv'a h'a'i mthar thug pa las thab khung byung bar bsams la /
T02D2513:275a-12: mngar zhing 'o ma can gyi shing las byung ba'i rgyun bzhag gi me'am /
T02D2513:275a-14: tshang bang chen po'i me las sbyin sreg gi me blangs la /
T02D2513:275a-15: aom badzra aa mri te h'um phat cas bya bas
T02D2513:275a-16: ji lta ba bzhin bsang zhing sbyangs nas de'i gsang
T02D2513:275a-17: sngags brjod nas thab khung du bcug ste /
T02D2513:275a-18: sngar bshad pa'i yam shing gi rlung yab kyis rlung dang /
T02D2513:275a-19: ji skad du bdag po'i gsang sngags kyis me'i phyogs
T02D2513:275a-20: su mngon par rang gis phyogs nas rdo rje me
T02D2513:275a-21: ji skad du bshad pa'i gzugs can drang srong rnams
T02D2513:275a-22: kyis yongs su bskor ba mdog dkar po spyan drangs
T02D2513:275a-23: la thab khung gi dbus su nye bar bzhugs par
T02D2513:275a-24: bsam mo // de nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil
T02D2513:275a-25: dang 'thor 'thung phul nas de nyid kyi phyag rgya
T02D2513:275a-27: aom aagna ye ha bya ka bya ha na y'a
T02D2513:275a-28: di py'a di pa m'a sv'a h'a zhes brjod do
T02D2513:275a-29: // lag pa g-yas pa bteg nas ni //
T02D2513:275a-30: 'bar ba'i tshul du bstan pa dag / rdo rje me yi phyag rgya 'di //
T02D2513:275a-31: rang gi yin par yongs su brtag / chos kyi tshe ga shes pa yi //
T02D2513:275a-32: sngags pas lce la zla ba dang //
T02D2513:275a-33: de steng rdo rje dkar po bsam //
T02D2513:275a-34: h'um ni dbus su bsam par bya //
T02D2513:275a-35: lag pa g-yas dang g-yon dag gis //
T02D2513:275a-36: gar gyi tshul gyis brag pa dag /'dir ni las kyi rgyar grags te //
T02D2513:275a-37: sngags par las kyi dngos grub ster //
T02D2513:275a-38: de nas phyag rgya chen po ji lta bzhin du bcings nas /
T02D2513:275a-39: aom badzra bandha ham zhes brjod do //
T02D2513:275a-40: rdo rje srung ba dam bcings nas //
T02D2513:275a-41: rdo rje bcings pa btsir ba dag /'di ni srung ba'i dam tshig ste //
T02D2513:275a-42: sems can thams cad bsrung ba'o //
T02D2513:275a-43: zhes bya bas dam tshig bsgo bar bya'o //
T02D2513:275b-0: @275b de nas mchod yon phul pa rang gi gsang sngags kyis me tog la sogs pas mchod do //
T02D2513:275b-1: de nas g-yon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur
T02D2513:275b-2: gyis blugs gzar bzung la g-yas pas dgad gzar bzung
T02D2513:275b-3: nas / des mar blangs la rim gyis yongs su bkang ste /
T02D2513:275b-4: me lha'i gsang sngags brjod cing des dgang blugs gsum
T02D2513:275b-5: mam mkhas pas gus pa dang bcas pas dbul lo
T02D2513:275b-6: // yo byad can thams cad las kyang sreg blugs gsum gsum dbul lo //
T02D2513:275b-7: de nas blo dang ldan pas bgegs med pa dang
T02D2513:275b-8: bgegs dang bcas pa yang dag par brtags nas bgegs
T02D2513:275b-9: dang bcas pa la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs
T02D2513:275b-11: de nas mkhas pas bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags kyis khang ba de bsang gtor bya'o //
T02D2513:275b-12: de nas spos dang me tog la sogs pas yang
T02D2513:275b-13: dag par mchod pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2513:275b-14: byas la g-yas nas bskor zhing bsang gtor bya'o //
T02D2513:275b-15: yang rang gi rig pas mar la sogs pa mkhas pas sbyin blugs gsum dbul lo //
T02D2513:275b-16: de nas slar yang legs par bsang gtor dang 'thor 'thung yang dang yang bya'o //
T02D2513:275b-17: de nas me 'bar ba'i rnam par bsams la sbyin sreg gi gnas su gzhag go //
T02D2513:275b-18: de nas thab kyi dbus su padma de yang zla
T02D2513:275b-19: ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du rang gi sngags sv'a
T02D2513:275b-20: h'a'i mthar thug pas rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog
T02D2513:275b-21: dkar po thugs zhi ba'i bdag nyid can na bza'
T02D2513:275b-23: dbang po zhi ba'i rang gi dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2513:275b-24: rgya dang bcas pa la dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams
T02D2513:275b-26: gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid chen po'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du blos bsams la /
T02D2513:275b-27: sgo phye ste bsdu ba byas nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod la dgug pa dang /

T02D2513:279a-6: 'du byed ni phrag dog ste de yang sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D2513:279a-7: gsung rdo rje la sogs pa 'di dag 'dod chags
T02D2513:279a-8: la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid ji ltar yin pa
T02D2513:279a-9: ni bcom ldan 'das kyis zla gsang thig le'i rgyud
T02D2513:279a-11: de 'dir gtan tshigs kyi tshul gyis bri bar bya ste /
T02D2513:279a-12: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D2513:279a-13: sems can thams cad dga' mdzad cing //
T02D2513:279a-15: de phyir 'dod chags zhes brjod do //
T02D2513:279a-16: nang song gsum gyis 'jigs byed du //
T02D2513:279a-17: sems can nyon mongs sdang byed pas //
T02D2513:279a-18: de yi phyir na rdo rje che //
T02D2513:279a-19: zhe sdang zhes ni bsgrags pa yis //
T02D2513:279a-20: ngan song 'jigs pa chen po ru //
T02D2513:279a-21: sems can thams cad rmongs byed pas //
T02D2513:279a-22: de yi phyir ni gti mug che //
T02D2513:279a-23: rtag pa thub pa mchog yin no //
T02D2513:279a-24: bde chen sbyin pa'i sprin gyis ni //
T02D2513:279a-25: sems can thams cad nga rgyal bskyed //
T02D2513:279a-26: nam mkha' bde ba bsdu ba'i phyir //
T02D2513:279a-27: de'i phyir mkhas chen nga rgyal yin //
T02D2513:279a-28: ro la sogs pa mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D2513:279a-29: phrag dog rdo rje gdon mi za //
T02D2513:279a-30: sna tshogs pa ni phye ba'i phyir //
T02D2513:279a-31: de yi phyir ni sna tshogs che //
T02D2513:279a-33: la la ni 'dod chags la sogs pa nyid byang
T02D2513:279a-34: chub kyi ngo bor bsgom pa khyad par du brlabs
T02D2513:279a-35: nas gsung rdo rje la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2513:279a-36: kyis chos lnga'i thar pa thob par byed pa bstan
T02D2513:279a-37: la / de la mngon par zhen pa ma spangs
T02D2513:279a-38: pas ni sdig pa dang bcas shing nyon mongs pa
T02D2513:279a-39: la nye bar brten pas ni mi shes pa thob
T02D2513:279a-40: par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin par de bzhin
T02D2513:279a-41: gshegs pas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2513:279a-43: thabs chen rnams dang ldan gyur na //
T02D2513:279a-44: nyon mongs byang chub yan lag 'gyur //
T02D2513:279a-45: 'khor ba'ang zhi ba'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2513:279a-46: de phyir de bzhin gshegs bsam yas //
T02D2513:279a-47: zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
T02D2513:279a-48: bshad gci zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bshad
T02D2513:279a-49: pa la sogs pa rtag tu yongs su 'dzag pa'i
T02D2513:279b-0: @279b chos can du gyur pa 'byung ba chen po'i
T02D2513:279b-1: bdag nyid can gyi dam tshig ni rnam par snang
T02D2513:279b-2: mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bos bsten par 'os pa
T02D2513:279b-3: nyid du bskyed cing bsgom pa la brtson pas de
T02D2513:279b-4: man ngag bzhin du sbyar ba dang rtogs pa dang
T02D2513:279b-5: rab tu 'bar bar byas nas bza' bar bya'o //
T02D2513:279b-6: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la yang rdzas 'di nyid
T02D2513:279b-7: kyis slob ma rnams la dam tshig gi phyir sbyin
T02D2513:279b-8: par bya ste dam tshig gis gsang sngags rnams grub
T02D2513:279b-9: par 'gyur ro // zhes gsungs pas 'dir som nyi mi bya'o //
T02D2513:279b-10: sbyin sreg rab tu ston pa'i gzhung gi le'u la
T02D2513:279b-11: ni sbyin sreg gi rim par phye ba'i sgrar brjod
T02D2513:279b-14: // / sbyin sreg byas kyang cho ga ma tshang bas
T02D2513:279b-15: kyang dngos grub kyi snod du mi 'gyur bas de
T02D2513:279b-16: nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcu pa cho
T02D2513:279b-17: ga thams cad bstan pa'i rim par phye ba gsungs
T02D2513:279b-18: te / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2513:279b-19: ci zhig mdzad nas she na /
T02D2513:279b-20: ting nge 'dzin thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:279b-21: ting nge 'dzin thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D2513:279b-22: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i dngos grub bo //
T02D2513:279b-23: de nyid ni dam pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D2513:279b-24: dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D2513:279b-25: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i 'khor lo la
T02D2513:279b-26: sogs pa'i dngos grub ston pa'i rnam par thugs rtse
T02D2513:279b-27: gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2513:279b-28: dam tshig thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2513:279b-29: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi 'khor lo la
T02D2513:279b-30: sogs pa'i dngos grub gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2513:279b-31: te / gsang sngags zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2513:279b-32: la rang gi lha'i sku gsung thugs bsgom pa la
T02D2513:279b-33: mngon par brtson pas 'khor lo la sogs pa'i dngos
T02D2513:279b-34: grub bdag la stsol cig ces bya ba'i bskul tshig
T02D2513:279b-35: dang bcas par gsang sngags brjod la de'i 'og tu
T02D2513:279b-36: 'khor lo la sogs pa la sku rdo rje la
T02D2513:279b-37: sogs pa gzhug cing bsgom pa'i rnam par byas nas
T02D2513:279b-38: te / / rang rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
T02D2513:279b-39: su 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rdzas bsgrub par bya'o
T02D2513:280a-0: te / / // dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs gsang chen zhes @280a * //
T02D2513:280a-1: bya ba ni bu mo la sogs pa'i dngos grub
T02D2513:280a-2: sgrub pa'i thabs kyang nyon cig ces 'dir dang gi
T02D2513:280a-4: de gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2513:280a-5: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ni go
T02D2513:280a-7: ji skad du bshad pa'i sbyor bas lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2513:280a-8: tshes grangs dang rgyu skar la sogs pa shis pa
T02D2513:280a-9: la 'khor lo'i dngos grub kyi phyir sku rdo rje
T02D2513:280a-11: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' thob pa
T02D2513:280a-12: de srid kyi bar du gsang sngags dam pa bzlas
T02D2513:280a-14: de nas bkra shis dang dge mtshan dag bya zhing
T02D2513:280a-15: dul ba'i spyod lam phun sum tshogs pas bdag nyid
T02D2513:280a-16: song la rin la mi rtseg par gnam lcags nyo'o
T02D2513:280a-17: // de nas bzo bo bzang po la gla rngan
T02D2513:280a-18: la mi rtseg par 'dod lo rtsibs brgyad pa'am drug
T02D2513:280a-19: pa mtho gang pa byas nas las thams cad bzlas
T02D2513:280a-20: pa'i chu dang spyan gyi gsang sngags bzlas pa'i chus
T02D2513:280a-21: // bsangs gtor bya'o // de nas las thams cad bzlas pa'i ba yi rnam lngas bkru'o //
T02D2513:280a-22: de nas til gyi chus so //
T02D2513:280a-23: de nas spos kyi chus so //
T02D2513:280a-24: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po bzlas pa'i spos chus bkru'o //
T02D2513:280a-25: de nas shin tu bsngags pa'i snod kyi steng du
T02D2513:280a-26: bzhag la thun bzhir bzlas pa dang sgom pa ji
T02D2513:280a-27: lta ba bzhin du byas nas /
T02D2513:280a-28: gsang sngags tshim par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2513:280a-29: rdzas dang rjes su mthun pa'i sbyin sreg ji lta ba bzhin du byas te /
T02D2513:280a-30: aom te dze te dze sv'a ni siddhi sa dh'a
T02D2513:280a-31: ya h'um phat ces bya ba 'di ni sbyin sreg
T02D2513:280a-32: byas la rdzas gzi byin bskyed do //
T02D2513:280a-33: me tog la sogs pas kyang mchod nas las thams cad pas kyang bzlas pa'i chu dang /
T02D2513:280a-34: lag pas bran zhing reg par bya'o //
T02D2513:280a-35: de nas sgrub pa la bab pa'i dus su ri
T02D2513:280a-36: bo la sogs par dkyil 'khor bris la dkyil 'khor
T02D2513:280a-37: gyi las thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rdzogs

T02D2513:280a-40: gyi sngags kyis sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan
T02D2513:280a-41: pas 'khor lo la spyin sreg dbul lo //
T02D2513:280a-42: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la yang rdzas dang rjes su mthun par sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2513:280b-0: de nas ji skad bshad pa'i gsang @280b sngags kyis
T02D2513:280b-1: brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas pas gzi byin bskyed
T02D2513:280b-3: sbyin sreg ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2513:280b-4: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sar zhugs la mchod yon
T02D2513:280b-5: dbul ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas nas phyag
T02D2513:280b-6: byas te / 'khor lo mdun du bzhag la der
T02D2513:280b-7: yang sku rdo rje la sogs bzhugs par bsgoms nas
T02D2513:280b-8: byas te / / aom dzi na dzi ka /
T02D2513:280b-9: tsa kra siddhi me bra yatstsha zhes bya ba'i gsang
T02D2513:280b-10: sngags mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2513:280b-11: de nas nyi ma 'char ba na 'khor lo 'bar bar mthong na langs te /
T02D2513:280b-12: spyan gyi gsang sngags brjod cing de blangs la yi
T02D2513:280b-13: ge brgya pas brtan par byas nas dkyil 'khor ji
T02D2513:280b-14: lta ba bzhin du bsdu bar byas te /
T02D2513:280b-15: sangs rgyas la sogs pa la mchod pa'i phyir rdzas rnam par bgo bar bya zhing /
T02D2513:280b-16: bla ma la ni rin po che la sogs pa
T02D2513:280b-17: bdag tu bzung ba yod pas mchod la phyag byas
T02D2513:280b-18: nas de'i skal ba blang bar bya'o //
T02D2513:280b-19: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog la ni nor sbyin pa'am bla
T02D2513:280b-20: ma'i yang dag pa'i man ngag byin pas de'i skal
T02D2513:280b-21: ba blangs la rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags zlos
T02D2513:280b-22: shing gang du 'dod pas song na ji skad 'dod
T02D2513:280b-23: pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02D2513:280b-24: rdo rje la sogs pa sgrub pa yang de bzhin no //
T02D2513:280b-26: zhes bya ba ni aom a'a: h'um zhes bya bas
T02D2513:280b-27: sku rdo rje la sogs pa rab tu zhugs pa
T02D2513:280b-29: rdzas kyi dngos grub bstan nas da ni bu mo bsgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2513:280b-30: rdzas kyis dngos grub ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:280b-31: phyag rgya chen po'i rjes thogs la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2513:280b-32: rnal 'byor che la rnam gnas pas //
T02D2513:280b-33: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams rang gi lus la dgod cing 'jog pas so //
T02D2513:280b-34: de la rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor chen po ni 'di yin te /
T02D2513:280b-35: lha thams cad kyi gnas su sa ma ya aa
T02D2513:280b-36: zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa
T02D2513:280b-37: bkod la / snying ga rmi bskyod pa rnam par bsam mo //
T02D2513:280b-38: dpral bar ni rin chen 'byung ldan //
T02D2513:280b-39: lkog ma ni 'od dpag tu med pa /
T02D2513:280b-40: spyi bor don yod par grub pa /
T02D2513:280b-41: mi gnyis su sangs rgyas spyan //
T02D2513:281a-0: mi bskyod pa'i g-yon logs su m'a ma @281a * //
T02D2513:281a-2: 'od dpag med kyi g-yon logs su gos dkar mo /
T02D2513:281a-3: don yod par grub pa'i g-yon logs su sgrol ma /
T02D2513:281a-4: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i g-yon logs su rdo
T02D2513:281a-5: rje sems ma la sogs pa bzhi mi bskyod pa'i
T02D2513:281a-6: rgyab tu skul byed ma rin chen 'byung ldan gyi
T02D2513:281a-7: yon tan logs su rin chen sgrol ma /

T02D2513:281a-10: mdzod spur gzhan gyis mi thub pa /
T02D2513:281a-11: kha la rta mgrin gsang ba'i gnas su sdud rtsi thab sbyor /
T02D2513:281a-12: rkang pa gnyis su stobs po che /
T02D2513:281a-13: dbral ba'i steng du mi g-yo ba /
T02D2513:281a-14: mi bskyod pa'i mdun du 'dod pa'i rgyal po /
T02D2513:281a-15: dpung pa gnyis su dbyug sngon can /
T02D2513:281a-16: mi bskyod pa dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i bar du gnod mdzes rgyal po /
T02D2513:281a-17: spyi gtsug gi steng du 'khor los sgyur ba /
T02D2513:281a-18: spyi gtsug gi dbus su rnam par snang mdzad bsam par bya'o //
T02D2513:281a-19: de nas dza: h'um pam ho: zhes pa brjod la
T02D2513:281a-20: yid kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye
T02D2513:281a-22: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dgug pa dang /
T02D2513:281a-24: bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba ji lta ba
T02D2513:281a-25: bzhin du byas nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par
T02D2513:281a-26: bya'o // gang 'di bu mo bsgrub pa bstan pa
T02D2513:281a-27: yin mod kyi 'on kyang phyag rgya chen po la
T02D2513:281a-28: sogs pa bsgrub pa la yang shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:281a-29: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis dus ji srid du
T02D2513:281a-30: grub par ma gyur na rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul
T02D2513:281a-32: slob dpon gyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba nyid kyis rnal 'byor chen po bsgom par bya'i /
T02D2513:281a-33: rang gi rig pa'i dbang bskur bas ni ma yin no //
T02D2513:281a-34: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:281a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo che //
T02D2513:281a-36: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas spyan no //
T02D2513:281a-37: zhe sdang rigs ni 'dren mdzad pa //
T02D2513:281a-38: rdo rje gdan can m'a ma k'i //
T02D2513:281a-39: zhes bya ba ni zhe sdang gi rigs 'thob par byed pa'o zhes sbyar ro //
T02D2513:281a-40: rin chen 'byung ba'i lha mo dang //
T02D2513:281a-41: zhes bya ba ni gos dkar mo'o //
T02D2513:281a-42: lha mo 'gro la dbang mdzad ma //
T02D2513:281a-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgrol ma la sogs pa'i lha mo'o //
T02D2513:281b-0: bu mo @281b 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2513:281b-1: spyan la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma ste /
T02D2513:281b-2: bu mo ni nges par spyan la sogs pa'i tshig gi sgrar brjod do //
T02D2513:281b-3: de bas na bu mo 'di dag ste spyan la
T02D2513:281b-4: sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma ni mig yangs shing mdzes
T02D2513:281b-5: la lo bcu drug lon pa'i na tshod dang ldan
T02D2513:281b-6: pa / gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa //

T02D2513:281b-8: gzhan yang rang gi dam tshig dang phyag rgya shin tu legs par bslab pa blangs pa la /
T02D2513:281b-9: rdo rje dang ni padma bskul //
T02D2513:281b-10: zhes 'og nas smos pa'i tshig dang sbyar ro //
T02D2513:281b-11: rang gi phyag rgya'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir lha mo'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2513:281b-12: lha mo byi dor legs byas te //
T02D2513:281b-13: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du byas pa ni byi dor ro //
T02D2513:281b-14: rigs lnga yi ni chogs chen ma //
T02D2513:281b-15: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor chen por byas la gzhag ste /
T02D2513:281b-16: gsang ba bskul lo zhes 'og nas smos pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2513:281b-17: ji skad bskul zhe na gzhag ste sprad pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2513:281b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2513:281b-19: de nyid bstan pa ni padma la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2513:281b-20: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i padma der rdo
T02D2513:281b-21: rje gzhug pa byas la de dang lhan cig sprad
T02D2513:281b-22: pa dang 'khyud nas rdo rje dang padma bskul bar
T02D2513:281b-23: bya'o zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2513:281b-24: 'di nyid gsungs pa ni gar gyi tshul gyis zhes
T02D2513:281b-25: bya ba la sogs pa ste rus spal bskor ba
T02D2513:281b-26: bcings pa la sogs pa'i gar gyi tshul gyis bskor
T02D2513:281b-27: ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis mchan khung bsdams pa'i
T02D2513:281b-28: gar ro // de bzhin spro dang bsdu pa yis //
T02D2513:281b-29: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis nam mkha'
T02D2513:281b-30: khyab par bsam pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa la
T02D2513:281b-31: dga' bas mnyes par bya ste /
T02D2513:281b-32: nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags pa'i tshul du bya'o zhes thams cad du gnas so //
T02D2513:281b-33: mdo las sgyu ma dregs myos nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2513:281b-34: de nas skad cig gis lha mo'i yang dag pa'i
T02D2513:281b-35: bde bas tshim pa'i rdo rje las byung ba'i bdud
T02D2513:281b-36: rtsi de nyid phyung la de ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2513:281b-37: du legs par brten te rab tu 'bar bar byas

T02D2513:282a-1: nga rgyal dang ldan pas tshim par bya /

T02D2513:282a-3: 'thungs pa tsam nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni 'thungs pa'i 'og tu /

T02D2513:282a-10: de'i 'og tu dngos su bya ba yin gyi /

T02D2513:282a-12: gzhan du 'dod pa'i longs spyod la //
T02D2513:282a-13: mngon par zhen pa skye 'gyur na //
T02D2513:282a-14: ma bslabs dbang gi sngags pa ni //
T02D2513:282a-16: slob ma bzang la'ang rnam kun du //
T02D2513:282a-17: sbyor pa 'di ni mi bstan te //
T02D2513:282a-18: bsam pa khyad par shes byas nas //
